english: She did not visit me on Sunday but on Monday.
chinese: 她没有在星期天来找我，而是星期一。

english: She got over the shock of her father's death.
chinese: 她从她父亲过世的震惊中恢复了。

english: She has to take a remedial course in English.
She is going to wash the bike this afternoon.
She rested her head on her mother's shoulder.
chinese: 她把头枕在母亲的肩膀上。

english: She rested her head on her mother's shoulder.
chinese: 她把头垂在她母亲的肩上。

english: She's not a regular employee of this company.
chinese: 她不是这间公司正式的职员。

english: Sir, you have left your lighter on the table.
chinese: 先生，您把您的打火机留在桌子上了。

english: Some abstract art is difficult to understand.
chinese: 一些抽象艺术是很难理解的。

english: Some diseases are caused by a defective gene.
chinese: 一些疾病的产生原因是基因缺陷。

english: Some of them are healthy, but others are not.
chinese: 他们中的一些人身体健康，但是其他人不是。

english: Some passengers complained about the service.
chinese: 有些乘客抱怨服务态度不好。

english: Someone smashed the windshield of my new car.
chinese: 有人把我新车的挡风玻璃砸碎了。

english: Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.
Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.
chinese: 进教室的时候请把帽子摘了。

english: The Colombian government demanded more money.
chinese: 哥伦比亚政府要了更多的钱。

english: The President refused to answer the question.
chinese: 总统拒绝回答那个问题。

english: The cat arched its back and stretched itself.
The charge for a front row seat is 5 dollars.
The cook prepares different dishes every day.
chinese: 厨师每天准备不同的菜。

english: The fire broke out after the staff went home.
chinese: 在全体职员回家后，火事爆发了。

english: The flowers in the garden need to be watered.
The information you gave me is of little use.
chinese: 你给我的资料没有多大的用处。

english: The landlord says he wants to raise the rent.
The man turned out to be a private detective.
chinese: 这个男子竟然是一个私家侦探。

english: The old church by the lake is very beautiful.
The old cottage has a certain charm about it.
chinese: 旧村屋有它自己一定的魅力。

english: The old man walked across the road carefully.
chinese: 老人小心翼翼地过了马路。

english: The plane took off and was soon out of sight.
chinese: 飞机起飞后，很快就消失在了眼前。

english: The police seem to know exactly where we are.
chinese: 警察看来很清楚我们在哪里。

english: The rope wasn't strong enough to support him.
chinese: 绳子不够牢固，撑不住他。

english: The scenery was beautiful beyond description.
The speaker's comments were highly offensive.
chinese: 发言人的评论极有攻击性。

english: The storm prevented us from arriving on time.
chinese: 暴风妨碍了我们准时到达。

english: The teacher gathered his students around him.
chinese: 老师把他的学生们聚集在他周围。

english: The washing machine is a wonderful invention.
chinese: 洗衣机是一个很棒的发明。

english: Their trip was postponed because of the rain.
chinese: 他们的旅行因为下雨延期了。

english: There are more girls than boys at our school.
chinese: 在我们学校里女孩比男孩多。

english: There is a small garden in front of my house.
There is an urgent need for medical supplies.
There is insufficient light to take pictures.
There isn't a grain of truth in what he says.
There isn't a grain of truth in what he says.
There used to be a lot of frogs in this pond.
chinese: 以前在这个池塘里有许多青蛙。

english: There was a cold wind blowing from the north.
chinese: 有一阵从北边吹来的冷风。

english: There were no hats in that store that fit me.
chinese: 那个店里没有合我尺寸的帽子。

english: There's a big supermarket in my neighborhood.
chinese: 在我的邻近区域有一个大超市。

english: There's a possibility you'll have to do that.
chinese: 你有可能不得不那么做。

english: There's no space in the room for another bed.
chinese: 这间房间没有空间再放一张床了。

english: These kinds of mistakes are easy to overlook.
chinese: 这种错误很容易被人忽视。

english: They are the only students who study Chinese.
chinese: 学中文的学生只有他们几个。

english: They have English lessons three times a week.
They say that he has been dead for two years.
Things are the same, but people have changed.
This English composition is far from perfect.
chinese: 这篇英语作文离完美还差得远。

english: This case might not get resolved for a while.
chinese: 这个案件可能不会在短时间内就解决。

english: This place has a mysterious atmosphere to it.
chinese: 这个地方的气氛很神秘。

english: This school supplies students with textbooks.
chinese: 这所学校为学生提供教科书。

english: This song makes me think of when I was young.
chinese: 这首歌使我想起了我年轻的时候。

english: Time is the most precious thing in the world.
chinese: 时间是世界上最宝贵的东西。

english: To distinguish right from wrong is difficult.
Tom and I see each other every day at school.
chinese: 汤姆和我每天都在学校见面。

english: Tom closed his eyes and began to count sheep.
chinese: 汤姆闭上了眼睛开始数羊。

english: Tom didn't have enough money to pay the rent.
chinese: 汤姆没有足够的钱付租金。

english: Tom didn't need to finish that work by today.
chinese: 汤姆不必今天就完成那工作。

english: Tom didn't need to stay if he didn't want to.
chinese: 汤姆不想的话他是没必要留下的。

english: Tom didn't understand what Mary really meant.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽真实的意思。

english: Tom happened to meet Mary at the supermarket.
Tom has been learning French for a few years.
Tom has been struck by lightning three times.
chinese: 汤姆被闪电击中过三次。

english: Tom has lost his interest in studying French.
chinese: 汤姆已经对学法语不感兴趣了。

english: Tom has lost his interest in studying French.
chinese: 汤姆已经失去学习法语的兴趣。

english: Tom has never been willing to help us before.
chinese: 汤姆以前从不这样愿意幚我们。

english: Tom has spent the past three years in prison.
chinese: 汤姆在监狱里待了三年。

english: Tom is spending more and more time in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆在波士顿待得越来越久。

english: Tom is studying to become a marine biologist.
chinese: 汤姆为了当海洋生物学家学习。

english: Tom isn't nearly as smart as he thinks he is.
chinese: 汤姆并不像他自认为的那么聪明。

english: Tom likes asparagus, but his brother doesn't.
chinese: 汤姆爱吃芦笋，但是他的弟弟不爱吃。

english: Tom made a list of places he wanted to visit.
chinese: 汤姆列了他想去的地方的名单。

english: Tom refused to even listen to my suggestions.
chinese: 汤姆甚至拒绝听我的建议。

english: Tom remained standing as the others sat down.
chinese: 别人都坐下了，汤姆还站着。

english: Tom said he's going to tell us what he knows.
chinese: 汤姆说他要把他知道的告诉我们。

english: Tom says he can't figure out what Mary wants.
chinese: 汤姆说他搞不懂玛丽要的是什么。

english: Tom says that he doesn't feel like going out.
Tom seems to speak French better than before.
chinese: 汤姆讲法语好像比以前好。

english: Tom took the concert ticket Mary offered him.
chinese: 汤姆拿了玛丽给他的音乐会票。

english: Tom tricked Mary into doing his work for him.
chinese: 汤姆哄玛丽做他的作业。

english: Tom visits Mary every time he goes to Boston.
chinese: 汤姆每次去波士顿都去看玛丽。

english: Tom wants to spend more time with his family.
chinese: 汤姆想多把时间花在他的家庭上。

english: Tom was able to solve the problem by himself.
chinese: 汤姆有办法自己把问题解决了。

english: Tom was always different from other children.
chinese: 汤姆总是跟别的小孩不一样。

english: Tom was always different from the other kids.
chinese: 汤姆总是跟别的小孩不一样。

english: Tom will never willingly go there by himself.
chinese: 汤姆绝不愿意独自去那里。

english: Tom worked hard to get the work done on time.
chinese: 汤姆努力工作按时完成工作。

english: Tom's Japanese is improving little by little.
chinese: 汤姆的日语一点一点地渐渐进步中。

english: Turn off the television. I can't concentrate.
chinese: 把电视关掉。我无法专心。

english: Two hundred people died of cholera last year.
chinese: 去年有两百人因霍乱死亡。

english: Visiting a foreign country must be expensive.
Watch out for cars when you cross the street.
chinese: 当你过马路的时候要当心汽车。

english: We had a heart-to-heart talk with each other.
We have to fix the date for our trip quickly.
chinese: 我们必须快点定下旅游日期。

english: We have to put off the game till next Sunday.
chinese: 我们不得不把游戏搁到下周日了。

english: We met in 2008. A year later, we got married.
chinese: 我们在2008年相遇。一年后，我们结婚了。

english: We must learn to live in harmony with nature.
chinese: 我们必须学会与自然和谐共处。

english: We were astonished to hear what had happened.
chinese: 我们听到所发生的事，感到很惊讶。

english: We're spending the night at my uncle's house.
What do I have to do now that I'm registered?
chinese: 我注册了，现在该干什么呢？

english: What do you say to taking a walk in the park?
chinese: 去公园散步你觉得怎么样？

english: What is the difference between this and that?
What's your favorite small town in Australia?
chinese: 你最喜欢的澳大利亚的小镇是哪里呀？

english: When I first met Tom, I didn't like him much.
chinese: 我第一次见到汤姆时，我不太喜欢他。

english: When you hurt others, you also hurt yourself.
chinese: 你若是伤害别人，你也会伤害到自己。

english: Where did all that self-confidence come from?
Why did you buy such an expensive dictionary?
chinese: 为什么你买了一本那么贵的词典？

english: Why do you think that I'm thinking about you?
chinese: 你为什么会认为我在想你？

english: Would you like to have a drink before dinner?
Would you please have a look at these papers?
Write your name and address on this envelope.
chinese: 把你的姓名和地址写在这个信封上。

english: Yesterday I played tennis for the first time.
chinese: 昨天我第一次打了网球。

english: Yesterday, I read a really interesting story.
chinese: 昨天，我读到了一篇真的很有趣的故事。

english: You can see the roof of the house from there.
You didn't come to school yesterday, did you?
chinese: 你昨天没来学校, 是吗?

english: You know as well as I do that Tom hates Mary.
chinese: 你我都知道汤姆恨玛丽。

english: You may have been the last person to see Tom.
chinese: 你可能是最后一个见汤姆的人。

english: You must put an end to this foolish behavior.
chinese: 你该结束这种愚蠢的行为了。

english: You said you were in trouble. How can I help?
chinese: 你说你有困难。我能帮忙吗？

english: You should do the honorable thing and resign.
You should make better use of your free time.
chinese: 你要更好地利用闲暇时间。

english: You should make good use of this opportunity.
chinese: 你要好好把握这个时机。

english: You should put safety before everything else.
chinese: 你应该把安全放在其他一切之上。

english: You walk too fast for me to keep up with you.
You will soon get used to speaking in public.
chinese: 你很快就会习惯在公开场合讲话了。

english: You'd better keep your money for a rainy day.
You'd better take an umbrella with you today.
chinese: 你今天最好随身带把伞。

english: You'll never guess what Tom brought with him.
chinese: 你永远猜不到汤姆带来了什么。

english: Your voice reminds me of my late grandmother.
chinese: 我的声音让我想起了我已故的祖母。

english: "I never thought Tom would win." "Me neither."
"Thank you for your help." "It's my pleasure."
"Where were you?" "I was at a friend's house."
A great number of citizens went into the army.
chinese: 许多老百姓加入了军队。

english: A large pillar obstructs the view of the lake.
chinese: 巨大的柱子遮住了视线，让人看不到湖。

english: A lot of houses were washed away by the flood.
chinese: 许多房屋被洪水冲走了。

english: A true gentleman would not betray his friends.
chinese: 一个真正的绅士不会出卖他的朋友。

english: All you have to do is ask him to pay the debt.
chinese: 你只需要喊他还债就行。

english: Any emotion, if it is sincere, is involuntary.
chinese: 任何情绪，只要它是真诚的，就说明它是发自内心的自然流露。

english: Are you saying Tom's hiding something from us?
chinese: 你说Tom对我们隐藏了一些事情？

english: As soon as she opened the door, a cat ran out.
chinese: 她一开门，一只猫就跑了出来。

english: Asia is roughly four times the size of Europe.
chinese: 亚洲的大小约四倍于欧洲。

english: By the way, my English is absolutely hopeless.
chinese: 顺道一提，我的英语是绝对没有希望了。

english: Can you tell me where the nearest bus stop is?
chinese: 你能把最近的公车站指给我看吗?

english: Car exhaust causes serious pollution in towns.
chinese: 汽车尾气在城镇里造成了严重的污染。

english: Dear Santa, I want a girlfriend for Christmas.
chinese: 圣诞老人，我想要一个女朋友当圣诞礼物。

english: Dinosaurs became extinct a very long time ago.
chinese: 恐龙在很久以前灭绝了。

english: Do you know the reason why he cut class today?
chinese: 你知道为什么他今天逃课了吗？

english: Do you know the reason why the sky looks blue?
chinese: 你知道为什么天看起来这么蓝吗？

english: Do you think we'll have good weather tomorrow?
chinese: 你觉得明天会有个好天气吗？

english: Doctors refused to perform a second operation.
chinese: 医生们拒绝做第二次手术。

english: Does the letter need to be written in English?
chinese: 这封信需要用英文写吗？

english: Don't get an upset stomach by eating too much.
chinese: 不要因为吃得太多而扰乱胃的正常消化。

english: English is too difficult for me to understand.
chinese: 英语对我来说太难理解了。

english: Everybody in the building felt the earthquake.
chinese: 在建筑物里的所有人都感觉到了地震。

english: Everybody showed sympathy toward the prisoner.
chinese: 每个人都对囚犯表示同情。

english: Everybody wished he had been elected governor.
chinese: 每个人都希望他当选州长。

english: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
chinese: 对不起，我要在下一站下。

english: For a moment there, I thought he had gone mad.
chinese: 一时间我还以为他疯了。

english: Get yourself something to eat from the fridge.
chinese: 你去冰箱拿点东西吃吧。

english: Going out in this rain is out of the question.
chinese: 在雨中走出去是不可能的。

english: Having a slight headache, I went to bed early.
chinese: 因为我有点头疼，所以我早早上床睡觉。

english: He commanded me to leave the room immediately.
chinese: 他命令我立刻离开这个房间。

english: He couldn't wait to try out his new surfboard.
chinese: 他迫不及待地想试一下他的新冲浪板。

english: He doesn't have the guts to say no to my plan.
chinese: 他没那个胆拒绝我的提议。

english: He hasn't yet turned in the report this month.
chinese: 他这个月还没有提交报告书。

english: He is not as intelligent as his older brother.
chinese: 他不像他的兄长那样聪明。

english: He is the manager of the marketing department.
He looks old, but he is still in his twenties.
chinese: 他看上去老，但他还不到30岁。

english: He looks young, but actually he is over forty.
chinese: 他看起来年轻，但实际上他是四十多岁的人了。

english: He picked up a mirror and examined his tongue.
chinese: 他拿了面镜子细看自己的舌头。

english: He really loves beer and gets drunk every day.
chinese: 他喜欢喝啤酒，而且每天都喝醉。

english: He regrets not having worked harder at school.
chinese: 他后悔在校时没用功读书。

english: He taught us that Columbus discovered America.
chinese: 他教导我们说, 哥伦布发现了美洲。

english: He took it for granted that I knew the answer.
chinese: 他觉得我理所应当知道答案。

english: He was invited to be the chairman of the club.
chinese: 他受邀做俱乐部的主席。

english: He was kind enough to take me to the hospital.
chinese: 他好心地把我送到医院。

english: He was my student. Now he teaches my children.
chinese: 他曾是我的学生，现在在教我的孩子们。

english: He went to London, where he stayed for a week.
chinese: 他去了伦敦，并在那儿待了一周。

english: Her suggestion seems to have been turned down.
chinese: 她的建议好像被拒绝了。

english: His absence gave birth to all sorts of rumors.
chinese: 他的缺席导致了各种谣言的产生。

english: Honesty is the primary reason for his success.
chinese: 诚实是他成功的主要原因。

english: How late did you stay at the party last night?
chinese: 昨晚的派对你待到多晚？

english: How long did it take you to write this report?
chinese: 你写这份报告花了多长时间？

english: Hurry up, and you will be in time for the bus.
chinese: 快点，你就能准时搭上公交车了。

english: I advise you never to live beyond your income.
chinese: 我建议你永远不要入不敷出。

english: I always drink a cup of coffee in the morning.
chinese: 在早晨，我总是喝一杯咖啡。

english: I always have to wear a tie because of my job.
chinese: 因为我这份工作的缘故，我总是要打领带。

english: I always have to wear a tie because of my job.
chinese: 因为这份工作的关系，我总是要打领带。

english: I always thought that Tom was a bit different.
chinese: 我以前总认为汤姆是有一些与众不同的。

english: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
chinese: 我期待很快就能收到你的信。

english: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
I bought the book for myself, not for my wife.
chinese: 我给我自己买了书，不是给我妻子。

english: I can talk about anything with my best friend.
chinese: 我能跟我最好的朋友说任何事。

english: I can't guarantee that that's going to happen.
chinese: 我不能确保这一切会发生。

english: I can't let you give me your last ten dollars.
chinese: 你就剩下这十美圆了。我不能要。

english: I certainly wouldn't want to be seen with Tom.
chinese: 我当然不想被人看见跟汤姆在一起。

english: I did that as soon as Tom told me I needed to.
chinese: 我在汤姆告诉我我需要做时就立刻做了。

english: I didn't expect to hear back from Tom so soon.
chinese: 我没想到这么快就收到汤姆的回信。

english: I don't believe the child came to Tokyo alone.
chinese: 我不相信孩子能独自到东京。

english: I don't expect that they will support my view.
chinese: 我不期望，他们能够支持我的观点。

english: I don't feel like studying today in this heat.
chinese: 今天太热了，我没心情学习。

english: I don't have anything else I have to do today.
chinese: 我今天没有更多的事要做的了。

english: I don't know if today is Tuesday or Wednesday.
chinese: 我不知道今天是星期二还是星期三。

english: I don't know what I should be doing right now.
chinese: 我不知道，我现在应该做什么。

english: I don't think Tom has any teaching experience.
chinese: 我认为汤姆一点教学经验都没有。

english: I don't think Tom understands what's going on.
chinese: 我不认为汤姆知道正在发生甚么。

english: I don't think that I like this game very much.
chinese: 我觉得我不太喜欢这游戏。

english: I don't think we'd have any chance of winning.
I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
I fear this work will take up most of my time.
chinese: 我怕这项工作会占用我大部份的时间。

english: I feed my cat every morning and every evening.
chinese: 每天早晚，我给我的猫喂食。

english: I go to the library two or three times a week.
chinese: 我一周去图书馆两、三次。

english: I had my composition corrected by the teacher.
chinese: 我把我的作文拿给老师订正。

english: I help my mother with the housework every day.
chinese: 我每天都帮我妈做家务。

english: I know that you are learning French at school.
chinese: 我知道你在学校学法语。

english: I like cracking sunflower seeds with my teeth.
I liked Tom's first book more than the second.
chinese: 相比第二本，我更喜欢汤姆的第一本书。

english: I met him by chance on the train this morning.
chinese: 今天早上我在火车上偶遇他。

english: I met him just as he was coming out of school.
chinese: 正当他从学校回来的时候，我遇见了他。

english: I missed the opening ceremony of the Olympics.
chinese: 我错过了奥运会的开幕式。

english: I remember my mother teaching me the alphabet.
chinese: 我记得我母亲教我认字。

english: I think I shouldn't have asked Tom to do that.
chinese: 我想我不该让汤姆做那件事。

english: I think we should concentrate on other things.
chinese: 我想我们应集中于另外的事情。

english: I want you to help us find out who killed Tom.
chinese: 我想让你帮我们查出来谁杀了汤姆。

english: I was asked to show my passport at the border.
chinese: 在边境上，我被要求出示我的护照。

english: I went to the hospital to have my eyes tested.
chinese: 我到医院去检查了眼睛。

english: I will write letters to you as often as I can.
chinese: 我会尽可能多给你写信的。

english: I wish that we could spend more time together.
chinese: 我希望我们有更多时间呆在一起。

english: I would like to retract my previous statement.
chinese: 我想撤回我之前的陈述。

english: I'd like to put some things in the hotel safe.
chinese: 我想在酒店的保险柜里存点东西。

english: I'm considering studying in America next year.
chinese: 我在考虑明年去美国学习。

english: I'm not one hundred percent convinced of that.
I'm not used to drinking coffee without sugar.
I'm really looking forward to summer vacation.
I'm sending you a birthday present by airmail.
chinese: 我寄给你一个航空邮件生日礼物。

english: I'm stuck here in Boston because of the storm.
If anything should happen, please let me know.
chinese: 如果发生了什么事，请告诉我。

english: If it happened to Tom, it could happen to you.
chinese: 如果那发生在Tom身上，也可能会发生在你身上。

english: If you don't want to do it, you don't have to.
chinese: 如果你不想的话也没问题。

english: Imagination affects every aspect of our lives.
chinese: 想像力影响着我们生活的各个方面。

english: In Japan, the new school year begins in April.
chinese: 日本的新学年在四月开始。

english: In the United States, school buses are yellow.
Is it true Tom wants to paint his house green?
chinese: 汤姆想把房子漆成绿色，是真的吗？

english: Is this the first time you've seen this movie?
chinese: 这是你第一次看这部电影吗?

english: It is difficult for me to answer the question.
chinese: 这个问题对我来讲很难回答。

english: It is important for old people to stay strong.
It is like looking for a needle in a haystack.
It was not long before we met again by chance.
chinese: 没多久，我们又碰巧遇到了。

english: It's been ten years since I came to this town.
It's next to impossible to finish it in a day.
chinese: 在一天之内完成它几乎是不可能的。

english: It's time you went to bed. Turn off the radio.
chinese: 你该上床了。把收音机关了。

english: J.F. Kennedy was buried in Arlington Cemetery.
chinese: 约翰甘迺迪被安葬在阿灵顿公墓。

english: Jazz fusion is a combination of rock and jazz.
chinese: 融合爵士是摇滚乐与爵士乐的融合。

english: Just pull the door shut. It'll lock by itself.
chinese: 只要推门就好了。它自己会锁上的。

english: Life begins when we realize who we really are.
chinese: 当我们明白真正的自己时，生活开始了。

english: Many Asians have English as a common language.
chinese: 许多亚洲人以英语作为共用的语言。

english: Mary hardly ever talks to her husband anymore.
chinese: 玛丽几乎不再跟她老公说话。

english: Most people only want to hear their own truth.
chinese: 大部分人只想听到他们自己的真理。

english: My brother loves taking pictures of mountains.
chinese: 我弟弟很喜欢拍山的照片。

english: My friend asked me if I was feeling all right.
chinese: 我朋友问我是不是觉得还好。

english: My grandmother mailed the letter this morning.
chinese: 今天早上我祖母寄出了这封信。

english: My mother looked at me with tears in her eyes.
My mother made us cheese sandwiches for lunch.
chinese: 妈妈为我们做了乳酪三明治当午餐。

english: Neither of those two students passed the test.
chinese: 两个学生都没通过考试。

english: No matter what I do, she says I can do better.
chinese: 不管我做什么，她都说我能做得更好。

english: No matter what I do, she says I can do better.
chinese: 不论我做什么，她都说我能做得更好。

english: Only then did he realize he had been deceived.
chinese: 直到那时，他才意识到他已经上当受骗。

english: Our restaurant is better than that restaurant.
chinese: 我们的饭店比那家饭店好。

english: Our ultimate goal is to establish world peace.
chinese: 我们的究极目标是树立世界和平。

english: Put this jacket on, and you'll be much warmer.
chinese: 穿上外套吧！你会暖一些。

english: Remember to mail this letter tomorrow morning.
chinese: 明天早上记得去寄这封信。

english: Respect for law is fundamental to our society.
chinese: 尊重法律是我们社会的基础。

english: Russia is facing great financial difficulties.
chinese: 俄罗斯面临着严重的财政困难。

english: School was closed for the day due to the snow.
She has been absent from school for five days.
She is busy at present and can't speak to you.
chinese: 她现在忙，不能跟你说话。

english: She is busy at present and can't speak to you.
chinese: 她现在忙，没有办法跟您说话。

english: She is busy at present and can't speak to you.
chinese: 她现在忙，没有办法跟你们说话。

english: She is proud that her son has become a doctor.
chinese: 她为自己的儿子成为医生而自豪。

english: She looks young, but in reality she's over 40.
chinese: 她看起来是年轻的，但实际上她四十多岁了。

english: She loved me in the same way that I loved her.
chinese: 她爱我就像我爱她一样。

english: She made elaborate preparations for the party.
chinese: 她精心筹备了这个派对。

english: She spends a lot of time practicing the piano.
She will give her picture to whoever wants it.
chinese: 她会把她的照片给想要的人。

english: She wrote to her parents at least once a week.
chinese: 他给父母写信至少一周一次。

english: She's only interested in fish and cockroaches.
chinese: 她只对鱼和蟑螂感兴趣。

english: Slight inattention can cause a great disaster.
Some say that China was like a Russian colony.
chinese: 有人说中国像是俄国的殖民地。

english: Thanks to a cold summer, beer has sold poorly.
chinese: 多亏了冷夏，啤酒卖的不好。

english: That boy over there is probably Tom's brother.
chinese: 那边的那个男孩很可能是汤姆的兄弟。

english: That can't be Mary. She's in the hospital now.
chinese: 那不可能是玛丽，她现在在医院。

english: That was the first time I'd seen Tom so angry.
chinese: 那是我第一次见到汤姆如此生气。

english: The Second World War lasted from 1939 to 1945.
chinese: 第二次世界大战从1939年持续到1945年。

english: The accident happened on Sunday at about 3:00.
chinese: 此事故发生在周日3点左右。

english: The air is bad here. Will you open the window?
chinese: 这里的空气不是很好。你可以打开窗户吗？

english: The baby was fast asleep in her mother's arms.
chinese: 孩子在母亲的怀中熟睡。

english: The black telephone costs more than the white.
chinese: 黑的电话比白的花钱多。

english: The dog followed its master, wagging its tail.
The family is eating breakfast on the balcony.
chinese: 一家人在阳台上吃早饭。

english: The living room furniture was modern in style.
The living room in my new house is very large.
The meeting has been postponed until tomorrow.
chinese: 会议已经被延迟到明天了。

english: The moon landing was a monumental achievement.
chinese: 登月是一项里程碑式的成就。

english: The more books you read, the more you'll know.
chinese: 你看的书越多，你知道的越多。

english: The participants were for the most part women.
The picnic was called off because of the rain.
The poor child was on the verge of starvation.
chinese: 那可怜的孩子快饿死了。

english: The potato was so hot that it burned my mouth.
chinese: 土豆太热，以至于烫到了我的嘴。

english: The red flag indicated the presence of danger.
The revolution has brought about many changes.
chinese: 这场革命已经带来了很多改变。

english: The runner jumped over the hole in the ground.
chinese: 那个赛跑运动员跃过了地面上的洞。

english: The store can supply us with anything we need.
chinese: 这家商店可以提供所有我们需要的东西。

english: The storm had a serious effect on the economy.
chinese: 这场暴风雪已经对经济造成了很严重的影响。

english: The story of Tom and Mary is very interesting.
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽的故事真有意思！

english: The young man put out his hand and I shook it.
chinese: 年轻人伸出他的手，接着我和他握了手。

english: Their traditional life style no longer exists.
chinese: 他们传统的生活方式不再存在。

english: There has been a good apple harvest this year.
There is no scientific basis for these claims.
chinese: 这些主张没有科学的根据。

english: There were so many things I wanted to ask Tom.
They arrived in Osaka at the beginning of May.
They both cried after hearing the tragic news.
chinese: 听到这件悲剧，他俩尽皆哭泣。

english: They would capture as many people as possible.
chinese: 他们会尽可能地抓更多的人。

english: This car was so cheap that he could afford it.
chinese: 这车便宜得让他能买得起。

english: This dictionary isn't the most recent version.
chinese: 这本字典不是最新版的。

english: This is the house I lived in when I was young.
chinese: 这是我年轻时候住的房子。

english: This is the man who's suspected by the police.
chinese: 这是被警察认为有嫌疑的男子。

english: This is the nicest present I've ever received.
chinese: 这是我得到过的最好的礼物。

english: This is the place where the battle took place.
This mountain is snow-covered the entire year.
This plan will be very expensive to carry out.
chinese: 这计划执行起来花销会很大。

english: This statement is actually kind of suspicious.
chinese: 这种说法其实有点可疑。

english: Thousands of people wanted to know the answer.
chinese: 成千上万的人想要知道答案。

english: To my surprise, he easily came up with a plan.
chinese: 令我吃惊的是，他很容易就想出了一个方案。

english: Tom bent down and picked up a handful of sand.
chinese: 汤姆弯下腰，捧起了一把沙子。

english: Tom bought this camera for a reasonable price.
chinese: Tom用合理的价格买了相机。

english: Tom cleared his throat and continued to speak.
chinese: 汤姆咳嗽了一下然后接着讲。

english: Tom couldn't think of a good place to hide it.
chinese: 汤姆想不到个好地方藏它。

english: Tom didn't tell me he didn't know how to swim.
chinese: 汤姆没有告诉我他不会游泳。

english: Tom doesn't have any friends who like camping.
chinese: 汤姆没有喜欢露营的朋友。

english: Tom doesn't know whether Mary is happy or not.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽是高兴呢，还是不高兴。

english: Tom had no idea that Mary was a serial killer.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽是个连环杀手。

english: Tom had no intention of giving Mary any money.
chinese: 汤姆不想给玛丽一分钱。

english: Tom has admitted that he was there that night.
chinese: 汤姆承认他那晚是在那里。

english: Tom has already been told to leave Mary alone.
chinese: 汤姆已经被告知别再打搅玛丽了。

english: Tom has something very important to tell Mary.
chinese: 汤姆有很重要的事要告诉玛丽。

english: Tom is the one that told us about the problem.
chinese: 汤姆是告诉我们这个问题的人。

english: Tom is waiting for you in the conference room.
Tom knows I want to leave as soon as possible.
chinese: 汤姆知道我想尽早离开。

english: Tom made up his mind to become a newspaperman.
Tom probably knows how to get to Mary's house.
chinese: 汤姆大概知道要怎么去玛莉家吧。

english: Tom said he didn't want to waste time arguing.
chinese: 汤姆说他不想把时间浪费在争论上。

english: Tom said he's glad Mary has finally graduated.
chinese: 汤姆说他很高兴玛丽毕业了。

english: Tom said that he didn't like air conditioning.
Tom should've already discussed that with you.
chinese: 汤姆应该已经跟你讨论过那事了。

english: Tom studied hard so he could get into college.
chinese: 汤姆为了上大学努力学习。

english: Tom thinks I'm missing this great opportunity.
chinese: 汤姆觉得我要错过这大好机会了。

english: Tom told me he doesn't like carbonated drinks.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他不喜欢碳酸饮料。

english: Tom told me that he didn't want to go with us.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他不想跟我们走。

english: Tom told me that he'd like to become a doctor.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他想当医生。

english: Tom waited for Mary in front of the warehouse.
Tom was a little overweight when he was a kid.
chinese: 汤姆在小时候有点超重。

english: Tom was bleeding heavily from a gunshot wound.
chinese: 汤姆的枪伤伤口导致了大出血。

english: Tom was the one who suggested that I buy this.
chinese: 汤姆是建议我买这个的人。

english: Tom wondered why there was a dog in his house.
chinese: 汤姆奇怪为什么他的房子里有只狗。

english: Tom wrung out the towel and hung it up to dry.
chinese: 汤姆拧干毛巾挂起来晾干。

english: UK is the abbreviation for the United Kingdom.
Unfortunately, the telephone was out of order.
We are spending the night at my uncle's house.
We haven't finished eating the watermelon yet.
chinese: 我们还没吃完这个西瓜。

english: We were very sorry that we couldn't help them.
chinese: 我们很遗憾无法帮助他们。

english: What Tom said doesn't apply in this situation.
What makes you think I won't be able to do it?
What subject do you think he is interested in?
chinese: 你觉得他会对什么主题感兴趣？

english: What's so fun about taking pictures of trains?
chinese: 拍火车的照片什么的，有什么好玩的呀？

english: When I was young, I used to climb trees a lot.
When Tom found out about that, he was furious.
chinese: 当汤姆发现这件事时，他很生气。

english: When she was thirteen, she ran away from home.
chinese: 她十三岁的时候离家出走了。

english: When she was three years old, her father died.
chinese: 她父亲在她三岁时死了。

english: When was the last time you watered the garden?
chinese: 你最后一次给花园浇水在什么时候？

english: Where did you get the money to buy that dress?
chinese: 你从哪儿弄来的钱去买那件衣服？

english: Where is the United Airlines check-in counter?
chinese: 联合航空公司办理登机手续的柜台在哪里？

english: Why didn't you tell Tom that you were married?
chinese: 你为什么不告诉汤姆你已经结婚了？

english: Will you pick me up at seven tomorrow morning?
Will you put down that paper and listen to me?
chinese: 你能放下报纸听我说吗？

english: You must get the job done before the deadline.
chinese: 你必须在到期前完成这项工作。

english: You need a large vocabulary to read that book.
chinese: 你读那本书需要大量词汇。

english: You need to have friends who can help you out.
chinese: 你需要可以帮助你的朋友。

english: You should pay more attention to his warnings.
chinese: 你应该多注意他的警告。

english: You should pay more attention to what you say.
chinese: 你应该更注意你说的话。

english: You should read many books when you are young.
chinese: 当你年轻的时候, 你应该多读点儿书。

english: You should read many books when you are young.
You should've introduced yourself to the girl.
chinese: 你应该向那个女孩自我介绍的。

english: You were the one who told me it was safe here.
chinese: 你是告诉我这里很安全的人。

english: You'd better wear a sweater under your jacket.
chinese: 您最好在外衣里穿一件套衫。

english: You're just running away from life's problems.
You're too old to be doing this kind of thing.
chinese: 你太老了，做不得这种事了。

english: "A rolling stone gathers no moss" is a proverb.
"Thank you for helping me." "Don't mention it."
A cafeteria is a self-service style restaurant.
chinese: 自助餐厅是一种自助式的餐厅。

english: A devastating earthquake hit the state capital.
chinese: 一场毁灭性的地震袭击了这个州的首府。

english: A fire broke out in my neighborhood last night.
A friend of mine came to see me during the day.
chinese: 我的一个朋友在白天的时候来看我。

english: A good cook doesn't throw out yesterday's soup.
chinese: 一个好的厨师不会丢掉昨天的汤。

english: A permanent job is better than a temporary one.
A strange sound was heard from behind the door.
chinese: 奇怪的声音从门后传来。

english: A truck was standing in the middle of the road.
A tsunami is coming, so please be on the alert.
After the revolution, France became a republic.
chinese: 革命之后，法国成为了一个共和国。

english: All our teachers were young and loved teaching.
chinese: 我们所有的老师都很年轻并且喜爱教学。

english: All the guests were touched by her hospitality.
chinese: 所有的客人都被她的好客感动了。

english: All you have to do is to take care of yourself.
chinese: 你要做的只是照顾好你自己。

english: An angle of 90 degrees is called a right angle.
Are you sure you don't want me to say anything?
chinese: 你确定要我什么都不说？

english: As far as I'm concerned, things are going well.
At what age did you have your first girlfriend?
chinese: 你几岁交了第一个女朋友？

english: Between you and me, I think our boss is stupid.
chinese: 我觉得我们老板很蠢，这我就只跟你说。

english: Can you explain the exact meaning of this word?
chinese: 你能否说出这个词的精确意思?

english: Can you please tell me where the restaurant is?
chinese: 请问您能告诉我那家餐馆在哪吗？

english: Children of six and above should attend school.
chinese: 六岁及以上的小孩应该上学。

english: Cities are exciting places, but also stressful.
chinese: 城市是令人兴奋的地方，但也会让人产生压力。

english: Did you enjoy yourself at the party last night?
chinese: 你在昨晚的聚会上尽兴了吗？

english: Did you go anywhere during the summer vacation?
chinese: 这个暑假你有去哪儿玩吗?

english: Did you have to get up very early this morning?
chinese: 你今天必须起得很早吗？

english: Do you ever dream about flying through the sky?
chinese: 你曾经梦想在天空飞翔吗？

english: Do you know if Tom has spoken to Mary recently?
chinese: 你知不知道最近汤姆跟玛丽说过话没有？

english: Do you know whether or not it'll rain tomorrow?
chinese: 您是否知道，明天会不会下雨？

english: Do you think the weather will be fine tomorrow?
chinese: 你觉得明天天气会变好吗？

english: Does this letter have to be written in English?
chinese: 这封信必须用英文写吗?

english: Don't ask her any questions about her marriage.
chinese: 不要问她任何有关婚姻的问题。

english: Don't worry. I told you everything would be OK.
chinese: 别担心，我和你说过一切都会好的。

english: Even if I knew the answer, I wouldn't tell you.
chinese: 即使我知道答案，我也不会告诉你。

english: Even if I were rich, I wouldn't give him money.
chinese: 就算我富有，我也不会给他钱。

english: Even with all the money he has, he isn't happy.
chinese: 尽管他有那么多钱，他并不快乐。

english: Every time I read the Bible, I am deeply moved.
chinese: 每次我读圣经都会被深深地感动。

english: Everyone knew that Tom could speak French well.
chinese: 每个人都知道汤姆的法语很好。

english: Friends are like flowers in the garden of life.
chinese: 朋友就像生命之园里的花朵。

english: Have you still not finished paying for my bike?
chinese: 你还没有为我的自行车付完款吗？

english: He amazed everyone by passing his driving test.
chinese: 他通过驾驶考试的事让每一个人都觉得惊讶。

english: He became a member of this club five years ago.
chinese: 他在五年前成为了这个俱乐部的成员。

english: He brought me coffee, when I had asked for tea.
chinese: 我要的是茶，而他却给了我一杯咖啡。

english: He couldn't stand the bitterness of the coffee.
He got into this school in September last year.
chinese: 他去年九月进了这所学校。

english: He is always a little irritable in the morning.
chinese: 他早上总是有点脾气暴躁。

english: He lied to me. That is why I am angry with him.
chinese: 他对我说了谎，这就是为什么我生他的气了。

english: He proposed a reform in the educational system.
chinese: 他提议对教育系统进行改革。

english: He rescued the dog at the risk of his own life.
chinese: 他冒着生命危险救了那条狗。

english: He said that he gets up at 6 o'clock every day.
chinese: 他说他每天早上六点起床。

english: He should have the right to decide for himself.
chinese: 他应该有权利去自己做决定。

english: He spent his sixtieth birthday in the hospital.
chinese: 他在医院里过了六十岁生日。

english: He was unsure how he would get there, and when.
chinese: 他不知道怎么到那里去、什么时候到。

english: He went to the United States to study medicine.
He's very influential in the world of medicine.
chinese: 他在医学界有很大的影响力。

english: How about eating out this evening for a change?
chinese: 你说今晚改变一下，去外面吃晚饭怎么样？

english: How do you get your children to eat vegetables?
chinese: 你怎样让你的孩子们吃蔬菜？

english: How long can it be kept going with 100 dollars?
How many books do you think you've read so far?
chinese: 到目前为止，你认为你阅读过多少书籍？

english: I am not used to drinking coffee without sugar.
I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.
chinese: 没有你我无法做到，谢谢。

english: I didn't know that you didn't know how to swim.
I didn't know that you were watching something.
I didn't tell anyone what time I'd be arriving.
chinese: 我没跟别人说过我什么时候会到。

english: I don't know anything about their relationship.
chinese: 我对他们的关系一无所知。

english: I don't see any reason why I have to apologize.
chinese: 我没发现任何我该道歉的理由。

english: I don't think Tom is going to be too much help.
chinese: 我认为汤姆帮不上大忙。

english: I felt cold and uncomfortable the entire night.
chinese: 我整个晚上觉得又冷又不舒服。

english: I found a taxi, but there was no driver inside.
chinese: 我找到了一辆出租车，但里面却没有司机。

english: I got up early enough to catch the first train.
chinese: 我起了个大早为了赶第一班火车。

english: I had no idea there'd be this many people here.
chinese: 我没想到这里有这么多人。

english: I have to go shopping. I'll be back in an hour.
chinese: 我该去买东西了，我一小时后回来。

english: I haven't had time to look for what you wanted.
chinese: 我没时间找你想要的东西。

english: I just wish we could leave this horrible place.
chinese: 我只是希望我们能离开这个可怕的地方。

english: I know that I know it, but I can't remember it.
chinese: 我知道我知道它，但我想不起来了。

english: I like children. That's why I became a teacher.
chinese: 我喜欢孩子。这就是为什么我成为了教师。

english: I like swimming, but I don't like to swim here.
chinese: 我喜欢游泳，但我不想在这里游。

english: I ran as fast as possible to catch up with him.
I recognized some of the tunes that Tom played.
chinese: 我认出了一些汤姆演奏的调子。

english: I stayed home all day instead of going to work.
chinese: 我没有去工作，在家里待了一整天。

english: I suspect they water down the beer in that pub.
chinese: 我怀疑那家酒馆的啤酒兑水了。

english: I told you not to mention that in her presence.
chinese: 我跟你说过她在的时候不要说这件事。

english: I took it for granted that you were on my side.
chinese: 我理所当然认为你会站在我这边。

english: I took my shoes off and put them under the bed.
chinese: 我把鞋脱了，然后将它们放在床下。

english: I would like to sit in the non-smoking section.
I'm glad that I didn't buy something like this.
chinese: 我很高兴没有买这样的东西。

english: I'm sorry that I have kept you waiting so long.
chinese: 让您等了很久，我很抱歉。

english: I'm sure Tom won't have any trouble finding us.
chinese: 我确定汤姆找到我们没有任何问题。

english: I'm surprised you agreed to have lunch with me.
chinese: 我很讶异你愿意和我一起吃午餐。

english: I'm under so much pressure, I just want to cry.
I've never known anyone as hypocritical as you.
chinese: 我从来没有见过谁像你这么虚伪的。

english: If I had taken that plane, I would be dead now.
chinese: 要是我坐了那架飞机的话，我现在早就死了。

english: If he knew her phone number, he could call her.
chinese: 如果他知道她的电话，他会打给她。

english: If it rains tomorrow, I won't go to the picnic.
chinese: 如果明天下雨的话，我就不去野餐了。

english: If she had married you, she would be happy now.
chinese: 如果她和你结婚了，她现在会很幸福。

english: If you don't hurry, you'll miss the last train.
chinese: 再不快点你就要赶不上末班车了。

english: If you eat that much, you'll get a stomachache.
chinese: 那么吃的话，肚子会吃坏的噢。

english: In a way you're right, but I still have doubts.
chinese: 在某种程度上你是对的，但我还是有疑问。

english: India gained independence from Britain in 1947.
chinese: 印度于1947年脱离英国获得独立。

english: Is there anything you want that you don't have?
chinese: 有什么你想要但是没有的东西吗？

english: Is this ladder strong enough to bear my weight?
chinese: 这个梯子是否足够坚固以承受我的重量？

english: It cost him 50 dollars to rent a car in Hawaii.
chinese: 他花了50美元在夏威夷租了一辆汽车。

english: It has always been a pleasure to work with you.
It is a pity that you cannot come to the party.
It was a bag that I lost in the room yesterday.
chinese: 那是我昨天落在房间里的包。

english: It was very kind of you to lend me an umbrella.
It's dangerous to fool around with electricity.
It's easy to see the fireworks from over there.
chinese: 从那儿很容易就能看到焰火。

english: It's not easy writing a love letter in English.
Like it or not, we have to attend that meeting.
chinese: 不管喜不喜欢，我们都得参加那个会议。

english: Losing one's health is worse than losing money.
chinese: 丧失健康比丧失金钱更糟糕。

english: Married people sometimes wish they were single.
chinese: 已婚的人有时候希望他们是单身，。

english: May I be the first to offer my congratulations.
Moderate exercise is necessary for good health.
chinese: 适度运动对身体健康是必要的。

english: More and more people are moving to urban areas.
chinese: 越来越多的人迁往市区。

english: My sister can play the piano better than I can.
chinese: 我妹妹钢琴可以弹得比我好。

english: News of the recent blast is all over the radio.
chinese: 收音机广播充斥著有关最近爆炸的新闻。

english: No matter what happens, I won't change my mind.
chinese: 无论发生什么我都不会改主意的。

english: One million people lost their lives in the war.
Our country must develop its natural resources.
chinese: 我们国家必须开发自然资源。

english: Please give me some advice on what I should do.
chinese: 请给我提提建议，我该做什么。

english: Please turn off the light before you go to bed.
Politicians never tell us their inner thoughts.
chinese: 政治家从来不告诉我们他们的别有用心。

english: Prices are double what they were ten years ago.
Prices are double what they were two years ago.
Scientists haven't found a cure for cancer yet.
chinese: 科学家们还不知道怎么治疗癌症。

english: Scientists haven't found a cure for cancer yet.
chinese: 科学家们还没有找到癌症的治疗方法。

english: She is always finding fault with her neighbors.
She looks young, but she's actually over forty.
chinese: 她看起来是年轻的，但实际上她四十多岁了。

english: She said that she gets up at six every morning.
chinese: 她说她每天早上六点起床。

english: She spent a good deal of money on her vacation.
chinese: 她休假期间花了一大笔钱。

english: She succeeded in getting him to tell the truth.
chinese: 她成功地从他口中得知了真相。

english: She will be the first Japanese woman astronaut.
chinese: 她将会成为日本第一个女性太空人。

english: She's not a full-time employee of this company.
chinese: 她不是这间公司正式的职员。

english: Sometimes things that happen do not make sense.
chinese: 有时候，发生的事情并不是合情合理的。

english: The accident happened the day before yesterday.
The area of the factory is 1,000 square meters.
The armed forces occupied the entire territory.
The baby was sound asleep in her mother's arms.
chinese: 孩子在母亲的怀中熟睡。

english: The company's going to go bankrupt really soon.
The dress that Mary is wearing looks expensive.
chinese: 玛丽穿的衣服看起来价格不菲。

english: The explosion that followed killed many people.
chinese: 很多人在随后的爆炸中死去。

english: The girl was afraid to jump down from the roof.
chinese: 小女孩害怕从屋顶上跳下来。

english: The house I bought is pretty far from downtown.
chinese: 我买的房子离市中心比较远。

english: The leaves will turn red in two or three weeks.
chinese: 再过两三周，树叶就会变红吧。

english: The man is loading the moving truck on his own.
chinese: 这个男人独自把东西搬上搬家卡车上。

english: The man reading a paper over there is my uncle.
chinese: 在那儿看报纸的男人是我叔叔。

english: The older we become, the worse our memory gets.
chinese: 我们越老，记忆力就越差。

english: The people were evacuated because of the flood.
chinese: 人们因为洪水被疏散了。

english: The policeman arrested him for drunken driving.
chinese: 警察因酒后驾驶逮捕了他。

english: The policeman captured the man who was running.
chinese: 警察抓了正在跑的那个男人。

english: The precise time of their arrival is not known.
chinese: 他们到达的确切时间还不明。

english: The recent advances in medicine are remarkable.
chinese: 医学的最新进展颇为显著。

english: The space race was an exciting time in history.
chinese: 太空跑步是历史上激动人心的时刻。

english: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
chinese: 太阳从东边升起，西边落下。

english: The teacher assembled the students in the hall.
chinese: 老师在礼堂把学生们集合起来。

english: The teacher told them not to swim in the river.
chinese: 老师跟他们说，叫他们别在河里游泳。

english: The traffic accident deprived him of his sight.
chinese: 这场交通意外让他失明了。

english: There aren't that many synagogues in this city.
chinese: 这座城犹太教堂不怎么多。

english: There aren't that many synagogues in this city.
chinese: 这座城的犹太教堂不是很多。

english: There is no denying that she is very efficient.
chinese: 无可否认她非常有能力。

english: There must be some misunderstanding between us.
There was nothing that I could do at that time.
There's nothing better than taking a nice walk.
chinese: 没有什么比散步更好的了。

english: They attempted to break through the enemy line.
chinese: 他们试图冲破敌军防线。

english: They buried him in the graveyard by the church.
chinese: 他们把他埋葬在教堂旁的墓园。

english: They demanded the king be put to death at once.
chinese: 他们要求马上把国王处死。

english: They're required to work eight hours every day.
chinese: 他们每天必须工作8小时。

english: This carpet is superior to that one in quality.
chinese: 这地毯在质量上比那个好得多。

english: This river is three times longer than that one.
This ship is too big to pass through the canal.
chinese: 这艘船太大，没法通过运河。

english: Those records are not accessible to the public.
chinese: 这些记录不对公众开放。

english: Thousands of foreigners visit Japan every year.
chinese: 每年有成千上万的外国人访问日本。

english: Tom added both his and Mary's name to the list.
chinese: 汤姆将他自己和玛丽的名字添加到了名单上。

english: Tom always gets lost if he doesn't carry a map.
chinese: 汤姆每次要是不带地图的话就会迷路。

english: Tom and I aren't friends. We're just coworkers.
chinese: 汤姆跟我不是朋友，我们只是同事。

english: Tom asked for Mary's permission to leave early.
chinese: 汤姆请玛丽允许他早走。

english: Tom begged his father to buy him a new bicycle.
chinese: 汤姆求他父亲给他买新自行车。

english: Tom came over to my house for dinner yesterday.
chinese: 汤姆昨天来我家吃晚饭。

english: Tom checked the TV schedule to see what was on.
chinese: 汤姆检查电视时间表，看看在上映什么。

english: Tom could've figured that out without any help.
chinese: 汤姆能不依靠任何帮助解决那事。

english: Tom did better this time than he did last time.
chinese: 汤姆这次做得比上次好。

english: Tom didn't let his children go to Mary's party.
chinese: 汤姆没有让他的孩子们去玛莉的派对。

english: Tom folded the paper before handing it to Mary.
chinese: 在传给玛丽之前，汤姆把纸条折了起来。

english: Tom has no friends who are willing to help him.
chinese: 汤姆没有愿意帮助他的朋友。

english: Tom hasn't yet told us what he wants us to buy.
chinese: 汤姆还没对我们说他希望我们买什么呢。

english: Tom is trying to figure out how to do that now.
chinese: 汤姆现在正在想办法去做那件事。

english: Tom is used to getting up early in the morning.
Tom isn't doing what he's supposed to be doing.
chinese: 汤姆没有在做他该做的事。

english: Tom knows you better than he knows anyone else.
chinese: 汤姆对你的了解比对其他人都清楚。

english: Tom might be here by 2:30, but then, maybe not.
chinese: tom 两点半可能会到，不过，也可能不会

english: Tom probably wouldn't do something that stupid.
chinese: 汤姆应该不会做那么蠢的事。

english: Tom said he thought Mary was unhappy in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆说他以为玛丽在波士顿不快乐。

english: Tom said he wasn't sure what Mary wanted to do.
chinese: 汤姆说他不确定玛丽想做什么。

english: Tom said that he didn't have any classes today.
Tom said that he's considered quitting his job.
Tom sketched a picture of an elephant for Mary.
chinese: 汤姆给玛丽画了大象的素描。

english: Tom tried to convince Mary to knit him a scarf.
chinese: 汤姆想说服玛丽给他织一条围巾。

english: Tom turned right when he should've turned left.
chinese: 汤姆本该往左转却往右转了。

english: Tom wanted to follow in his father's footsteps.
chinese: 汤姆想追随他父亲的脚步。

english: Tom wanted to know where he could buy turmeric.
chinese: 汤姆想知道哪里能买到姜黄。

english: Tom wants to know if you have time to help him.
chinese: Tom想知道你是否有时间帮助他。

english: Tom was arrested for driving without a license.
chinese: 汤姆因无证驾驶而被逮捕。

english: Tom was the one that told us about the problem.
chinese: 汤姆是告诉我们问题的人。

english: Tom whispered something to Mary and she smiled.
chinese: 汤姆小声对玛丽说了什么，玛丽笑了。

english: Tom will be the first person to enter the cave.
chinese: 汤姆将会是第一个进入那洞穴的人。

english: Tom worked very hard and earned a lot of money.
chinese: 汤姆努力工作挣了好多钱。

english: Under no circumstances must you leave the room.
chinese: 在任何情况下你都不能离开这个房间。

english: We are having a serious talk about your future.
chinese: 我们在严肃地谈论你的未来。

english: We didn't have computers when I was growing up.
chinese: 我小时候的时候还没有电脑。

english: We have two dogs, three cats, and six chickens.
chinese: 我们养了两只狗、三只猫和六只鸡。

english: We made good time until we ran into a blizzard.
chinese: 我们路上一帆风顺，直到遇上暴风雪。

english: We need to talk about that as soon as possible.
chinese: 我们需要尽早谈论那件事。

english: We often watch TV while we're eating breakfast.
chinese: 我们常在吃早饭时看电视。

english: We promised to stand by him in case of trouble.
chinese: 我们承诺万一他有麻烦的时候支持他。

english: We were just talking about you when you called.
chinese: 当你打电话来时, 我们正在谈论你。

english: We'll have lived here for two years next April.
chinese: 到明年四月我们住在这儿就满两年了。

english: What souvenir do you think she would like most?
chinese: 你觉得她最想要什么纪念品？

english: What time was it when you entered the building?
chinese: 你进这幢楼的时候是几点？

english: What would you do if you had a million dollars?
chinese: 你有100万美元的话，你会做什么？

english: What's your favorite game to play with friends?
chinese: 你最喜欢和朋友玩什么游戏？

english: When he finished speaking, everyone was silent.
chinese: 他发言完后，大家陷入了沉默。

english: When you pose a question, you expect an answer.
chinese: 当你提出一个问题，你期望得到答案。

english: Whenever I hear that song, I remember my youth.
chinese: 每次听到这首歌，都会让我回忆起自己年轻的时候。

english: Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
chinese: 你今天下午想不想去动物园？

english: Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
chinese: 您今天下午想不想去动物园？

english: Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
chinese: 你们今天下午想不想去动物园？

english: Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
chinese: 今天下午你想去动物园吗?

english: You can ask the child who's playing over there.
chinese: 你可以问在那里玩耍的小孩。

english: You don't have to help us if you don't want to.
chinese: 如果你们不想帮我们可以不用帮。

english: You don't need to be afraid of making mistakes.
You like to talk about architecture, don't you?
chinese: 你喜欢讨论建筑，不是吗？

english: You ought to ask for your teacher's permission.
chinese: 你应该请求你的老师允许。

english: You should keep your valuables in a safe place.
chinese: 你该把你的值钱物品保存在一个安全的地方。

english: You should set a good example to your children.
chinese: 你应该给你的孩子们树立好的榜样。

english: You should've rejected such an unfair proposal.
chinese: 你本该拒绝一个那么不公平的提议。

english: You work too hard these days. Aren't you tired?
chinese: 这些天你工作太多了。你不累吗？

english: You'll get used to this in three or four weeks.
chinese: 你在三或四周内就会习惯。

english: You'll have to play it by ear at the interview.
chinese: 在面试的时候你必须见机行事。

english: Young children are often fascinated by science.
chinese: 小孩常常对科学很有热情。

english: A bicycle will rust if you leave it in the rain.
chinese: 如果你把自行车留在雨中，它会生锈的。

english: A cooking course should be mandatory in schools.
chinese: 烹饪课程应该作为学校的必修课。

english: A detective arrived upon the scene of the crime.
chinese: 一名警探到达了犯罪现场。

english: A stranger is just a friend you haven't met yet.
chinese: 所谓陌生人，只是还未相见的友人而已。

english: About how long will it take to get there by bus?
chinese: 搭公车到那里大约要花多久的时间？

english: After the accident, Tom decided to stop skating.
chinese: 事故过后，汤姆觉得停止滑冰了。

english: An old man was resting in the shade of the tree.
chinese: 一个老人在树荫下休息。

english: Apart from some fruit, he hasn't eaten anything.
chinese: 除了水果，他什么都没吃。

english: Are there any English magazines in this library?
chinese: 这间图书馆有任何英语杂志吗?

english: Are you closer to your mother or to your father?
chinese: 你和爸爸更亲还是妈妈更亲？

english: Are you planning on eating that all by yourself?
chinese: 你打算自己一人把它全部吃了吗？

english: At that time, I was still taking French lessons.
chinese: 那个时候，我还在上法语课。

english: Between you and me, what is your opinion of her?
chinese: 你就只告诉我一个人，你对她的意见如何？

english: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
chinese: 早饭是一天中最重要的一顿饭。

english: By the way, did you hear that Mary quit her job?
chinese: 话说，你听说玛丽辞职了吗？

english: Can you tell me how to get to the train station?
chinese: 你可以告诉我如何到火车站吗?

english: Can you tell me how to get to the train station?
chinese: 你可以告诉我要怎么去火车站吗?

english: Could you please speak a little bit more slowly?
Could you please tell me again why you are late?
chinese: 你能再向我解释一遍你为什么迟到了吗？

english: Did you have a good time on your trip to London?
Did you have any difficulty in finding my house?
chinese: 你找我的房子有困难吗？

english: Do you know if my father is still in the office?
chinese: 你知道我父亲是否还在办公室吗？

english: Do you know the difference between good and bad?
Do you play any instrument other than the piano?
chinese: 除了钢琴以外，还会玩什么乐器吗？

english: Do you think you could make a little less noise?
chinese: 你觉得你能少发点噪音吗？

english: Don't you think it's strange that he's not here?
chinese: 他不在这儿你不觉得这很奇怪吗？

english: English is a language spoken all over the world.
chinese: 英语是一种全世界通用的语言。

english: Even with all his wealth and fame, he's unhappy.
chinese: 尽管有金钱和名誉，他还是不幸福。

english: Even with his glasses, he doesn't see very well.
chinese: 他就算带了眼镜也看得不很清楚。

english: Every time I went to his place, he was studying.
chinese: 每次我去他住处，他都在读书。

english: Everybody knew that Tom could speak French well.
chinese: 每个人都知道汤姆的法语很好。

english: Everyone but Tom knew he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: Everyone knows that Bell invented the telephone.
chinese: 任何人都知道贝尔发明了电话。

english: Fish such as carp and trout live in fresh water.
chinese: 鱼类例如鲤鱼和鳟鱼生活在淡水中。

english: From time to time, he goes to Tokyo on business.
chinese: 他时不时地因为工作去东京。

english: Give a thief enough rope and he'll hang himself.
Hard work and dedication will bring you success.
chinese: 努力和敬业会让你成功。

english: Having met him before, I recognized him at once.
chinese: 因为以前见过他, 所以我立刻就认出他来。

english: He always leaves the window open when he sleeps.
chinese: 当他睡觉时, 他总是让窗户开著。

english: He came to my house on the pretext of seeing me.
chinese: 他打着见我的幌子来了我家。

english: He demanded that I should pay the money at once.
He hasn't come yet. He must have missed the bus.
chinese: 他还没来。他肯定错过公交车了。

english: He is on goods terms with all of his classmates.
chinese: 他和他所有的同学相处融洽。

english: He is on goods terms with all of his classmates.
chinese: 他和所有同学的关系都不错。

english: He is very influential in the world of medicine.
chinese: 他在医学界有很大的影响力。

english: He left his parents when he was eight years old.
chinese: 他八岁时离开了他的父母。

english: He makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
chinese: 他给自己定下每天早上散步的规矩。

english: He said he was tired, so he would go home early.
chinese: 他说他累了，所以他想早点回家。

english: He stressed the convenient aspects of city life.
chinese: 他强调都市生活的便利方面。

english: He stressed the convenient aspects of city life.
chinese: 他强调了城市生活方便的一面。

english: He was the strongest candidate for the position.
chinese: 他是那个职位最有希望的候选人。

english: He wishes he had gone to the theater last night.
chinese: 昨晚他希望他去了剧场。

english: He's a regular at the bars and pubs around here.
chinese: 他是这里附近酒吧和酒馆的常客。

english: His mother sat up all night waiting for her son.
chinese: 他的妈妈坐了一整夜，等她的儿子。

english: How long did it take you to translate this book?
chinese: 你用了多少时间来翻译这本书？

english: How long do you plan on staying in this country?
chinese: 你打算在这个国家待多久？

english: How long would it take to swim across the river?
How many flights to New York do you offer a day?
chinese: 你们一天提供几班飞往纽约的航班？

english: I admit I'm not the tidiest person in the world.
chinese: 我承认，我不是世界上最整洁的人。

english: I can't go with you today because I'm very busy.
chinese: 今天我太忙了，没法和你一起去。

english: I cannot help wondering if he will come on time.
chinese: 我禁不住想他会不会准时到。

english: I could swear there's something inside this box.
chinese: 我能发誓这箱子里有东西。

english: I did that, even though I didn't really need to.
chinese: 尽管我并不是真的需要这样做，我还是做了。

english: I didn't expect to see you at a place like this.
chinese: 我都没想过会在这里碰见你。

english: I didn't know that Tom was going to be arrested.
chinese: 我不知道汤姆要被逮捕了。

english: I didn't pay attention to what they were saying.
chinese: 他们说了什么，我并不注意。

english: I don't believe you. You're always telling lies.
chinese: 我不相信你。你总是说谎。

english: I don't even know if Tom went to college or not.
chinese: 我连汤姆有没有上过大学也不知道。

english: I don't mind if you go to bed before I get home.
chinese: 我不介意你在我回到家之前先去睡觉。

english: I don't think I'll be able to get there on time.
chinese: 我估计我无法及时赶到。

english: I don't think it's going to be easy to find Tom.
chinese: 我认为，要找到汤姆可不容易。

english: I find it hard to get up early on cold mornings.
chinese: 我觉得在寒冷的早晨很难早起。

english: I found it best to say nothing about the matter.
chinese: 我觉得什么都不说是最好的。

english: I had a slight headache, so I went to bed early.
chinese: 因为我有点头疼，所以我早早上床睡觉。

english: I have a friend whose father is a famous writer.
chinese: 我有个朋友的父亲是知名的作家。

english: I have to return this book to the library today.
chinese: 我今天得把这本书还给图书馆。

english: I hope everything will turn out well in the end.
I know that Tom is in his room changing clothes.
chinese: 我知道汤姆在他房间里换衣服。

english: I know the real reason why you don't want to go.
chinese: 我知道你不想去的真实原因。

english: I live near the sea, so I often go to the beach.
chinese: 我住在海边所以经常去海滩。

english: I often slept on that bench when I was homeless.
chinese: 当我无家可归的时候，我常在那张长椅上睡觉。

english: I often use SSH to access my computers remotely.
chinese: 我经常使用SSH来远程连接到我的电脑。

english: I passed the city hall on my way to the station.
chinese: 我去车站的路上路过了市政厅。

english: I think it's unlikely that Tom will get elected.
chinese: 我觉得汤姆不太可能会当选。

english: I think that it's unlikely Tom will get elected.
chinese: 我觉得汤姆不太可能会当选。

english: I want to get a haircut before I go on the trip.
chinese: 我想在出发旅行前剪个头发。

english: I wasn't very hungry, so I decided to eat later.
chinese: 因为我不是很饿，所以我决定晚点吃。

english: I wonder what the weather will be like tomorrow.
chinese: 不知道明天天气会怎么样呢？

english: I wonder where Tom is planning to go to college.
chinese: 我想知道汤姆计划去哪里上大学。

english: I wonder why I feel so lonely when it gets cold.
chinese: 我很疑惑为什么天气变冷的时候我会觉得很孤单。

english: I'd already sent you the letter when you called.
chinese: 当您打电话来的时候我已经把信寄给您了。

english: I'd like to leave this town and never come back.
chinese: 我希望离开这个村子并且再也不要回来。

english: I'll wait for you in front of the radio station.
I'm afraid that I differ with you on this point.
chinese: 恐怕就这点上，我和你持不同意见。

english: I'm cold. Would you mind turning the heating on?
chinese: 我很冷。你介意把暖气打开吗？

english: I'm not very interested in artificial languages.
chinese: 我对人造语言不是很感兴趣。

english: I'm really sorry about what happened last night.
chinese: 我对昨天晚上发生的事情感到非常的抱歉。

english: I'm sorry I don't agree with you on that matter.
chinese: 很抱歉那个问题我不赞成你。

english: I'm very ashamed of myself about what I've done.
chinese: 我对自己的作为很内疚。

english: I've been looking for a new job for a long time.
I've been looking for a new job for a long time.
chinese: 我已经找了很久的工作。

english: I've been taking this medication for many years.
chinese: 这种药我吃了好多年了。

english: If I had one million yen now, I would buy a car.
chinese: 如果我现在有100万日元，我会买辆车。

english: If her temperature goes up, send for the doctor.
chinese: 如果她的体温上升, 派人去请医生来。

english: If it's raining tomorrow, we'll go there by car.
chinese: 如果明天下雨，我们就坐车去那儿。

english: If you eat that much, you'll have a stomachache.
chinese: 那么吃的话，肚子会吃坏的噢。

english: If you had a million dollars, what would you do?
chinese: 你有100万美元的话，你会做什么？

english: It goes without saying that health is important.
It is an advantage to be able to use a computer.
It is necessary for you to go there immediately.
It is not good for a scientist to get emotional.
chinese: 对一个科学家来说，多愁善感是不好的。

english: It is not good for a scientist to get emotional.
chinese: 对一个科学家来说，情绪化是不好的。

english: It is said that treasure is buried in this area.
chinese: 据说这个区域埋着财宝。

english: It isn't easy to write a love letter in English.
It isn't necessary for us to attend the meeting.
chinese: 我们没有必要参加会议。

english: It may sound strange, but what she said is true.
chinese: 听起来或许有点怪，但她说的是真的。

english: It would be helpful if you could do that for me.
chinese: 您那样做的话，可就帮到我了。

english: It would be ridiculous to spend all their money.
chinese: 花光他们所有的钱会很荒谬。

english: It's no crime to skip breakfast once in a while.
chinese: 偶尔不吃早餐也不会如何不好呀。

english: It's not necessary for us to attend the meeting.
chinese: 我们没有必要参加会议。

english: Japan has caught up with America in some fields.
chinese: 日本在某些领域赶上了美国。

english: Japan imports various raw materials from abroad.
chinese: 日本从国外进口各种原料。

english: Mass production reduced the price of many goods.
chinese: 大量生产降低许多商品的价格。

english: Mastering a foreign language calls for patience.
chinese: 精通一种外语需要耐心。

english: Monopoly is a popular game for families to play.
chinese: 大富翁是一个家庭玩的热门游戏。

english: My father insisted on our waiting for the train.
chinese: 我的父亲坚持要我们等火车。

english: My teeth aren't as white as I'd like them to be.
chinese: 我的牙齿没有我希望的那样白。

english: New York City policemen wear dark blue uniforms.
chinese: 纽约警察穿深蓝色制服。

english: Our situation should improve in the near future.
chinese: 我们近期内的情况应该会好转。

english: Paris is one of the largest cities in the world.
chinese: 巴黎是世界上最大的城市之一。

english: Patience is sometimes the most effective weapon.
chinese: 耐心有时候是最有效的武器。

english: Perhaps Tom is too old to do this kind of thing.
chinese: 也许Tom年纪太大，不适合做这件事。

english: Seen from the moon, the earth looks like a ball.
chinese: 从月球上看的话，地球看起来像个皮球。

english: She expressed her feelings for nature in a poem.
chinese: 她通过一首诗表达了她对大自然的感受。

english: She furnished the room with beautiful furniture.
chinese: 她用漂亮的家具布置了房间。

english: She hurt her foot when she fell off her bicycle.
chinese: 她在从自行车上摔下来时伤到了脚。

english: She suggested to me that I call off the meeting.
She tried to persuade him to attend the meeting.
chinese: 她试图说服他来参加会议。

english: She was ashamed of herself for her carelessness.
chinese: 她为自己的粗心感到羞耻。

english: She will be glad if you go to see her in person.
chinese: 如果你单独去看她, 她会很高兴的。

english: Sir, can we quickly inspect your luggage please?
chinese: 先生，我们可以检查一下您的行李吗？

english: Sir, that CD is available only by special order.
chinese: 先生，那盘CD需要预定才有。

english: Some people like summer, and others like winter.
chinese: 有人喜欢夏天， 有人喜欢冬天。

english: Speak more slowly so that we can understand you.
chinese: 请讲慢一点，让我们能听懂。

english: Tell me about some of the places you've visited.
chinese: 给我说说你去过的一些地方。

english: Thanks to your recommendation, Tom got that job.
chinese: 多亏了你的推荐，汤姆得到了那份工作。

english: The Jacksons are visiting us tomorrow afternoon.
chinese: 杰克森一家明天下午就要来看望我们。

english: The bill passed by a small majority of 10 votes.
chinese: 法案以10票微弱多数通过。

english: The bus will take you to the center of the city.
chinese: 巴士会把你们带到市中心。

english: The car broke down after half an hour's driving.
The circumstances did not allow me to go abroad.
The coral reef is the region's prime attraction.
chinese: 珊瑚礁是这个地区的主要景点。

english: The court acquitted him of the charge of murder.
chinese: 法庭对他的谋杀罪名作出了无罪判决。

english: The delegations of both countries met in Geneva.
chinese: 两国代表团在日内瓦会面。

english: The doctor told her that she should take a rest.
The explorers discovered a skeleton in the cave.
chinese: 探险家们在洞穴里发现了骸骨。

english: The horse stopped and refused to go any further.
chinese: 马停了下来，而且拒绝移动。

english: The king will appear in person tomorrow evening.
The majority of his income goes to pay his rent.
chinese: 他的大部分收入付了租金。

english: The money you give them will be put to good use.
chinese: 你给他们的钱会用到好处。

english: The motel can accommodate as many as 400 guests.
chinese: 汽车旅馆可以接待多达400名客人。

english: The mother occasionally reread her son's letter.
chinese: 这位母亲偶尔会重温她的儿子的信件。

english: The problem is that solar energy costs too much.
chinese: 问题是, 太阳能太贵了。

english: The things he says are entirely inconsequential.
chinese: 他说的话根本毫无意义。

english: The train was delayed because of heavy snowfall.
The twins are indistinguishable from each other.
The weather was not only cold, it was also damp.
The weatherman says there is a storm on the way.
chinese: 气象学家说会有暴风雨。

english: There are a lot of dictionaries in the bookcase.
There are at least thirty students in our class.
chinese: 我们班至少有三十个学生。

english: There are many Americans who can speak Japanese.
chinese: 有很多美国人会说日语。

english: There is a man at the door who wants to see you.
There was widespread panic after the earthquake.
chinese: 地震后人们普遍觉得恐慌。

english: These three pretty girls are all nieces of mine.
chinese: 这三个漂亮的女孩都是我的侄女。

english: This dam supplies us with water and electricity.
chinese: 这个水坝给我们提供水和电。

english: This dictionary contains about 40,000 headwords.
chinese: 这本字典包含了约4万个词条。

english: This guitar is so expensive that I can't buy it.
chinese: 这吉他太贵了，我没法买下。

english: This is a problem you have to solve by yourself.
chinese: 这是一个你必须自己解决的问题。

english: This mountain is covered in snow all year round.
This river is dangerous for children to swim in.
chinese: 孩子在这条河里游泳太危险了。

english: This towel is so soft and fluffy. It feels good!
chinese: 这条毛巾蓬松又柔软，特别舒服。

english: Tom and I have known each other for a long time.
Tom and Mary argue with each other all the time.
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽无时无刻不在辩论。

english: Tom began to learn French about three years ago.
chinese: 汤姆大约三年前开始学法语。

english: Tom didn't come home last night. I hope he's OK.
chinese: 昨晚汤姆没有回家，希望他没事。

english: Tom doesn't have any idea why his wife left him.
chinese: 汤姆根本不明白为甚么他的妻子离开了他。

english: Tom doesn't like women who wear too much makeup.
chinese: 汤姆不喜欢妆化太浓的女人。

english: Tom had no idea why Mary didn't want to do that.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽为什么不去做。

english: Tom has been on the wanted list for three years.
chinese: 汤姆已经上通缉令三年了。

english: Tom is looking for someone to take Mary's place.
Tom is single and has a three-year-old daughter.
chinese: Tom单身，他有个三岁的女儿。

english: Tom is very good at doing things with his hands.
Tom isn't the only one here who's a good singer.
chinese: 汤姆不是这里唯一的好歌手。

english: Tom learned how to do that from his grandfather.
chinese: 汤姆从他祖父那里学会了怎么做。

english: Tom never should've tried doing that by himself.
chinese: 汤姆从来不应该尝试自己一个人做那些。

english: Tom opened the blinds and looked out the window.
chinese: 汤姆打开百叶窗，向窗外望去。

english: Tom puts a lot of sugar and cream in his coffee.
chinese: 汤姆喝咖啡放很多糖和奶油。

english: Tom said he thought that he should study French.
chinese: 汤姆说他觉得他该学法语。

english: Tom said he wasn't ready, but Mary said she was.
chinese: 汤姆说他没准备好，但玛丽说她准备好了。

english: Tom said that he thought he should study French.
chinese: 汤姆说他觉得他该学法语。

english: Tom seems to be a fairly successful businessman.
chinese: 汤姆看来是个很成功的商人。

english: Tom speaks Japanese better than the Japanese do.
chinese: 汤姆的日语比日本人说得还要好。

english: Tom still drinks, but not as much as he used to.
chinese: 汤姆还是喝，但不像以前那么多了。

english: Tom suggested that I change the lock on my door.
chinese: 汤姆建议我换我的门锁。

english: Tom told Mary something she didn't want to hear.
chinese: 汤姆告诉了玛丽她不想知道的事。

english: Tom was a little overweight when he was a child.
chinese: 汤姆在小时候有点超重。

english: Tom won't tell Mary the real reason he did that.
chinese: 汤姆不会告诉玛丽他做那件事的真实原因。

english: Two months have passed since he left for France.
chinese: 自从他离开去法国，已经有两个月了。

english: We postponed our departure because of the storm.
chinese: 我们因为风暴推迟了起程。

english: We used to go to the movies on Saturday evening.
chinese: 我们曾经总在星期六傍晚去看电影。

english: We want to be on the first bus tomorrow morning.
chinese: 我们想乘明天早上第一班公交车。

english: We'll contact you by phone as soon as we arrive.
chinese: 我们到了就打电话跟您联系。

english: Were I to die, who would look after my children?
chinese: 要是我死了，谁来照顾我的孩子们？

english: When I was a child, I used to swim in that pond.
chinese: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我在这个泳池里游过泳。

english: When he retired, his son took over his business.
chinese: 他退休的时候，他儿子接手了他的生意。

english: When he retired, his son took over the business.
chinese: 他退休的时候，他儿子接手了他的生意。

english: Where do you suppose you'll spend your vacation?
chinese: 你认为你会到哪儿度假？

english: While you are reading to me, I can do my sewing.
chinese: 你读给我听的时候，我就可以做缝纫了。

english: Who will take care of the dog while we are away?
chinese: 当我们离开的时候，谁来照顾狗？

english: Why does the US government let people have guns?
chinese: 为什么美国政府让人们持有枪械？

english: You can't drink seawater because it's too salty.
chinese: 你不能喝海水，因为它太咸了。

english: You don't deserve the salary they're paying you.
chinese: 你不应该得到他们给你的薪水。

english: You don't have to tell Tom if you don't want to.
chinese: 如果你不想，那你便没有这个必要去告诉汤姆。

english: You have a choice of black tea, coffee, or milk.
chinese: 你可以选择红茶，咖啡或牛奶。

english: You look like you've just lost your best friend.
chinese: 你看上去就像是刚刚失去了自己最好的朋友似的。

english: You nearly poked me in the eye with your pencil.
chinese: 你的铅笔差点戳到我的眼睛了。

english: You should set a good example for your children.
chinese: 你应该给你的孩子们树立好榜样。

english: You thought it was Tom who did that, didn't you?
chinese: 你觉得是汤姆做的，不是吗？

english: You used to be able to see the church from here.
chinese: 你以前可以从这里看到教堂。

english: You will soon get accustomed to your new school.
chinese: 你很快就会适应你的新学校。

english: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.
chinese: 你会很惊讶你在一周内能学到的东西。

english: You'd do that if Tom asked you to, wouldn't you?
chinese: 若汤姆请求你的话，你是会做的，不是吗？

english: You'll soon get accustomed to this cold weather.
chinese: 你很快就会习惯这种冷天气。

english: You're not old enough to get a driver's license.
chinese: 你还没到可以拿驾驶执照的年龄。

english: "Did he write a letter yesterday?" "Yes, he did."
chinese: "他昨天写了一封信吗?" "是的, 他写了。"

english: "I'll do it tomorrow." "You said that yesterday!"
chinese: “我明天再做。” “这话你昨天就说过了！”

english: "Would you like any more?" "No, I've had enough."
chinese: "你想再多吃点吗?" "不，我吃饱了。"

english: A barber is a man who shaves and cuts men's hair.
chinese: 理发师是为男人刮胡子和剪头发的人。

english: A doctor told me that eating eggs was bad for me.
chinese: 一位医生告诉过我，吃鸡蛋对我的健康有害。

english: A friend of mine asked me to send her a postcard.
chinese: 我的一位朋友要求我寄给她一张明信片。

english: A great number of books are published every year.
chinese: 每年都有大量新书出版。

english: According to the newspaper, he committed suicide.
After you have read it, give the book back to me.
chinese: 在你读完后，把书还给我。

english: All at once she began to shout in a shrill voice.
chinese: 突然间她开始用尖锐的声音大喊。

english: Are you planning to be at Tom and Mary's wedding?
chinese: 你打算参加汤姆和玛丽的婚礼吗？

english: Aren't you coming to pick me up tomorrow morning?
chinese: 你明天早上不来接我吗？

english: As far as I know, your letter is under that book.
chinese: 据我所知，你的信在那本书下面。

english: As soon as I get to London, I'll drop you a line.
chinese: 我一到伦敦就会给你留言的。

english: As soon as she wakes up, we'll turn on the music.
Be it ever so humble, there's no place like home.
chinese: 金窝银窝不如自己的狗窝。

english: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any.
chinese: 如果你有上司的话，学会尊敬他（她）。

english: Because our kids got married, we are now in-laws.

english: Everyone in the room was stunned by what happened.
chinese: 屋里人都被发生的事惊住了。

english: Explain to him the difficult situation you are in.
chinese: 给他讲解一下你的困境。

english: He cleansed the wound before putting on a bandage.
chinese: 他先清洗了伤口，再绑上绷带。

english: He drove the car, listening to music on the radio.
chinese: 他一面开车一面听收音机的音乐。

english: He endeavored to make his wife happy, but in vain.
chinese: 他试著想让他妻子开心，但是没有成功。

english: He explained the literal meaning of the sentences.
chinese: 他解释了句子的字面意思。

english: He failed in his attempt to swim across the river.
chinese: 他试图游过河，但是失败了。

english: He is busy preparing for the entrance examination.
He placed emphasis on the importance of education.
chinese: 他强调了教育的重要性。

english: He studies English, but he's also studying German.
chinese: 他学英语，但他也学德语。

english: He told us such a funny story that we all laughed.
chinese: 他给我们讲了一个有趣的故事，我们都笑了起来。

english: He went to see his grandfather off at the station.
He wore a mask so that no one could recognize him.
chinese: 他戴著面具以至于没有人认出他。

english: His low salary prevents him from buying the house.
chinese: 他的低薪水让他买不了房。

english: How long does it take to get to the train station?
How long does the airport bus take to the airport?
chinese: 乘机场大巴去机场要多久？

english: I am grateful to you for inviting me to the party.
I avoid discussing personal subjects with my boss.
chinese: 我避免跟老板讨论个人话题。

english: I can't believe Tom is really planning to do this.
chinese: 我无法相信汤姆真的打算做这事儿。

english: I can't understand why you are so critical of him.
chinese: 我不明白为什么你这么批评他。

english: I cannot help thinking that my son is still alive.
chinese: 我不禁想我的儿子一直都在生。

english: I couldn't help but be impressed by Tom's courage.
chinese: 汤姆的勇气给我留下了深刻印象。

english: I didn't know Tom was going to tell us what to do.
chinese: 我不知道汤姆会告诉我们该怎么做。

english: I didn't trust Tom and he didn't trust me, either.
chinese: 我不信任汤姆而且汤姆也不信任我。

english: I don't think I've ever made any serious mistakes.
chinese: 我认为我没犯任何严重的错误。

english: I don't think that any more students want to come.
chinese: 我觉得不会有更多学生想来了。

english: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.
I enjoyed talking with you this evening very much.
chinese: 今晚我非常享受和你的聊天。

english: I find that it's typical for him to come too late.
chinese: 我发现他就是会很晚才来这样的人。

english: I had no idea it would put you to so much trouble.
chinese: 我一点都不知道这会给你带来那么多问题。

english: I hate when other people make me wait a long time.
chinese: 我讨厌别人让我等很久。

english: I have a friend whose father is a famous novelist.
chinese: 我有一位朋友，他的父亲是著名小说家。

english: I have to get to sleep! I've got classes tomorrow.
chinese: 我必须去睡觉了！我明天早上有课。

english: I have to take the book back to the library today.
chinese: 我今天必须把书还给图书馆。

english: I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.
chinese: 我有两条狗。一条是白色的，另一条是黑色的。

english: I hope he'll be able to come! I'd like to see him.
chinese: 我希望他能来！我想见他。

english: I know it's time to go, but I want to stay longer.
chinese: 我知道该走了，但我想留久一点。

english: I met an American who was interested in Noh plays.
chinese: 我碰到一个对能剧感兴趣的美国人。

english: I shot the horse because it had trouble breathing.
chinese: 我枪杀了那匹马，因为他已呼吸困难。

english: I told Tom that I thought that it was a good idea.
chinese: 我和汤姆说了，我觉得这个主意很好。

english: I told her not to let go of the rope, but she did.
chinese: 我叫她不要松开绳子，但是她做了。

english: I took it for granted that he would keep his word.
chinese: 我理所当然地认为他会履行诺言。

english: I took it for granted that he would pass the exam.
chinese: 我理所当然地觉得，他会通过考试。

english: I want to extend my stay here for a few more days.
chinese: 我想延长这里的住宿多几天。

english: I was watching television when the telephone rang.
chinese: 电话响的时候，我在看电视。

english: I'll try not to disturb you while you're studying.
chinese: 我会尽量不打扰你复习。

english: I'm afraid the job I've got for you won't be easy.
chinese: 我恐怕我给你找的工作不轻松。

english: I'm fixing the radio which I found on my way home.
chinese: 我在修理回家路上捡到的收音机。

english: I'm not talking to you. I'm talking to the monkey.
chinese: 我不是在跟你说话，我在跟猴子说话。

english: I'm not the only one who thinks Tom is overweight.
chinese: 觉得汤姆肥的人不止我一个。

english: I'm surprised that your family has a Japanese car.
chinese: 我很惊讶，你家居然有辆日本车。

english: I've already told Tom he can't go to Mary's party.
chinese: 我已经告诉汤姆他不能去玛丽的聚会了。

english: I've been coming to work one train earlier lately.
chinese: 我已经搭了最近比较早一点的火车来上班。

english: If it were not for your help, I could not succeed.
chinese: 没有你的帮忙，我无法达成。

english: If that man makes one more mistake, I'll fire him.
chinese: 如果那个男人再犯一个错误，我就开除他。

english: If you can't make it, call us as soon as possible.
chinese: 如果你做不到，尽快连络我们。

english: If you do it this way, you can save several hours.
chinese: 这样做你能节约几个小时。

english: If you really want to know, why don't you ask Tom?
chinese: 如果你真的想知道的话，为什么不问一下汤姆呢？

english: If you're not listening to the radio, turn it off.
chinese: 要是你不在听广播的话，就关掉它。

english: Is it all right to take pictures in this building?
chinese: 我们可以在大楼里拍照吗？

english: It cost me a thousand yen to get my bicycle fixed.
chinese: 修理我的脚踏车花了我一千日圆。

english: It is extremely hot and humid in Bali in December.
chinese: 12月份巴厘岛极其炎热和潮湿。

english: It is not necessary for us to attend this lecture.
chinese: 我们没有必要出席这个讲座。

english: It is true that she is pretty, but she is selfish.
chinese: 她确实很漂亮，但她很自私。

english: It occurred to me that he might be in the library.
chinese: 我突然想到，他可能在图书馆 。

english: It seemed that she had already received the money.
It sounds as if he were to blame for the disaster.
chinese: 听起来好像他是这场灾难的罪魁祸首。

english: It was raining heavily when I got up this morning.
chinese: 我今天早上起来的时候雨下得很大。

english: It's a risk that Tom and I aren't willing to take.
chinese: 我和汤姆都不愿意冒这个险。

english: It's getting dark. I wonder if it's going to rain.
chinese: 天变暗了。我不知道是不是要下雨。

english: Japan is confronted with severe economic problems.
chinese: 日本正面临著严重的经济问题。

english: Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.
chinese: 木星是太阳系中最大的行星。

english: Many TV programs have a bad influence on children.
chinese: 许多电视节目对儿童有不良的影响。

english: Mary placed her baby in a car seat for the flight.
chinese: 航程中玛丽把她的宝宝放在婴儿汽车座椅上。

english: Moderate exercise will refresh both mind and body.
chinese: 适度的运动让身心焕然一新。

english: My business has at last gotten on the right track.
chinese: 我的生意终于走上了正轨。

english: My business has at last gotten on the right track.
chinese: 我的生意终于上了轨道。

english: My sister has made remarkable progress in English.
chinese: 我妹妹的英语有了明显的进步。

english: My wife buys vegetables from a supermarket nearby.
chinese: 我老婆在附近的超市买蔬菜。

english: On my way to the theater I saw a traffic accident.
chinese: 在去剧院的路上，我看到了一起车祸。

english: Only one little boy survived the traffic accident.
chinese: 这次交通事故中只有一个小男孩幸存了下来。

english: People are more educated now than they used to be.
chinese: 现在的人教育程度比以前高得多。

english: Professional writers do not have a regular income.
chinese: 专职作家没有固定的收入。

english: Scientists are working hard to put an end to AIDS.
chinese: 科学家们正努力终结艾滋病。

english: She always lets her children do what they want to.
chinese: 她总是让自己的小孩做自己想做的事。

english: She came to Tokyo when she was eighteen years old.
She had scarcely finished speaking when he cut in.
chinese: 她几乎没有说完话，就被他打断了。

english: She helped her father with the work in the garden.
chinese: 她帮她爸爸干了花园里的活。

english: She speaks clearly enough to be easily understood.
She told me that her mother had bought it for her.
chinese: 她告诉我她妈妈买给她了。

english: She wants to move out and find a place of her own.
chinese: 她想搬出去，找个属于自己的地方。

english: She waved at me before she got on board the plane.
chinese: 她上飞机前，给我招了招手。

english: Sleep deprivation increases risk of heart attacks.
chinese: 睡眠不足增加心脏病发作的危险。

english: Some people say Japan is a male-dominated society.
chinese: 有些人说日本是个男性统治的社会。

english: Take a sweater with you so you don't catch a cold.
chinese: 为了不感冒，请带上这件毛衣。

english: That wasn't the main reason Tom needed to do that.
chinese: 这不是汤姆要做那件事的主要原因。

english: The artist who illustrated this book is very good.
chinese: 给这本书画插画的画家很好。

english: The assignment took me longer than I had expected.
chinese: 我用了比我预期更长的时间来完成作业。

english: The baby was in a deep sleep in his mother's arms.
chinese: 孩子在母亲的怀中熟睡。

english: The boy who lives next door often comes home late.
chinese: 隔壁的男孩常常晚回家。

english: The boy who lives next door often comes home late.
chinese: 住在隔壁的男孩常常很晚回来。

english: The legal system in America is the world's finest.
chinese: 美国的司法制度是世界上最好的。

english: The longer I stayed in Paris, the more I liked it.
chinese: 在巴黎待得越久，我就越喜欢巴黎。

english: The organization furnished the refugees with food.
chinese: 那个团体为难民们提供食品供给。

english: The plane was three hours late due to bad weather.
chinese: 由于天气不好，飞机迟到了3小时。

english: The river that flows through London is the Thames.
chinese: 流经伦敦的河是泰晤士河。

english: The talks will deal with the problem of pollution.
chinese: 这场谈论即将对污染问题展开讨论。

english: The volcano erupted suddenly, killing many people.
chinese: 火山突然喷发，造成了多人死亡。

english: There are always some people who are unreasonable.
There aren't supposed to be any men in this house.
chinese: 这家里应该没有男人才对。

english: There is no admission fee for children under five.
chinese: 五岁以下的小孩票价全免。

english: There was no one in the room besides Tom and Mary.
chinese: 除了汤姆和玛丽，房间里没有人。

english: There was nothing on the radio about the accident.
chinese: 电台没有提到这个事故。

english: There's a possibility that you'll have to do that.
chinese: 你有可能不得不那么做。

english: They aren't quarreling, but are rehearsing a play.
chinese: 他们不是在打架，而是在排练戏剧。

english: They called in a doctor because the child was ill.
chinese: 他们打电话给医生因为这个孩子生病了。

english: They nominated Calvin Coolidge for vice president.
chinese: 他们提名卡尔文•柯立芝为副总统。

english: This is the first time I've heard of this website.
chinese: 我第一次知道这个网站。

english: This is the most massive structure I've ever seen.
chinese: 这是我所见过的最大型的构造了。

english: This mountain is covered with snow all year round.
This theory is too difficult for me to comprehend.
chinese: 这个理论对我来说太难了，理解不了。

english: Tom and Mary are both going to be OK, aren't they?
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽都会没事的，对吗？

english: Tom and Mary are studying together in the library.
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽在图书馆一起学习。

english: Tom can't go out because he has a lot of homework.
chinese: 汤姆因为有很多作业不能外出。

english: Tom couldn't read very well until he was thirteen.
chinese: 汤姆十三岁以前读得不好。

english: Tom didn't think that anyone would recognize Mary.
chinese: 汤姆不认为有人会认出玛丽。

english: Tom doesn't have a good French-English dictionary.
chinese: Tom没有一本好的法英字典。

english: Tom doesn't understand what Mary is trying to say.
chinese: 汤姆不理解玛丽想说什么。

english: Tom had a hunch that Mary was seeing someone else.
chinese: 汤姆预感到玛丽在见别人。

english: Tom has made up his mind to go to Boston to study.
chinese: 汤姆已经下定决心要去波士顿念书。

english: Tom is one of the most disagreeable people I know.
chinese: Tom是我认识最讨厌的人之一。

english: Tom is wearing the same clothes he wore yesterday.
chinese: 汤姆穿著昨天穿的衣服。

english: Tom sat on that park bench for nearly three hours.
chinese: 汤姆在公园的长椅上坐了将近三个小时。

english: Tom should have handled the situation differently.
chinese: 汤姆应该用别的方式处理这状况。

english: Tom told Mary that it would probably snow all day.
chinese: 汤姆告诉玛丽雪可能会下一整天。

english: Tom told me he'd give me that book if I wanted it.
chinese: 汤姆说过，如果我想要的话他可以把这本书给我。

english: Tom told me that he won't come to school tomorrow.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他明天不来上学。

english: Tom wants a computer small enough to easily carry.
chinese: 汤姆想要个小得易于携带的电脑。
