english: Tom was so drunk that he didn't even recognize me.
chinese: 汤姆醉得连我都认不出来了。

english: Tom was the first to arrive and the last to leave.
Tom wouldn't dare show his face around here again.
chinese: 汤姆不敢再到这里露面。

english: Two men are checking on what's wrong with the car.
chinese: 两个男人在检查汽车出了什么故障。

english: We are sorry we are unable to accept your request.
chinese: 很抱歉，我们不能接受你的要求。

english: We didn't know how to do it, so we asked for help.
chinese: 我们先前不知道要怎么做，所以才求助。

english: We should tell children how to protect themselves.
chinese: 我们应该告诉孩子怎么保护自己。

english: We woke up very early in order to see the sunrise.
chinese: 我们起得很早为了看到日出。

english: We've got to do something about this problem soon.
chinese: 我们要快点处理这问题。

english: What would you do if you had ten thousand dollars?
chinese: 如果你有一万美元，你想做什么呢？

english: When I hear that song, I remember my younger days.
chinese: 每次听到这首歌，都会让我回忆起自己年轻的时候。

english: When you've finished reading this letter, burn it.
chinese: 看完这封信请把它烧掉。

english: You are no better at remembering things than I am.
chinese: 你记事情的能力并不比我好多少。

english: You don't seem to be as afraid as Tom seems to be.
chinese: 你似乎并不像汤姆看起来那样害怕。

english: You look the way your father did thirty years ago.
chinese: 你看上去就像是三十年前你父亲的样子。

english: You should be careful not to become overconfident.
You should know better than to ask a lady her age.
chinese: 你应该知道不要问小姐的年龄。

english: You should read a lot of books while you're young.
chinese: 当你年轻的时候, 你应该多读点儿书。

english: You should read a lot of books while you're young.
You shouldn't talk back to your parents like that.
chinese: 你不应该对你父母那样顶嘴。

english: You want to be excused from doing that, don't you?
chinese: 你想通过做那件事而得到原谅是吗？

english: You'd better go to see your family doctor at once.
chinese: 你最好立刻去看你的家庭医生。

english: You'll find it difficult to meet her requirements.
You're working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
chinese: 你工作太勤奋了。休息一会吧。

english: "Have you seen my cell phone?" "It's on the table."
chinese: "你有看到我的手机吗?" "它在桌子上。"

english: "Where have you been?" "I've been to the barber's."
chinese: 你去哪儿了？我去了理发店。

english: Academic fraud is more common than you might think.
chinese: 学术造假比你想象的普遍。

english: All of us would like to get rid of nuclear weapons.
chinese: 我们所有的人都想除掉核子武器。

english: All you have to do is say the word, and I'll leave.
Are you saying you don't want to go to Tom's party?
chinese: 你的意思是你不想去汤姆的派对？

english: As far as I'm concerned, she's a complete stranger.
chinese: 她对我来说是一个完全陌生的人。

english: As soon as he sat down, he picked up the telephone.
chinese: 他一坐下，就拿起了电话。

english: Because his salary is low, he can't buy that house.
chinese: 因为他的薪水太低，他买不起那栋房子。

english: Can you imagine what the 21st century will be like?
chinese: 你能想象21世纪会是甚么样吗？

english: Did Tom tell you why he wasn't at school yesterday?
chinese: 汤姆告诉你他昨天为什么不去学校了吗？

english: Did Tom tell you why he wasn't at school yesterday?
chinese: 汤姆昨天告诉你他为什么不去学校了吗？

english: Do not fear the unexpected, but be prepared for it.
chinese: 不要害怕意外，但要有准备。

english: Don't speak unless you have something worth saying.
chinese: 除非你有什么值得说的话要说，否则就别吭声。

english: Driving on a slippery road can lead to a car wreck.
chinese: 在光滑的路上开车会导致车祸。

english: Elephants are the largest land animals alive today.
chinese: 大象是如今现存的陆生动物里最大的。

english: Every time I went to his house, he was not at home.
chinese: 我每次去他家，他都不在家。

english: Everybody in the room was stunned by what happened.
chinese: 屋里人都被发生的事惊住了。

english: Everyone except Tom knew he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: Everyone ought to be the master of his own destiny.
chinese: 每个人都应该做自己命运的主人。

english: For some reason the microphone didn't work earlier.
chinese: 刚才我的麦克风没起作用，不知道为什么。

english: He didn't answer the phone, so I sent him an email.
chinese: 他没有接电话，所以我给他发了封邮件。

english: He divided one million dollars among his five sons.
chinese: 他把一百万美元分给他五个儿子。

english: He has no right to interfere in our family affairs.
chinese: 他无权干涉我们的家庭事务。

english: He knows German and French, not to mention English.
chinese: 不提英语，他还会说德语和法语。

english: He looked in all directions, but didn't see anyone.
chinese: 他看了看四周，但没看见任何人。

english: He postponed leaving for Hokkaido until next month.
chinese: 他延迟到下个月去北海道。

english: He said he did not enter the room, which was a lie.
chinese: 他说他没有进房间，那是骗人的。

english: He went to Italy for the purpose of studying music.
chinese: 他去义大利的目的是学习音乐。

english: He's getting along well with all of his classmates.
chinese: 他和他所有的同学相处融洽。

english: How long has it been since you saw your girlfriend?
chinese: 你跟你的女朋友见面以来有多久了？

english: How many different kinds of pizzas are on the menu?
I couldn't prevent Tom from eating all the cookies.
chinese: 我拦不住汤姆把饼干吃完。

english: I don't even want to think about what could happen.
chinese: 我甚至不想去想会发生什么。

english: I don't think that Tom has any teaching experience.
chinese: 我认为汤姆一点教学经验都没有。

english: I don't use taxis unless it's absolutely necessary.
chinese: 如无必要我也不会打的。

english: I find it much easier to speak French than English.
chinese: 对我来说法语比英语说起来简单得多。

english: I go to the office by bicycle except on rainy days.
chinese: 除了雨天，我都是骑车去上班的。

english: I got a video cassette recorder cheap at that shop.
chinese: 我在那商店花低价买了台录像机。

english: I guess you heard about what happened this morning.
chinese: 我想你听说今天早上发生什么了。

english: I hate it when women say that all men are the same.
chinese: 我很讨厌有女的说：“男人都一样”。

english: I like rugby, but not as much as I like basketball.
chinese: 我喜欢橄榄球，但不像我喜欢篮球那么喜欢。

english: I promised myself that I would never do that again.
chinese: 我对自己发誓今后不会再那么做。

english: I think a movie is more entertaining than any book.
chinese: 我觉得一部电影比任何书都有趣。

english: I think a movie is more entertaining than any book.
chinese: 我认为一部电影的乐趣远胜于任何一本书。

english: I thought I told you to stay away from my computer.
chinese: 我说过让你离我的电脑远一点的。

english: I understand that you feel uneasy, but don't worry.
chinese: 我知道你不自在，但别急。

english: I want a boat that will take me far away from here.
chinese: 我想要一艘船带我远离这里。

english: I wanted to ask Tom how long he had lived in India.
chinese: 我想问汤姆他在印度生活了多久。

english: I was wondering if you were going to show up today.
chinese: 我在想你今天会不会来。

english: I wouldn't ask this of you if it weren't important.
chinese: 如果不是它很重要，我不会问你。

english: I'd like to exchange this shirt I bought yesterday.
chinese: 我想去换我昨天买的这件衬衫。

english: I'd like to try out this new model before I buy it.
chinese: 我想在买之前先试试这个新机型。

english: I'll only buy the car if they fix the brakes first.
chinese: 除非他们事先修好刹车，我才会买车子。

english: I'm disappointed that I wasn't able to go with her.
chinese: 我很失望我没能和她一起去。

english: I'm on my way to meet Tom at the station right now.
chinese: 我现在在去车站见汤姆的路上。

english: I've already told Tom that Mary is in the hospital.
chinese: 我已经告诉了汤姆玛丽住院了。

english: I've been told that you're a very competent person.
chinese: 有人说你是个很有能力的人。

english: I've done bad things that I should be punished for.
If there was no sun, all the animals would be dead.
chinese: 如果没有太阳，那所有生物都会死。

english: If you can't have children, you could always adopt.
chinese: 如果你不能有孩子，你总能领养。

english: In 1848, people came to California to dig for gold.
Is it true that Tom wants to paint his house green?
chinese: 汤姆想把房子漆成绿色，是真的吗？

english: Is this the first time that you've seen this movie?
chinese: 这是你第一次看这部电影吗?

english: It is believed that whales have their own language.
chinese: 人们相信鲸有他们自己的语言。

english: It is impossible to master English in a short time.
chinese: 不可能短时间内学会英语。

english: It isn't anything like as cold as it was yesterday.
chinese: 今天没有像昨天那么冷。

english: It took a long time to take in what she was saying.
chinese: 花了很久才能听懂她在说什么。

english: It will be snowing when we arrive at Shiga Heights.
chinese: 我们到达志贺高原时会下雪。

english: It would take forever for me to explain everything.
chinese: 要都解释的话，需要一辈子的时间。

english: It's been a long time since we last saw each other.
It's been hot this month, but today's an exception.
chinese: 这个月一直都很热，但今天是个例外。

english: It's fun to learn slang words in foreign languages.
chinese: 学习外语里的俚语很有趣。

english: Judging from his appearance, he must be a rich man.
chinese: 从他的外表来看，他应该是个有钱人。

english: Let go of my arm! I can't stand people touching me.
chinese: 放开我的手臂！我不能忍受有人碰我。

english: Losing your health is worse than losing your money.
chinese: 丧失健康比丧失金钱更糟糕。

english: Many schools are closed today because of the storm.
chinese: 今天许多学校因为风暴停课。

english: Many young people in Japan eat bread for breakfast.
chinese: 许多日本的年轻人吃面包当作早餐。

english: Mary has as attractive a personality as her sister.
chinese: 玛丽性格很好，就像她姐姐一样。

english: Mercury is the smallest planet in our solar system.
chinese: 水星是我们的太阳系中最小的行星。

english: More money for education will spur economic growth.
chinese: 更多投资在教育的钱将会刺激经济成长。

english: No one noticed her absence until the meeting ended.
chinese: 直到会议结束之前都没人注意到她不在。

english: One of the main products of this country is coffee.
chinese: 这个国家的主要产品之一是咖啡。

english: People can easily tell the difference between them.
chinese: 人们可以很容易地看出其中的差别。

english: Please wait for me at the entrance of the building.
chinese: 请在建筑的入口处等我。

english: Please write to me about conditions at your school.
chinese: 请写信告诉我你们学校的情况。

english: Possibly the factory will be closed down next week.
President Lincoln was what we call a self-made man.
chinese: 林肯总统就是我们所谓白手起家的男人。

english: Quite a lot of friends and acquaintances have come.
Research on the causes of cancer is very expensive.
chinese: 有关癌症成因的研究耗费颇巨。

english: She can sing better than anybody else in her class.
chinese: 她唱歌唱得比班上任何一个人好。

english: She finished ironing the clothes a few minutes ago.
chinese: 她几分钟前熨完了衣服。

english: She tried to lift the box, but found it impossible.
chinese: 她试了试举起箱子，但举不起来。

english: She twisted her ankle while she was doing exercise.
She was at a loss for words to express her feeling.
chinese: 她已经无法用语言表达她的感觉了。

english: She wrote him a long letter, but he didn't read it.
chinese: 她给他写了一封长信，但是他没有看。

english: Staying up late at night is very bad for your skin.
Stop getting yourself worked up over little things.
chinese: 不要让自己因为一些小事而烦躁了。

english: Stop getting yourself worked up over little things.
chinese: 不要让自己因为一些小事就方寸大乱了。

english: That child may have been kidnapped on his way home.
chinese: 那个孩子可能在回家的路上被绑架了。

english: That was the first time that I'd seen Tom so angry.
chinese: 那是我第一次见到汤姆如此生气。

english: The Amazon is fed by a large number of tributaries.
The Cold War ended when the Soviet Union collapsed.
The United States is abundant in natural resources.
chinese: 美国的自然资源很丰富。

english: The baby was sleeping soundly in his mother's arms.
chinese: 孩子在母亲的怀中熟睡。

english: The equator divides the earth into two hemispheres.
chinese: 赤道把地球分为两个半球。

english: The equator divides the globe into two hemispheres.
chinese: 赤道把地球分为两个半球。

english: The job looked quite simple, but it took me a week.
chinese: 这份工作看起来很简单，但它花了我一个星期。

english: The knight swore an oath of allegiance to the king.
The old man loaded his mule with bags full of sand.
chinese: 老人在骡子的背上放上了一个个装满了沙的袋子。

english: The opposite sides of a parallelogram are parallel.
chinese: 平行四边形的对边平行。

english: The people of London are very proud of this bridge.
chinese: 伦敦人对这座桥感到非常自豪。

english: The physician prescribed his patient some medicine.
chinese: 医生给他的病人开了一些药。

english: The police assembled a lot of evidence against him.
chinese: 警察收集了很多对他不利的证据。

english: The sky today is the bluest that I've ever seen it.
chinese: 今天的天空是我看过最蓝的天空。

english: The teacher granted me permission to go home early.
The tip of the spear was dipped in a deadly poison.
chinese: 矛尖浸在一种致命的毒药里。

english: The truth is that nothing is totally true or false.
chinese: 真相是没有甚么完全正确或错误。

english: The weather forecast says it will be fine tomorrow.
chinese: 根据气象预报，明天会是晴天。

english: There are times when I find you really interesting.
chinese: 偶尔，我觉得你是一个很有趣的人。

english: There has been no rain here for the past two weeks.
chinese: 这里已经两周没下雨了。

english: There is a castle in the background of the picture.
chinese: 图片的背景是一座城堡。

english: There used to be a big cherry tree behind my house.
chinese: 我家后面曾经有棵大樱桃树。

english: There's a bottle of white wine in the refrigerator.
chinese: 冰箱里有一瓶白葡萄酒。

english: There's no need for you to prepare a formal speech.
chinese: 您没必要准备一个正式的演讲。

english: They didn't even know how to write their own names.
chinese: 他们甚至没办法写自己的名字。

english: They set fire to their neighbor's house in revenge.
chinese: 为了报仇，他们放火烧了邻居的家。

english: This company is listed on the Paris stock exchange.
chinese: 这家公司在巴黎证券交易所上市了。

english: This guidebook might be of use to you on your trip.
chinese: 这本导游册子或许会对你的旅行有帮助。

english: To the best of my knowledge, the rumor is not true.
chinese: 据我所知，这个谣言不是真的。

english: Tom and I have a lot more in common than I thought.
chinese: 汤姆和我的共同点比我想的要多。

english: Tom can't decide whether to buy a Toyota or a Ford.
chinese: 汤姆不能决定买丰田还是福特。

english: Tom carefully wiped his fingerprints off the knife.
chinese: 汤姆小心翼翼地把刀子上的指纹擦掉。

english: Tom didn't think that anybody would recognize Mary.
chinese: 汤姆不认为有人会认出玛丽。

english: Tom is from Australia and Mary is from New Zealand.
chinese: 汤姆来自澳大利亚，玛丽来自新西兰。

english: Tom knows that I want to leave as soon as possible.
chinese: 汤姆知道我想尽早离开。

english: Tom left his sunglasses on the dashboard of my car.
chinese: 汤姆把他的太阳镜留在我的车的仪表板上了。

english: Tom probably knows someone who can teach us French.
chinese: 汤姆应该知道有谁可以教我们法文。

english: Tom said that he didn't want to waste time arguing.
chinese: 汤姆说他不想把时间浪费在争论上。

english: Tom says that Mary definitely won't accept the job.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽绝不会接受这工作。

english: Tom told me that I shouldn't go out alone at night.
chinese: 汤姆跟我说我不应该晚上一个人出门。

english: Tom told me that he doesn't like carbonated drinks.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他不喜欢碳酸饮料。

english: Tom very often takes a nap for an hour after lunch.
chinese: 汤姆很经常在午饭后小憩一小时。

english: Tom was advised by Mary not to go there by himself.
chinese: 玛丽建议汤姆不要独自去。

english: Up to now, how many books do you think you've read?
chinese: 到目前为止，你认为你阅读过多少书籍？

english: Visiting all the tourist sights really wore me out.
chinese: 参观所有观光胜地累坏了我。

english: Water is liquid. When it freezes, it becomes solid.
chinese: 水是液体。冻起来就成了固体。

english: We all wondered why she had dumped such a nice man.
chinese: 我们都想知道她为什么甩了这么好的一个男人。

english: We should've taken the schedule into consideration.
chinese: 我们本该考虑一下行程。

english: We're throwing a party Friday evening at our place.
chinese: 我们星期五傍晚在我们的地盘开派对。

english: When I came home, my sister was playing the guitar.
chinese: 当我回到家的时候，我妹妹正在弹吉他。

english: When I entered the room, she was playing the piano.
chinese: 当我进入那个房间的时候，她正在弹钢琴。

english: When was the last time that you watered the garden?
chinese: 你最后一次给花园浇水在什么时候？

english: Whether the medicine will work or not is uncertain.
With a little more effort, he would have succeeded.
chinese: 如果他当时再努力一点，他就成功了。

english: With her help, my French improved little by little.
chinese: 在她的帮助下，我的法语逐渐进步了。

english: You are working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
chinese: 你工作得太辛苦了。放轻松一下。

english: You can't buy this medicine without a prescription.
chinese: 那个药的话没有处方是买不到的。

english: You have to study hard to catch up with your class.
chinese: 你必须用功读书赶上同学。

english: You must look over the contract before you sign it.
chinese: 你在签字前必须仔细看合同。

english: You ought to let Tom know Mary is going to do that.
chinese: 你该让汤姆知道玛丽要去做。

english: You're the one who suggested that we sing together.
chinese: 你是那个建议我们一起唱歌的人。

english: You've been late for school more often than before.
chinese: 你比以前更容易上课迟到了。

english: A beautiful woman was seated one row in front of me.
chinese: 一个美丽的女人坐在我前面一排。

english: A caged cricket eats just as much as a free cricket.
chinese: 笼子里的蟋蟀吃得跟野生的蟋蟀一样多。

english: A couch potato is something that I don't want to be.
chinese: 我不想成为整天泡在沙发上看电视的人。

english: A drunk driver was responsible for the car accident.
chinese: 喝醉的驾驶员对车祸有责任。

english: A fire broke out at the inn where they were staying.
chinese: 火警发生在他们住的旅馆。

english: All of a sudden, three dogs appeared in front of us.
chinese: 突然之间，三只狗出现在我们面前。

english: All of you are familiar with the truth of the story.
chinese: 你们所有的人都熟悉这个故事的真相。

english: At last, she gave in to him and told him the secret.
chinese: 最后，她对他屈服了，并告诉了他这个秘密。

english: At that time, Tom was sitting between Mary and John.
chinese: 在那个时候，汤姆正坐在玛丽和约翰中间。

english: Be sure to fill out the registration form in person.
chinese: 确保亲自填写注册表格。

english: Better be the head of a cat than the tail of a lion.
Could you lend me your bicycle for a couple of days?
chinese: 你能把你的自行车借我两天吗？

english: Did you know that some foxes lived on this mountain?
chinese: 你知道有些狐狸住在这座山上吗?

english: Do you know which deity this temple is dedicated to?
chinese: 您知道这座庙宇供奉的是哪个神吗？

english: Don't translate English into Japanese word for word.
chinese: 不要逐字逐句的把英文翻译成日文。

english: Everybody except Tom knew he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: Flies and mosquitoes interfered with his meditation.
chinese: 苍蝇和蚊子干扰了他的冥想。

english: Fluency in English is a very marketable skill today.
chinese: 流利的英语在今天是一种十分抢手的技能。

english: Foreign investors withdrew their money from America.
chinese: 外国投资者从美国收回他们的钱。

english: He called in to say he could not attend the meeting.
chinese: 他打电话来说不能参加会议。

english: He did not answer the phone, so I sent him an email.
chinese: 他没有接电话，所以我给他发了封邮件。

english: He has a wife and two young children to provide for.
chinese: 他有一个妻子和两个孩子要养活。

english: He hid in the bushes so that they would not see him.
chinese: 他藏身在灌木中以免他们发现。

english: He is not the man that he was when I first knew him.
chinese: 他已经不是我最初见他那时的那个人了。

english: He left the house without so much as saying goodbye.
chinese: 他甚至没说再见就离开了家。

english: He must have said so without giving it much thought.
chinese: 他一定没有多考虑就说了。

english: He never gave up hope that he would reach that goal.
chinese: 他从没放弃达成那个目标的希望。

english: He pinched and scraped for many years to save money.
chinese: 为了存钱他省吃俭用了许多年。

english: He was found lying unconscious on the kitchen floor.
chinese: 他被人发现倒在厨房的地板上，不省人事。

english: Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.
chinese: 嗨，我可能没钱，但我一直有我的骄傲。

english: His observations are sharp, but he doesn't say much.
chinese: 他的观察是敏锐的，但他没有说太多。

english: His son's criminal activities caused him great pain.
chinese: 他儿子的犯罪行为给他带来了很大的痛苦。

english: How did Tom talk Mary into babysitting his children?
chinese: 汤姆是怎么说服玛丽照顾他的小孩的呢？

english: How long did you think the picnic was going to last?
chinese: 你认为野餐要多长时间？

english: I can't concentrate on my work because of the noise.
chinese: 由于噪音，我无法集中精力工作了。

english: I can't take the place of her as an English teacher.
chinese: 我无法取代她做英语老师。

english: I chose this topic because I think it's interesting.
chinese: 我选这个主题是因为我觉得它很有意思。

english: I plan to spend the New Year's holiday in Australia.
chinese: 我打算在澳大利亚过新年。

english: I studied in the morning during the summer vacation.
I suspect that they water down the beer in that pub.
chinese: 我怀疑那家酒馆的啤酒兑水了。

english: I think our team is going to continue to get better.
chinese: 我觉得我们团队会继续变好。

english: I think the time is right to introduce this product.
chinese: 我觉得现在是发表这个产品的好时机。

english: I think we should be able to go wherever we want to.
chinese: 我认为我们应该能去我们想去的地方。

english: I think you should do that before you go home today.
chinese: 我认为你该在今天回家前做。

english: I thought you'd be full after eating that big steak.
chinese: 我觉得吃完那块大牛排你就饱了。

english: I used to go swimming in the sea when I was a child.
chinese: 童年时我会去海里游泳。

english: I wrote a letter asking him to return a bit earlier.
chinese: 我写了封信，叫他早点回。

english: I'd like to do shopping on Fifth Avenue in New York.
chinese: 我想在纽约的第五大道购物。

english: I'll provide you with all the necessary information.
chinese: 我会给你所有必要的信息。

english: I'm not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.
chinese: 我不太确定我们是否能够满足你的要求。

english: I'm really sorry. I seem to have lost your umbrella.
chinese: 我真的很抱歉，我好像弄丢了你的雨伞。

english: I'm very grateful for everything you've done for me.
chinese: 非常感谢你所做的一切。

english: I've been wanting to see that movie for a long time.
chinese: 我想看那电影想好久了。

english: I've been working for this newspaper for four years.
chinese: 我为这家报社工作四年了。

english: If I were invisible I wouldn't have to dress myself.
chinese: 若我是隐形的，就不用穿衣服了。

english: If by any chance I'm late, please don't wait for me.
chinese: 万一我来晚的话，就别等我了。

english: If it is worth doing at all, it is worth doing well.
chinese: 如果值得一做，就值得做好。

english: If you need a dictionary, I can lend you my old one.
chinese: 如果你需要字典，我就把我旧的借给你。

english: In case of an emergency, get in touch with my agent.
chinese: 万一有紧急情况，联系我的代理人。

english: Is it necessary for me to explain the reason to him?
chinese: 我有必要向他解释原因吗？

english: It is hard to see the sights of Tokyo in a few days.
chinese: 要看东京的景物只花几天时间是很难的。

english: It is not easy to catch a hare with your bare hands.
chinese: 空手赤拳抓野兔并不容易。

english: It's a two-hour drive from here to my uncle's house.
chinese: 从这里坐车，要花两个小时才能到我叔叔家。

english: It's already eleven. It's high time you were in bed.
chinese: 都十一点了，你该上床睡觉了。

english: It's better to chill white wine before you serve it.
chinese: 在你侍酒前最好先将白葡萄酒冷却一下。

english: It's the middle of the night. Why aren't you asleep?
chinese: 三更半夜不睡觉，你在干嘛呢？

english: Japan is a leader in the world's high-tech industry.
chinese: 日本是世界高科技产业的领头人。

english: Keep your eyes closed until I tell you to open them.
chinese: 闭着你的眼睛直到我告诉你睁开为止。

english: Last night, I went to bed without brushing my teeth.
chinese: 昨天晚上，我没刷牙就去睡觉了。

english: Let's meet at the station at eight tomorrow morning.
London, where I live, used to be famous for its fog.
chinese: 我住的地方－伦敦，从前以雾闻名。

english: Lots of people in Japan are indifferent to politics.
chinese: 很多日本人对政治冷淡。

english: Mary isn't really sick. She's only pretending to be.
chinese: 玛丽不是真病。她只是装病。

english: Maybe I'll just give up soon and take a nap instead.
chinese: 也许我会马上放弃然后去打盹。

english: My driving instructor says I should be more patient.
chinese: 我的驾驶教练说我应该更有耐心一点。

english: My father has already given up smoking and drinking.
chinese: 我爸爸已经戒烟戒酒了。

english: My hands were shaking too much to thread the needle.
chinese: 我的手抖得太厉害，没法穿针了。

english: None of them could understand what she was implying.
chinese: 他们没有人了解她暗示什么。

english: None of us thought he was to blame for the accident.
chinese: 我们都不认为他是事故的罪魁祸首。

english: Parents teach their children that it's wrong to lie.
chinese: 父母教育他们的孩子说谎是不好的。

english: People should be the masters of their own destinies.
chinese: 每个人都应该做自己命运的主人。

english: People should understand that the world is changing.
Quite by chance, I met my old friend at the airport.
chinese: 很幸运地，我在机场遇到了我的老朋友。

english: She couldn't attend that party because she was sick.
She drew a circle on a piece of paper with a pencil.
chinese: 她用铅笔在纸上画了一个圈。

english: She looks young. However, she's actually over forty.
chinese: 她看起来是年轻的，但实际上她四十多岁了。

english: She studied abroad in order to brush up her English.
chinese: 她在国外学习以便提升她的英语。

english: She translated the letter from Japanese into French.
chinese: 她把信从日语译成法语。

english: She waved her hand until the train was out of sight.
chinese: 她挥着她的手，直到火车消失在视线之外。

english: She went over the list to see if her name was there.
chinese: 她走过去看看她的名字是否在清单上。

english: Since I couldn't pay the rent, I asked him for help.
chinese: 因为我付不了租金，我就向他请求帮助。

english: Since my mother was sick, I stayed home from school.
chinese: 既然母亲病了，我就待在家里没去上学。

english: Take your hat off when you enter a house of worship.
chinese: 当你进入礼拜堂时，把你的帽子脱下来。

english: That's nonsense. Nobody but a fool would believe it.
chinese: 那是无稽之谈。只有傻瓜才会相信。

english: That's the same story as I heard when I was a child.
chinese: 那跟当我是个孩子时所听到的是同样的故事。

english: The Internet is an invaluable source of information.
chinese: 互联网是一种无法估量的信息资源。

english: The bill was passed after a hard fight in the House.
chinese: 该法案在众议院争议后获得通过。

english: The board unanimously decided to appoint her as CEO.
chinese: 董事会一致决定任命她为执行总裁。

english: The camel can go a long time without water and food.
chinese: 骆驼可以撑很久不吃不喝。

english: The capital of Australia is Canberra, not Melbourne.
chinese: 澳大利亚的首都是堪培拉，不是墨尔本。

english: The company invested a lot of money in this project.
chinese: 该公司在这个企划中投入了很多钱。

english: The doctor advised my father to cut down on smoking.
chinese: 医生建议我父亲少吸烟。

english: The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.
chinese: 湖上的冰太薄了，承受不了你的重量。

english: The party will be held outdoors, weather permitting.
chinese: 若天气许可的话，派对将会在户外举行。

english: The ship made slow progress against the strong wind.
chinese: 这艘船逆风而行缓慢前进。

english: The situation is getting worse and worse day by day.
The students are talking about language and culture.
chinese: 学生们在探讨语言和文化。

english: The town was destroyed by the flood after the storm.
chinese: 小镇被暴风雨后的洪水摧毁了。

english: The wind blew too hard for them to play in the park.
chinese: 风刮得太猛，他们没法在公园里玩了。

english: There are over 800,000 Basque speakers in the world.
chinese: 世界上有超过八十万的巴斯克语使用者。

english: There are over 800,000 Basque speakers in the world.
chinese: 世界上有超过八十万的人说巴斯克语。

english: There's a lot of trash on the far bank of the river.
They guaranteed regular employment to their workers.
chinese: 他们对他们的员工保证就业。

english: This has been the driest six months in thirty years.
chinese: 这是三十年代以来最干旱的六月。

english: Tom and Mary admired the scenery as they held hands.
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽手牵着手，一起欣赏风景。

english: Tom and his friends played basketball all afternoon.
chinese: 汤姆和朋友们打了整个下午篮球。

english: Tom could've dealt with the problem in a better way.
chinese: 汤姆本可以用更好的方式处理问题。

english: Tom donates half his salary to his favorite charity.
chinese: 汤姆捐一半他的薪水给他最喜欢的慈善机构。

english: Tom has contributed a lot of money to this hospital.
chinese: 汤姆捐献了很多钱给这间医院。

english: Tom is going to shovel the snow off the roof for us.
chinese: 汤姆正要为我们铲掉屋顶上的雪。

english: Tom is wearing the same clothes as he was yesterday.
chinese: 汤姆穿著昨天穿的衣服。

english: Tom said he thought that Mary was unhappy in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆说他以为玛丽在波士顿不快乐。

english: Tom said that he didn't have it all figured out yet.
chinese: 汤姆说他还没把事情完全搞明白。

english: Tom said that he thought Mary was unhappy in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆说他以为玛丽在波士顿不快乐。

english: Tom sits in front of his computer eight hours a day.
chinese: 汤姆每天都花八个小时看电脑。

english: Unfortunately, I have to get up early every morning.
chinese: 不幸的是，我必须每天早起。

english: We have to finish everything before Tuesday morning.
chinese: 我们必须在周二早上之前完成所有事情。

english: We must take into account the fact that he is young.
chinese: 我们必须考虑到他很年轻。

english: We take health for granted until illness intervenes.
chinese: 我们视健康为理所当然, 直到疾病侵袭。

english: We were just about to leave when it started raining.
chinese: 我们正要离开的时候下雨了。

english: We were just about to leave when it started to rain.
chinese: 我们正要离开的时候下雨了。

english: What do you think I should wear on my date tomorrow?
chinese: 你觉得我明天约会穿什么好呢？

english: When I hear this song, I think of you, and miss you.
chinese: 当我听到这首歌，我想起了你，并想念著你。

english: When he was a child, he would go fishing on Sundays.
chinese: 他小时候，星期天会去钓鱼。

english: Why is everyone being so nice to me all of a sudden?
chinese: 为什么大家突然对我这么好？

english: You gain more than you spend when you go to college.
chinese: 上大学的时候，你得到的比付出的还多。

english: You should have known better than to lend him money.
chinese: 早知如此，就不应该借钱给他。

english: You should not have lent the money to such a person.
chinese: 你不应该借钱给这样的人。

english: A few years ago, our room had little furniture in it.
chinese: 几年前，我们的房间里没有什么家具。

english: A foreign language can't be mastered in a year or so.
chinese: 一个外国语言无法在一年左右就被掌握。

english: A stay of execution was ordered at the eleventh hour.
chinese: 缓期执行在最后关头决定了下来。

english: A stranger is just a friend that you haven't met yet.
chinese: 所谓陌生人，只是还未相见的友人而已。

english: After she had read the letter, she tore it to pieces.
chinese: 看了信之后，她把它撕成碎片。

english: After walking for an hour, we stopped to take a rest.
chinese: 走了一个小时后，我们停下来休息。

english: American kitchens are much bigger than Japanese ones.
Artificial leather can't compare with the real thing.
chinese: 人造皮革是比不上真皮的。

english: As long as good people do nothing, evil will triumph.
chinese: 只要好人袖手旁观，恶人就会得胜。

english: Australia is the world's fifth-largest coal producer.
chinese: 澳大利亚是世界第五大煤炭产地。

english: Because there was traffic, I was late to the meeting.
chinese: 因为堵车， 我开会迟到了。

english: Can you wake me up at seven o'clock tomorrow morning?
chinese: 你明天早上七点可不可以叫我起床。

english: Cutting a cake into equal pieces is rather difficult.
Do you feel like you can't connect with other people?
chinese: 您觉得您无法与他人交流吗？

english: Do you know why spring rolls are called spring rolls?
chinese: 你知道春卷为什么叫春卷吗？

english: Don't throw out this magazine. I haven't read it yet.
chinese: 这本杂志不要扔。我还没看呢。

english: English is spoken in many countries around the world.
chinese: 全世界许多国家的人说英语。

english: Every morning we take the dog for a walk in the park.
chinese: 我们每天早上到公园里遛狗。

english: Everyone but Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: Feel free to get yourself a drink if you are thirsty.
Fresh fruits and vegetables are good for your health.
chinese: 新鲜水果和蔬菜有益健康。

english: Having met the girl before, I recognized her at once.
chinese: 因为曾遇见过那个女孩，我马上就认出来了。

english: He does nothing but complain from morning till night.
chinese: 他从早到晚只是在抱怨。

english: He's not such a great writer and I think he knows it.
chinese: 他不是那么出色的作家我想他知道这一点。

english: How long did it take you to finish reading that book?
chinese: 你看完这本书要多少时间？

english: How much of what I've written here do you understand?
chinese: 你了解多少我写在这里的东西?

english: I admit that I'm not the tidiest person in the world.
chinese: 我承认，我不是世界上最整洁的人。

english: I don't think that I'll be able to get there on time.
chinese: 我估计我无法及时赶到。

english: I don't think that it's going to be easy to find Tom.
chinese: 我认为，要找到汤姆可不容易。

english: I don't understand why pepperoni pizza is so popular.
chinese: 我不懂为何义式辣肠披萨如此受欢迎。

english: I get the feeling you're trying to tell me something.
chinese: 我感觉你想告诉我什么事。

english: I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.
chinese: 当雨开始下得很大的时候, 我几乎不能出门了。

english: I hear you passed the entrance exam. Congratulations!
chinese: 我听说你通过了入学考试。恭喜你了！

english: I know I left it somewhere down here in the basement.
chinese: 我知道我把它放在地下室的某个地方了。

english: I must think over the matter before giving my answer.
chinese: 我在回答之前必须考虑周全。

english: I need you to promise you'll do what I ask you to do.
chinese: 我需要你承诺你会照我说的话去做。

english: I shouldn't have eaten the whole bag of potato chips.
chinese: 我不该把一整包薯片都吃完的。

english: I think that it's unlikely that Tom will get elected.
chinese: 我觉得汤姆不太可能会当选。

english: I was the second to last person to hear the bad news.
chinese: 我是倒数第二个得知这个坏消息的。

english: I worked in a post office during the summer vacation.
chinese: 暑假期间，我在邮局工作。

english: I'd like to try this on. Where are the fitting rooms?
chinese: 我想试试这件。请问哪里是试衣间？

english: I'll arrange for someone to pick you up at your home.
chinese: 我会安排一下，叫个人去你家接你。

english: I'm now rich enough to afford to get anything I want.
chinese: 我现在有钱，能想买就买。

english: If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
chinese: 如果有问题，请举起你的右手。

english: If you need my advice, I'd be glad to give it to you.
chinese: 如果你需要我的建议，我很愿意告诉你。

english: If you pass this test, you could graduate next month.
chinese: 如果你通过这个考试，你下个月就可以毕业了。

english: In a crisis, you must get in touch with your teacher.
chinese: 在危险的时候你必须跟你的老师联系。

english: Investigating the causes of cancer is very expensive.
chinese: 有关癌症成因的研究耗费颇巨。

english: Is there any chance that Tom isn't going to be there?
chinese: 有没有可能汤姆不会去那儿？

english: It is said that his father died in a foreign country.
chinese: 据说他爸爸在外国去世了。

english: It looks like Tom will do what we've asked him to do.
chinese: 看来汤姆会按我们要求的去做。

english: It makes no difference to me whether he comes or not.
chinese: 他来不来对我来说没区别。

english: It seems to me that she has a tendency to exaggerate.
chinese: 在我看来，她有一种夸张的倾向。

english: It takes us a long time to master a foreign language.
chinese: 精通一门外语需要很长时间。

english: It was so still that you would have heard a pin drop.
chinese: 安静到连针掉在地上的声音你都会听得到。

english: It's absolutely impossible for me to go on like this.
chinese: 让我像这样继续下去是绝对不可能的。

english: It's been a long time since I've had a real vacation.
chinese: 好久没有休一个真正的假期了。

english: Let me read the paper when you have finished with it.
Mary is not poor. On the contrary, she is quite rich.
chinese: 玛丽不穷，相反，她相当富裕。

english: More than 40 percent of students go on to university.
My father has been in good shape since his operation.
chinese: 自从手术后，我父亲一直处于良好的状态。

english: My father insisted that I should go to see the place.
chinese: 我爸爸坚持要我去那地方看看。

english: My father will often read the newspaper during meals.
chinese: 我父亲常在吃饭时看报纸。

english: My grandpa believes that the moon landing was a hoax.
chinese: 我的祖父相信登月是一个骗局。

english: My uncle's company launched a new product last month.
chinese: 舅舅的公司上个月推出了一款新产品。

english: No one is working. Everyone's watching the World Cup.
chinese: 谁也不工作。大家在看世界杯。

english: People usually don't like what they don't understand.
chinese: 人们通常不喜欢他们不理解的事物。

english: Pigs share certain characteristics with human beings.
chinese: 猪与人类的一些特性相同。

english: She lost her way and on top of that it began to rain.
chinese: 她迷路了，紧接着天开始下雨了。

english: She ran very fast to catch up with the other members.
chinese: 她跑得很快是为了赶上其他成员。

english: She speaks English better than any of her classmates.
chinese: 她的英语说得比班上任何人都好。

english: She was a tall, thin girl with long, soft brown hair.
chinese: 她是个又高又瘦, 留著一头又长又软的褐色头发的女孩。

english: She will return home next Sunday, that is, the tenth.
chinese: 她下周日回家，也就是10号。

english: She's practicing English so she can get a better job.
chinese: 她练习英语以找更好的工作。

english: Since he didn't know what to say, he remained silent.
chinese: 自从他不知道该说什么的时候，便一直沉默着。

english: Since he is old, this task must be difficult for him.
chinese: 他老了，所以这任务对他来说一定很难。

english: Some chewing gum was stuck to the sole of Tom's shoe.
chinese: 汤姆的鞋底粘了口香糖。

english: The Tigers lost the game, which was a surprise to us.
chinese: 我们觉得很惊讶老虎队竟然输掉了比赛。

english: The bridge will be completed by the end of this year.
The bus stopped suddenly in the middle of the street.
chinese: 公车突然在路中央停下来。

english: The girl was sobbing in the corner of the schoolroom.
chinese: 女孩在教室的角落啜泣。

english: The hallway needs to be wide enough for a wheelchair.
The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.
chinese: 最后一个听我说我的主意的人认为我疯了。

english: The police will put you behind bars for twenty years.
chinese: 警方会把你关在牢里二十年。

english: The prince fell in love with a woodcutter's daughter.
chinese: 王子爱上了一个樵夫的女儿。

english: The teacher demonstrated the idea with an experiment.
chinese: 这位老师用试验论证了这个想法。

english: The teacher lined the children up in order of height.
chinese: 老师按照身高给孩子们排队。

english: There was some chewing gum on the sole of Tom's shoe.
chinese: 汤姆的鞋底粘了口香糖。

english: There's nothing more painful than losing one's child.
chinese: 没有比失去孩子更伤心的事。

english: They say she and her husband can't agree on anything.
chinese: 他们说她和她的丈夫不可能对任何事达成协议。

english: They will hold a meeting at 2 o'clock this afternoon.
chinese: 他们今天下午2点会举行一个会议。

english: This is where I want to live for the rest of my life.
chinese: 这里是我余生想待的地方

english: This storm is not dangerous. You don't need to worry.
chinese: 这场暴风雨并不危险。你不用担心。

english: Tom and Mary even always wear the same color clothes.
chinese: 汤姆和玛丽甚至经常穿同样颜色的衣服。

english: Tom bought a camera at a store not too far from here.
chinese: Tom在离这里不远的一家商店里买了一台相机。

english: Tom came a little earlier today than he usually does.
chinese: 汤姆今天来得比往常要早一些。

english: Tom could write his name when he was three years old.
chinese: 汤姆三岁的时候就能写自己的名字了。

english: Tom cut down the tree that was in front of his house.
Tom didn't know what he'd done was against the rules.
chinese: 汤姆不知道他的所作所为违反了规则。

english: Tom didn't like the idea of Mary going out with John.
chinese: 汤姆希望玛丽不会跟约翰谈恋爱。

english: Tom is already here, but Mary hasn't gotten here yet.
chinese: 汤姆已经在这里了，但玛丽还没到。

english: Tom ran out of matches so he couldn't light the fire.
chinese: 汤姆用尽了火柴，不能点火了。

english: Tom said he thought that would probably never happen.
chinese: 汤姆说他觉得那可能永远不会发生了。

english: Tom said that he had been cleaning the house all day.
chinese: 汤姆说他打扫屋子打扫了一天。

english: Tom said that he thought that he should study French.
chinese: 汤姆说他觉得他该学法语。

english: Tom told me that he has no intention of marrying you.
chinese: Tom告诉我他们有想要娶你的想法。

english: Tom won't tell Mary the real reason that he did that.
chinese: 汤姆不会告诉玛丽他做那件事的真实原因。

english: We are looking forward to seeing you and your family.
chinese: 我们很期待见到您和您的家人。

english: We have three spare rooms, none of which can be used.
chinese: 虽然有三间空屋，但哪间都用不了。

english: We have to look into the disappearance of the doctor.
chinese: 我们必须调查医生的失踪案。

english: We just have to make sure Tom is planning to be here.
chinese: 我们只是需要确认Tom有要来这。

english: We looked out the window, but we didn't see anything.
chinese: 我们看了窗外，但什么都没看见。

english: We were granted the privilege of fishing in this bay.
chinese: 我们得到了在这个海湾内捕鱼的特权。

english: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.
chinese: 我要说的只能是你知我知。

english: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.
chinese: 我要告诉你的只能你我知道。

english: What is learned in the cradle is carried to the tomb.
What is learned in the cradle is carried to the tomb.
chinese: 幼年时学的东西，一辈子不会忘记。

english: Whether he comes or not, the result will be the same.
chinese: 他来还是不来，结果是一样的。

english: Whichever route you take, you will get there in time.
chinese: 不管你选哪条路，你都能按时到那里。

english: Why have you been late to school every day this week?
chinese: 为什么你这个礼拜每天上学都迟到？

english: Would you like to go for a drink or something to eat?
chinese: 你想出去喝几杯或吃个饭吗？

english: You don't have to go to the party unless you want to.
chinese: 除非你想去, 否则你不必去这个派对。

english: You look tired. You ought to rest for an hour or two.
chinese: 你看起来很累。你应该休息一两个小时。

english: You should look after the children from time to time.
You're the one who suggested that we travel together.
chinese: 你是那个建议我们一起旅行的人。

english: After a couple of drinks, the guy was feeling no pain.
chinese: 喝了几杯酒后，这个家伙就感觉不痛了。

english: An argument may be logically sound without being true.
chinese: 不正确的命题听起来可能符合逻辑。

english: Apparently, there is nothing that cannot happen today.
chinese: 显然，今天什么事都有可能发生。

english: As I told you before, you have to do that by yourself.
chinese: 我之前跟你说过，那个你必须自己做。

english: As we went around the corner, the lake came into view.
chinese: 当我们走到转角处，湖就映入了眼帘。

english: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.
chinese: 以前读高中的时候﹐我每天早上六点起床。

english: Before he went fishing, he dug up some worms for bait.
chinese: 出去钓鱼前，他挖出一些虫子当饵。

english: Besides the piano, can you play any other instruments?
chinese: 除了钢琴以外，还会玩什么乐器吗？

english: Between you and me, I don't like our new team captain.
chinese: 我就只告诉你，我不喜欢我们的新队长。

english: Blow out all the candles on the birthday cake at once.
chinese: 一口气吹灭生日蛋糕上所有的蜡烛。

english: Could you please pull the weeds and water the flowers?
chinese: 你可不可以帮忙除草浇花？

english: Could you possibly suggest a way to solve the problem?
chinese: 你能提出解决问题的方法吗？

english: Do you have an extra English dictionary by any chance?
chinese: 您碰巧有一本额外的英文字典吗？

english: Don't throw away this magazine. I haven't read it yet.
chinese: 这本杂志不要扔。我还没看呢。

english: English is a very important language in today's world.
chinese: 英语是当今世界上一种非常重要的语言。

english: Everybody but Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are pliable.
chinese: 事实是倔强的，但统计是柔顺的。

english: Generally speaking, men can run faster than women can.
chinese: 一般来说, 男人比女人跑得快。

english: Give me the book back once you've finished reading it.
chinese: 在你读完后，把书还给我。

english: He had his sister help him paint the wall of his room.
chinese: 他让妹妹帮他涂他房间的墙。

english: He is doing very well considering he lacks experience.
chinese: 考虑到他缺乏经验，他做得[已经]非常好了。

english: He made use of the opportunity to improve his English.
chinese: 他利用这个机会提高英语水平。

english: He quickly accustomed himself to his new surroundings.
chinese: 他很快就适应了新环境。

english: He quickly made friends with the new boy on the block.
chinese: 他很快便与小区里新来的男孩交上了朋友。

english: He took care of the business after his father's death.
chinese: 在他父亲死后，他接管了公司。

english: How long does it take from here to your house on foot?
chinese: 从这里步行到你家要多长时间？

english: How long does it take to walk to your house from here?
chinese: 从这里步行到你家要多长时间？

english: How many times a minute does the average person blink?
chinese: 人平均一分钟眨几次眼睛？

english: I admit that this may not be the best way of doing it.
chinese: 我承认这可能不是最好的方法。

english: I am convinced that things will change for the better.
chinese: 我深信事情会往更好的方向转变。

english: I can't understand why Tom doesn't want to go with us.
chinese: 我不理解为什么汤姆不想和我们一起走。

english: I didn't know who was going to meet me at the airport.
chinese: 我不知道谁会在机场见我。

english: I had been in the army for a month when the war ended.
chinese: 战争结束的时候，我已经在军队里待了一个月。

english: I just wanted to prove to myself that I could do this.
chinese: 我只想向自己证明我可以做到。

english: I still haven't told Tom why I didn't have to do that.
chinese: 我还没跟汤姆说我为什么不用做。

english: I suggest we drink as little as possible to be polite.
chinese: 我建议，为了礼貌起见，我们尽可能少喝。

english: I think I now have enough money to buy the car I want.
chinese: 我认为我现在有足够的钱买我想要的那辆车。

english: I think that everyone should study a foreign language.
chinese: 我认为大家都应该学另外一种语言。

english: I took him to the most expensive restaurant on campus.
chinese: 我把他带到校区里最贵的餐馆去了。

english: I was caught in a shower and got drenched to the skin.
chinese: 我遇上了阵雨被淋得全身湿透。

english: I was searched by the customs officers at the airport.
chinese: 我在机场被海关人员搜查。

english: I wouldn't be too surprised if this song became a hit.
chinese: 如果这歌成名，我不会太惊讶。

english: I'll lend you the book as soon as I'm done reading it.
chinese: 我一把这本书读完了就借给你。

english: I'll never tell anyone where I've hidden the treasure.
chinese: 我不会把藏宝的地方告诉任何人。

english: I'm going to run a couple of errands. Wanna tag along?
chinese: 我要去购物。你要跟着来吗？

english: I'm pretty sure Tom is the only one who can't do that.
chinese: 我确信汤姆是唯一不会那么做的人。

english: I'm sure you'll love what we have on the menu tonight.
chinese: 我肯定你会喜欢我们今晚的菜肴。

english: If I lost my key, I wouldn't be able to lock the door.
chinese: 如果我弄丢了我的钥匙，我就无法锁门了。

english: If I were invisible, I wouldn't have to wear anything.
chinese: 若我是隐形的，就不用穿衣服了。

english: If I were to tell you all I know, you would be amazed.
chinese: 要是我告诉你我所知的一切，你会被惊呆的。

english: If for some reason I'm late, please don't wait for me.
chinese: 万一我来晚的话，就别等我了。

english: If he is innocent, it follows that his wife is guilty.
chinese: 如果他是清白的，那他妻子就有罪。

english: In case I can't come, I'll give you a call beforehand.
chinese: 万一来不了，我会先给你打电话。

english: In recent years, science has made remarkable progress.
chinese: 这几年，科学取得了显著的进步。

english: Is there any chance you'll go to Australia next month?
chinese: 你有机会下个月去澳大利亚吗？

english: Is there anything you want to add to what I just said?
chinese: 我刚才说的内容，你想补充么？

english: It goes without saying that money can't buy happiness.
chinese: 不言自明，金钱买不到幸福。

english: It is close to eleven. It's about time we went to bed.
chinese: 快11点了。我们该上床睡觉了。

english: It seems that most people only barbeque in the summer.
chinese: 人们似乎只在夏天烤肉。

english: It would be better if you stayed here a little longer.
chinese: 你最好在这里待久一点。

english: It's quite difficult to master French in 2 or 3 years.
It's quite difficult to master French in 2 or 3 years.
chinese: 两三年就想掌握法语是很困难的。

english: Make sure to turn off all the lights before going out.
chinese: 出去之前确认一下所有的灯都关了。

english: Mary has a bad back. It's hard for her to lift things.
chinese: 玛丽的背不好, 她很难把东西举起来。

english: Mary said that she loved me, but I didn't believe her.
chinese: 玛丽说她爱我，但是我并不相信她所说的话。

english: Modern technology has made our lives more comfortable.
chinese: 现代科学技术让我们的生活更加舒适。

english: More than 40 percent of the students go to university.
My father took out his wallet and gave me ten dollars.
chinese: 我爸爸拿出他的钱包，并给了我10美元。

english: My husband reads the newspaper while eating breakfast.
chinese: 我丈夫一边吃早餐一边读报纸。

english: Once in a while, we should take a step back and think.
chinese: 有时候，我们应该后退一步想一想。

english: Philosophy is not a thing one can learn in six months.
chinese: 哲学不是我们用六个月就能学的东西。

english: Please bring us two cups of tea and one cup of coffee.
chinese: 请来两杯茶和一杯咖啡。

english: Please have a seat and wait until your name is called.
chinese: 请在被叫到名字之前坐在椅子上等候。

english: Please replace the empty ink cartridge in the printer.
chinese: 请把打印机里面的空的墨粉鼓换掉。

english: Seen from the sky, the river looked like a huge snake.
chinese: 从天上看下来，这条河像一条巨蛇。

english: She asked him why he was crying, but he didn't answer.
chinese: 她问他为什么哭，但他没有回应。

english: She covered the mouthpiece of the phone with her hand.
chinese: 她用手捂住了电话的话筒。

english: She gave birth to her first child at twenty years old.
chinese: 她在二十岁的时候生下第一个孩子。

english: That was the first time that a man walked on the moon.
chinese: 那是人类第一次在月球上行走。

english: That wasn't the main reason why Tom needed to do that.
chinese: 这不是汤姆要做那件事的主要原因。

english: The bus is full. You'll have to wait for the next one.
chinese: 这班公车客满了。你必须等下一班。

english: The movie is worth seeing at least two or three times.
chinese: 这部电影至少值得看两三遍。

english: The policeman told me that the last bus leaves at ten.
chinese: 警察告诉我巴士的末班车在十点出发。

english: The professor spoke too fast for anyone to understand.
chinese: 那个教授讲得太快了，没有一个人听得懂。

english: The rugged terrain made the troops' advance difficult.
chinese: 地面高低不平，给部队前进带来了困难。

english: The young man saved the girl from a bunch of hoodlums.
chinese: 该名青年将少女从流氓团伙中救了出来。

english: Their contract is to run out at the end of this month.
chinese: 他们的合同在这个月底到期。

english: There are subtle differences between the two pictures.
chinese: 这两张图片之间有细致的差异。

english: There aren't any medicines that can cure this disease.
chinese: 没有药物能够治疗这种疾病。

english: There is a bookstore in front of the department store.
There used to be a big pine tree in front of my house.
chinese: 以前我家前面有棵大松树。

english: There was a sudden drop in the temperature last night.
chinese: 昨天晚上气温突然下降

english: They supplied the soldiers with enough food and water.
chinese: 他们给士兵提供了充足的食物和水。

english: This is considered to be a matter of great importance.
This kind of plant grows only in the tropical regions.
chinese: 这类植物只生长在热带地区。

english: This laboratory is equipped with the latest computers.
chinese: 这个实验室配备了最新的计算机。

english: Tom and I have decided to go to Australia next summer.
chinese: 汤姆和我决定下个夏天去澳大利亚。

english: Tom could have dealt with the problem in a better way.
chinese: 汤姆本可以用更好的方式处理问题。

english: Tom couldn't get to sleep till after three last night.
chinese: 汤姆昨晚三点多才睡着。

english: Tom couldn't go to the concert because he had to work.
chinese: 汤姆去不了音乐会，因为他得工作。

english: Tom didn't seem to want to tell me why he'd done that.
chinese: 汤姆似乎不想告诉我为什么他要那样做。

english: Tom doesn't know the difference between Iraq and Iran.
chinese: 汤姆不知道伊拉克和伊朗有什么区别。

english: Tom doesn't like people who smoke in no smoking areas.
chinese: 汤姆讨厌在禁烟区吸烟的人。

english: Tom dragged himself out of bed and put on his clothes.
chinese: 汤姆从床上爬起来，穿上了衣服。

english: Tom got so absorbed in his work that he forgot to eat.
chinese: 汤姆太专注于他的工作，以至于忘了吃饭。

english: Tom never felt comfortable expressing his own opinion.
chinese: 汤姆在表达自己的意见的时候总是很慌张。

english: Tom poured cold water over himself to wake himself up.
chinese: 汤姆给自己浇凉水以清醒过来。

english: Tom probably doesn't know why the picnic was canceled.
chinese: 汤姆大概不知道为什么野餐取消了。

english: Tom quietly opened the door and tiptoed into the room.
chinese: 汤姆悄悄地打开了门，蹑手蹑脚地走进了房间。

english: Tom said that Mary was probably still studying French.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽可能还在学法语。

english: Tom told Mary he couldn't do what she asked him to do.
chinese: 汤姆告诉玛丽他不能做她要他做的事。

english: Tom was able to go to college thanks to a scholarship.
chinese: 因为一份奖学金，Tom得以上大学。

english: We should approach this problem from different angles.
chinese: 我们应该用各种不同的角度看待此问题

english: We will have learned English for five years next year.
chinese: 到明年我们学英语就有5年了。

english: Were you able to do everything you wanted to get done?
chinese: 你是不是有能力做到你想要完成的所有事情呢？

english: When I first came back to Boston, I was really lonely.
chinese: 当我第一次回波士顿时，我真是孤独。

english: Who is in charge of the office while the boss is away?
chinese: 在主任不在的时候，办公室由谁来负责？

english: Why don't you wait here while I finish what I'm doing?
chinese: 为什么你不在这里等到我做完为止？

english: With your approval, I would like to offer him the job.
chinese: 如果您同意, 我想给他这份工作。

english: Women are not permitted to drive cars in Saudi Arabia.
chinese: 在沙特阿拉伯妇女不允许开车。

english: You continue making the same mistakes time after time.
chinese: 你每次都继续犯同样的错误。

english: You need to attach your photo to the application form.
chinese: 你必须把你的照片贴在申请书上。

english: You should've done it earlier. It can't be helped now.
chinese: 你本应该早点做的。现在已经没有任何办法了。

english: You're the one who suggested that we do that together.
chinese: 你是那个建议我们一起做那件事的人。

english: Your mother must've been beautiful when she was young.
chinese: 你母亲年轻的时候一定很美。

english: "He'd like to have a coffee after work." "I would too."
chinese: "他想在下班后喝杯咖啡。" "我也想。"

english: "How did you get my phone number?" "Tom gave it to me."
chinese: “你怎么知道我的电话号码的？” “汤姆告诉我的。”

english: According to TV news, there was a plane crash in India.
chinese: 根据电视新闻，一架飞机在印度坠毁了。

english: According to the Bible, God made the world in six days.
chinese: 根据圣经记载，上帝用6天创造了世界。

english: According to the weather forecast, it'll snow tomorrow.
chinese: 天气预报说明天会下雪。

english: After I talked with my teacher, I decided to work hard.
chinese: 跟我的老师谈过后，我决定认真努力。

english: After reading his books I feel I can construct a house.
chinese: 读完他的书后，我觉得我可以构建一栋房子。

english: All horses are animals, but not all animals are horses.
chinese: 所有的马都是动物，但并非所有的动物都是马。

english: Are there any direct flights between Boston and Sydney?
chinese: 请问波士顿和悉尼之间有直飞航班吗？

english: As far as I know, there is nothing wrong with his plan.
chinese: 据我所知，他的计划没有出差错。

english: Be sure to drop us a line as soon as you get to London.
chinese: 别忘了一到伦敦就给我们留言啊。

english: Being late is always better than not showing up at all.
Blenders are nice for people who really like smoothies.
chinese: 搅拌机对真的喜欢冰沙的人来说很不错。

english: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
chinese: 书是为了那些希望自己在另一个地方的人。

english: Did you remember that you were supposed to buy candles?
chinese: 你记得自己该买蜡烛吗？

english: Do you want to get married first or have a child first?
chinese: 你想我们先结婚还是先生孩子？

english: Don't be afraid to make mistakes when speaking English.
chinese: 说英语的时候不要怕犯错。

english: Don't be afraid to make mistakes when speaking English.
chinese: 当你说英语的时候不要怕犯错。

english: Ebola is one of the most virulent viruses known to man.
chinese: 埃博拉是人类已知的最致命的病毒之一。

english: Finishing the report by tomorrow is next to impossible.
chinese: 在明天前完成报告几乎是不可能的。

english: From the look of the sky, it may rain in the afternoon.
chinese: 从天色看起来，下午可能会下雨。

english: Fruits and vegetables are essential to a balanced diet.
chinese: 蔬果对平衡饮食必不可少。

english: Germany adopted a social security system in the 1880's.
chinese: 德国在1880年代采取了一种社会保障制度。

english: He doesn't have any knowledge about American democracy.
chinese: 他一点都不知道美国的民主。

english: He doesn't know the difference between right and wrong.
He went on reading the book as if nothing had happened.
chinese: 他继续读书，好像什么事也没有发生。

english: His record is a new world record in the 100-meter dash.
chinese: 他刷新了百米短跑的世界纪录。

english: I always have a look at the newspaper before breakfast.
chinese: 我经常在早饭前看一眼报纸。

english: I can't believe Tom was able to do this all by himself.
chinese: 没法相信，汤姆没人帮助自己一个人就做到了这些。

english: I can't survive without air conditioning in the summer.
I don't know where my crutches are. Have you seen them?
chinese: 我不知道把拐杖放哪去了，你有看到吗？

english: I don't want to go there. He doesn't want to go either.
chinese: 我不想去那儿，他也不想。

english: I felt so sleepy that I could hardly keep my eyes open.
chinese: 我感觉困得几乎不能睁开我的眼睛了。

english: I found a good place to buy fruit a couple of days ago.
chinese: 前几天我发现了一个买水果的好地方。

english: I had to study hard to keep up with the other students.
chinese: 我必须努力学习，才能追上其他学生。

english: I have a friend waiting for me in front of the library.
chinese: 在图书馆前有朋友在等我。

english: I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone knows me.
chinese: 我知道有人认识我的可能性微乎其微。

english: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.
chinese: 我期待听到你在这件事上的想法 。

english: I lost my job and I have no money. I'm at my wit's end.
chinese: 我失业又没钱。真不知该何去何从。

english: I never answer email messages from people I don't know.
chinese: 我从不回复陌生人发来的电子邮件。

english: I really look forward to your visit in the near future.
chinese: 我很期待在不久的将来您的光临。

english: I studied English for four years with a native speaker.
chinese: 我跟英语母语者学了四年英语。

english: I was quite thirsty and wanted to drink something cool.
I'm afraid I can't help you. You must ask someone else.
chinese: 我担心可能帮不了你，你需要找其他人帮忙。

english: I'm certain that Tom is the only one who won't do that.
chinese: 我确信汤姆是唯一不会那么做的人。

english: I'm surprised that you don't know about their marriage.
chinese: 我很惊讶，你竟然不知道他们结婚了。

english: If you are not going to the concert, then neither am I.
chinese: 如果你不去音乐会, 我也不去。

english: If you listen closely enough you'll be able to hear it.
chinese: 靠近一点听，你就会听到了。

english: Instead of going to Europe, I decided to go to America.
chinese: 我决定去美国，而不是欧洲。

english: Iron the inside of collars first, and then the outside.
chinese: 先熨烫领子的里面，然后是外面。

english: It goes without saying that money cannot buy happiness.
chinese: 不言自明，金钱买不到幸福。

english: It is true that television also has some disadvantages.
It might sound far-fetched, but this is a real problem.
chinese: 这可能听起来牵强，但却是个真实的问题。

english: It takes 165 years for Neptune to orbit around the sun.
chinese: 海王星绕行太阳一周要花一百六十五年。

english: It was not until I reached home that I missed my purse.
chinese: 那是在我到家以后，我才不见了我的钱包。

english: It would be wonderful if you could sing at our wedding.
chinese: 你能在我们的婚礼上唱歌就太好了。

english: It's easy to make friends, but hard to get rid of them.
chinese: 交朋友很容易, 但摆脱他们很难。

english: It's not that easy to learn a new language after fifty.
chinese: 五十岁以后学一门新的语言不是那么容易。

english: It's up to you to decide whether we'll go there or not.
chinese: 该由你来决定我们去不去那儿。

english: Just as he was going out, there was a great earthquake.
chinese: 就在他要出门的时候，发生了强震。

english: Kissing a person who smokes is like licking an ashtray.
chinese: 亲吻一个抽烟的人就像在舔烟灰缸。

english: Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest lake in the world.
chinese: 在俄罗斯的贝加尔湖是世界上最深的湖泊。

english: Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest lake in the world.
chinese: 俄罗斯的贝加尔湖是世界上最深的湖泊。

english: Let's go out and eat dinner together from time to time.
chinese: 让我们偶尔出去一起吃晚餐。

english: Many people are suffering from hunger around the world.
Meet me at the lobby of the Imperial Hotel at 6:30 p.m.
chinese: 下午六点半到帝国酒店的大堂找我。

english: Most people brush their teeth at least two times a day.
chinese: 多数人每天至少刷两次牙。

english: My brother is very important. At least he thinks he is.
chinese: 我弟弟非常重要。至少他认为他是。

english: My brother is very important. At least he thinks he is.
chinese: 我弟弟是个很重要的人物，或者说，至少他自己是这么认为的。

english: My mother happened to be there when the fire broke out.
chinese: 着火的时候我妈妈恰好在那。

english: My wife's part-time job brings in a little extra money.
chinese: 我太太兼职的工作赚进了一些额外的钱。

english: Not knowing what to do, I asked the teacher for advice.
chinese: 因为不知道做什么，所以我向老师寻求建议。

english: One hundred and fifty people entered the marathon race.
Only one third of the members turned up at the meeting.
chinese: 仅三分之一的成员出席了会议。

english: Our teacher doesn't just speak English, but French too.
chinese: 我们老师不仅说英语，还说法语。

english: Parents are responsible for their children's education.
chinese: 父母承担教育子女的责任。

english: Prince William is second in line to the English throne.
chinese: 威廉王子是英国王位第二顺位继承人

english: Several cottages have been isolated by the flood water.
chinese: 好几间小屋被洪水孤立起来了。

english: Several thousand people became victims of this disease.
She came to Japan for the purpose of studying Japanese.
chinese: 她为了学习日文来到日本。

english: She needed some money to buy something to feed her dog.
chinese: 她需要一些钱来买点东西喂她的狗。

english: Some people felt that Tom's behavior was inappropriate.
chinese: 一部分人感觉Tom的行为举止不太合适。

english: Sorry, but can you show me the way to the next village?
chinese: 能不能麻烦你告诉我去邻村怎么走？

english: That wasn't the main reason that Tom needed to do that.
chinese: 这不是汤姆要做那件事的主要原因。

english: The Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941.
chinese: 日本人在一九四一年十二月七日袭击珍珠港。

english: The Japanese military forces seemed too strong to stop.
chinese: 日本军队看来强大得不可阻挡。

english: The child had no overcoat on although it was very cold.
chinese: 尽管天气很冷，孩子却没有大衣穿。

english: The crane, unlike the dog, has never dreamed of flying.
chinese: 不像狗, 这只鹤从来没有梦想过飞翔。

english: The friend who I thought would pass the exam failed it.
chinese: 那个我认为会通过考试的朋友失败了。

english: The government should invest more money in agriculture.
chinese: 政府应该加大对农业的投资。

english: The leader governed his country for more than 50 years.
chinese: 这位领导人统治了他的国家五十年。

english: The moment I held the baby in my arms, it began to cry.
chinese: 我一把孩子抱在手里，他就开始哭了。

english: The mother missed her daughter who was away at college.
chinese: 妈妈想念她在读大学的女儿。

english: The number of people who go abroad has been increasing.
chinese: 出国的人数一直在增加。

english: The opening ceremony of the Olympics has already begun.
The other day I discovered a book written by my father.
chinese: 前几天我发现了一本我父亲写的书。

english: The police are investigating the cause of the accident.
The population of Japan is larger than that of Britain.
The radio is too loud. Can't you turn it down a little?
chinese: 收音机太响了。你不能把音量调低一点吗？

english: The recent coffee shortage brought about many problems.
chinese: 近来咖啡的短缺造成了许多问题。

english: The recent coffee shortage brought about many problems.
chinese: 最近的咖啡短缺带来了许多问题。

english: The show was very interesting. You should have seen it.
chinese: 演出真的很有意思，你该去看看的。

english: The stars are shining very brightly in the sky tonight.
chinese: 今晚的夜空星光非常明亮。

english: The sun comes up in the east and goes down in the west.
chinese: 太阳从东边升起，西边落下。

english: The weather report says we'll get three inches of snow.
chinese: 天气预报说会下三英寸雪。

english: There is a certain amount of truth in what he's saying.
chinese: 他说的话有一定的道理。

english: There is a good chance that gasoline prices will go up.
chinese: 油价上涨的可能性很高。

english: There must be a way to arrive at a diplomatic solution.
chinese: 必须有外交解决的途径。

english: They answered their teacher's question with difficulty.
chinese: 他们好不容易才回答了他们老师的问题。

english: They had their houses destroyed by a strong earthquake.
chinese: 他们的房屋被强烈地震摧毁了。

english: They obtained a yield of 8 percent on their investment.
chinese: 他们在这次的投资中得到百分之八的收益。

english: This is one of the best restaurants I've ever eaten in.
chinese: 这是我吃过的最好的餐馆之一。

english: This is the first time that I've heard of this website.
chinese: 我第一次知道这个网站。

english: Time passes quickly when we're doing something we like.
chinese: 在做喜欢的事情的时候时间过去得很快。

english: Tom asked Mary if she knew John's new telephone number.
chinese: 汤姆问玛丽是否知道琼的新电话号码。

english: Tom got the job on the strength of your recommendation.
chinese: 多亏了你的推荐，汤姆得到了那份工作。

english: Tom is wearing the same clothes that he wore yesterday.
chinese: 汤姆穿著昨天穿的衣服。

english: Tom knew that Mary wanted him to go to Boston with her.
chinese: 汤姆知道玛丽想让他跟著她去波士顿。

english: Tom needs to study more if he hopes to pass this class.
chinese: 汤姆如果想通过这门课，就需要加劲学习。

english: Tom seems to hardly ever get his homework done on time.
chinese: Tom似乎没办法准时完成他的作业。

english: Tom told me not to open the envelope until my birthday.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我，到我生日那天我才能打开信封。

english: Tom told me that he'd give me that book if I wanted it.
chinese: 汤姆说过，如果我想要的话他可以把这本书给我。

english: We encountered a lot of difficulties on the expedition.
chinese: 我们在探险的时候遇到了很多困难。

english: When I heard that song, it reminded me of my childhood.
chinese: 我一听到那首歌，就想起来我小的时候。

english: When she saw that they had no schools, she started one.
chinese: 当她发现他们还没有学校，她就办了一个。

english: When we're children, everything around us looks so big.
chinese: 我们小时候，所有的一切对我们来说都显得那么大。。。

english: Whether you succeed or not depends on your own efforts.
chinese: 你成功与否取决于你自身的努力。

english: Will you help me give out the programs to those people?
chinese: 你能帮我给这些人分发节目单吗？

english: Women eat lighter meals when they're eating with a guy.
chinese: 当女性跟一个男人吃饭时，女性会吃得比较少。

english: Would you like to know how to prevent getting wrinkles?
chinese: 你想要知道如何避免皱纹吗？

english: You had better read a lot of books while you are young.
chinese: 你最好在年轻的时候多读点书。

english: You won't be able to see anything without a flashlight.
chinese: 没有手电筒的话，你啥都看不到。

english: You won't be able to see anything without a flashlight.
chinese: 没有手电筒的话你什么都看不到

english: You've got to set the alarm clock before you go to bed.
chinese: 在你上床睡觉之前，你必须把闹钟设定好。

english: A capital letter is used at the beginning of a sentence.
chinese: 一个句子以一个大写字母开始。

english: A capital letter is used at the beginning of a sentence.
chinese: 一个大写字母被使用在一个句子的开头。

english: A female friend of mine loves to go to gay bars with me.
chinese: 我的一个女性朋友喜欢跟我一起去同志酒吧。

english: A glass of cold water is very refreshing in hot weather.
chinese: 一杯冷水在暑热的天气里十分提神。

english: A lot of students around the world are studying English.
chinese: 世界上许多学生正在学习英语。

english: A slip of the tongue is sometimes fatal to a politician.
chinese: 有时候口误对政治家来说是致命的。

english: America likes to claim that it is a "classless" society.
chinese: 美国是一个自称没有社会阶层的国家。

english: Apart from on rainy days, I always ride my bike to work.
chinese: 除了雨天，我都是骑车去上班的。

english: By the time Tom got home, we were already eating dinner.
chinese: 汤姆回家时我们已经在吃晚饭了。

english: Columbus argued that he could reach India by going west.
chinese: 哥伦布提出，向西航行可以到达印度。

english: Cosmetic surgery is not covered by most insurance plans.
chinese: 大部份的保险计划不包含整容手术。

english: Dad gave me a book, and my little brother gave me a pen.
chinese: 爸爸给了我一本书, 弟弟给了我一枝笔。

english: Do you keep in contact with your high school classmates?
chinese: 你还和你的高中同学保持联系吗？

english: Do you know how far it is from the station to city hall?
chinese: 你知道从火车站到市政府有多远？

english: Due to the worsening weather, the departure was delayed.
chinese: 由于天气变差，出发延迟了。

english: Everyone except Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: He always plans a thing out carefully before he does it.
chinese: 他每件事做之前都会细心计划。

english: He has just published an interesting series of articles.
chinese: 他刚发表一系列有趣的文章。

english: He hurried to the station so he wouldn't miss the train.
chinese: 为了不错过火车，他匆匆赶往了车站。

english: He visited his hometown for the first time in ten years.
chinese: 他10年中第一次访问他的故乡。

english: Her absence went unnoticed until the end of the meeting.
chinese: 直到会议结束之前都没人注意到她不在。

english: How much money will it cost to get that book translated?
How much time do you estimate it'll take you to do that?
chinese: 你估计做那件事需要花费你多少时间呢？

english: I can't believe you were the smartest kid in your class.
chinese: 我不敢相信你是你们班里面最聪明的孩子。

english: I guess that you heard about what happened this morning.
chinese: 我想你听说今天早上发生什么了。

english: I thought that I told you to stay away from my computer.
chinese: 我说过让你离我的电脑远一点的。

english: I told you not to talk about the matter in her presence.
chinese: 我跟你说过她在的时候不要说这件事。

english: I was surprised at his strong resemblance to his father.
chinese: 他像极了他父亲，这让我震惊。

english: I will only buy the car if they repair the brakes first.
chinese: 除非他们事先修好刹车，我才会买车子。

english: I'd be grateful to you if you could teach me to do that.
chinese: 如果你能教我怎么做，我会很感激。

english: I'd like to exchange this shirt that I bought yesterday.
chinese: 我想去换我昨天买的这件衬衫。

english: I'm a stranger here myself. I'm afraid I can't help you.
chinese: 我对这里不熟。恐怕我不能帮你。

english: I'm considering studying in the United States next year.
chinese: 我在考虑明年去美国学习。

english: I've always wondered what it'd be like to have siblings.
chinese: 我总是想有兄弟姐妹会怎么样。

english: If you are to know a nation, you must learn its history.
chinese: 如果想了解一个国家，就必须学习这个国家的历史。

english: If you can't come, you should let me know ahead of time.
chinese: 如果你不能来，你该让我提前知道。

english: Industry as we know it today didn't exist in those days.
chinese: 我们今天所认识的工业在那个时代不存在。

english: It is inconceivable to me that he would do such a thing.
chinese: 我不能想象他会做这种事。

english: It was before dawn that they got the fire under control.
chinese: 他们在黎明前控制住了火势。

english: It's a good thing to read good books when you are young.
chinese: 年轻的时候多看点好书是件好事。

english: It's hard to say what the weather will be like tomorrow.
chinese: 很难说明天的天气将会怎样。

english: Large houses are not necessarily comfortable to live in.
Let me remind you again that March 31st is the due date.
chinese: 让我再次提醒你3月31日是到期日。

english: Let me tell you the reasons that I don't agree with you.
chinese: 让我来告诉你我不赞成你的理由。

english: Life would be so much better if you didn't care so much.
chinese: 如果你不计较太多，生活会更容易些。

english: Mastering a foreign language involves a lot of patience.
chinese: 学好一门外语需要坚韧不拔的毅力。

english: Most people think computers will never be able to think.
chinese: 大多数人认为计算机永远不会有思考的能力。

english: Much of London was destroyed in the seventeenth century.
chinese: 伦敦许多部份在十七世纪时被摧毁。

english: My brother would often stay up all night reading novels.
chinese: 我哥哥经常熬夜看小说。

english: My father is very much involved in the stock market now.
chinese: 我爸爸现在非常专注于股市。

english: My mother has a driver's license, but she doesn't drive.
chinese: 我母亲有驾照，但是她不开车。

english: My parents have gone to the airport to see my uncle off.
chinese: 我父母去机场送我叔叔了。

english: My plan is to spend the New Year's holiday in Australia.
chinese: 我打算在澳大利亚过新年。

english: My sister is twenty-one years old and a college student.
No one noticed her absence until the end of the meeting.
chinese: 直到会议结束之前都没人注意到她不在。

english: People, old and young, all came out to greet the guests.
chinese: 无论老幼，人们都出来迎接贵客。

english: Please hide the blueberry jam where Takako can't see it.
chinese: 把蓝莓酱藏在享子看不到的地方。

english: Please send me a reply as soon as you receive this mail.
chinese: 收到此邮件后请尽快给我答复。

english: She had already gone to bed when I called her at 11 p.m.
chinese: 23点我打电话给她的时候，她已经去睡觉了。

english: She is wearing the same dress that she had on yesterday.
chinese: 她穿著跟昨天相同的衣服。

english: Some people do not like to deposit their money in banks.
chinese: 有些人不喜欢把钱存银行。

english: Sometimes I smoke just to give my hands something to do.
chinese: 有时我吸烟只是因为要给我手头点事做。

english: Thank you very much for the wonderful dinner last night.
chinese: 非常感谢您昨晚美妙的晚餐。

english: The audience was largely made up of very young children.
chinese: 大部分观众是年幼的儿童。

english: The bathtub was filled with hot water and flower petals.
chinese: 浴缸里满是热水和花瓣。

english: The captain is responsible for the safety of passengers.
chinese: 船长要为乘客安全负责。

english: The colors of the American flag are red, white and blue.
chinese: 美国国旗的颜色是红白蓝。

english: The court declared him innocent on the charge of murder.
chinese: 法庭对他的谋杀罪名作出了无罪判决。

english: The doctor insisted that the patient get plenty of rest.
chinese: 医生坚持病人获得充分的休息。

english: The only sound to be heard was the ticking of the clock.
chinese: 唯一能听到的声音是钟的滴答声。

english: The poor people were at the mercy of the cruel dictator.
chinese: 可怜的人民任凭残暴的独裁者处置。

english: The population of Shanghai is as large as that of Tokyo.
chinese: 上海的人口数量和东京相当。

english: The students were for the most part from the West Coast.
chinese: 大部分的学生来自西海岸。

english: The tourists were fascinated with the exquisite scenery.
chinese: 观光客被独特的景致所吸引。

english: There are too many people here. Let's go somewhere else.
chinese: 这里人太多了。咱们换个地方吧。

english: There was only one warden on duty when the riot started.
chinese: 暴动开始时只有一位监狱长值班。

english: There's no time to tell you everything you need to know.
chinese: 没时间告诉你一切你需要知道的事情。

english: There's something I've been meaning to discuss with you.
chinese: 有件事我一直想跟你商量。

english: These cardboard boxes are a hundred per cent recyclable.
chinese: 这些纸板盒是百分之百可回收的。

english: This is the house where I used to live when I was young.
chinese: 这是我年轻时候住的房子。

english: This is the most wonderful present I have ever received.
chinese: 这是我收过最好的礼物了。

english: This piece of music is way too difficult for me to play.
chinese: 这首曲子对我来说太难演奏了。

english: To be very honest with you, I don't think I can do that.
chinese: 和你说句实话，我觉得我做不到。

english: Tom had a pain in his chest, so he went to the hospital.
chinese: 汤姆胸痛，所以去了医院。

english: Tom still works at the same restaurant where Mary works.
chinese: 汤姆还是在玛丽工作的那家餐馆继续工作。

english: Tomorrow's weather should be sunny with occasional rain.
We all chipped in to buy our teacher a birthday present.
chinese: 我们所有人凑份子给老师买生日礼物。

english: We could stay in Boston for a few more days if you like.
chinese: 如果你愿意的话，我们可以在波士顿多待几天。

english: We have to turn in our reports by the end of this month.
chinese: 这个月底前，我们必须交报告。

english: We're all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
chinese: 我们都期待看到你和你的家人。

english: We're finding it difficult deciding on which one to buy.
chinese: 我们觉得很难决定买哪一个。

english: Which do you like better, rock music or classical music?
chinese: 你比较喜欢哪一个，摇滚乐还是古典音乐？

english: With just a little more effort, he would have succeeded.
chinese: 如果他再努力一点，就可能已经成功了。

english: Write down the medicine you need on this piece of paper.
chinese: 将你需要的药物写在这张纸上。

english: You are old enough to know better than to act like that.
chinese: 你够大了知道不要那样做。

english: You must be more careful about spelling and punctuation.
chinese: 你得要更注意拼字和标点符号。

english: You should ask your father for his advice and follow it.
chinese: 你应该问你父亲的忠告并遵守它。

english: You'd better take an umbrella with you in case it rains.
chinese: 以防下雨你最好带把伞。

english: You'll never achieve anything if you don't study harder.
chinese: 如果你不更加努力地学习, 你将永远不会有所成就。

english: "When will you be back?" "It all depends on the weather."
chinese: “你什么时候回来？”“这都要看天气。”

english: "When will you be back?" "It all depends on the weather."
chinese: “你什么时候回来呀？”“看一下天气怎么样再说啦。”

english: A burglar broke into my house while I was away on a trip.
chinese: 一个入室盗窃者趁我去旅游的时候闯入了我家。

english: A few minutes after he finished his work, he went to bed.
chinese: 他完成工作几分钟后，就去睡觉了。

english: A girl gave me an orange in exchange for a piece of cake.
chinese: 有个女生用一个橙子跟我换了一块蛋糕。

english: About how much will I have to pay for all the treatments?
chinese: 所有的医药费我大概要付多少？

english: Actinium was discovered by André-Louis Debierne in 1899.
Action speaks louder than words, but not nearly as often.
chinese: 行胜于言，但并不是所有情况都是这样。

english: All you have to do is push this button to take a picture.
chinese: 你要做的就是按这个按钮拍照。

english: Almost everyone in our village is related to one another.
chinese: 我们村里所有的村民几乎彼此都是亲戚。

english: Banks charge higher interest on loans to risky customers.
chinese: 银行对风险客户收取较高的贷款利息。

english: Children should keep away from the river. It's dangerous.
chinese: 儿童应该远离河流。有危险。

english: Don't forget to come and pick me up at the train station.
English is spoken by more people than any other language.
chinese: 说英语的人比说任何其他语言的人多。

english: Every day I waited for her at the bookstore after school.
chinese: 我每天放学后都在书店等她。

english: Everybody except Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.
chinese: 除了汤姆以外任何人都知道他没必要这么做。

english: He is proud of having been educated in the United States.
chinese: 他对自己在美国读过书这件事感到很骄傲。

english: I came to this country for the purpose of studying music.
chinese: 我来这个国家的目的是学习音乐。

english: I can't look at this painting without thinking of my mom.
chinese: 我无法看著这幅画而不想起我母亲。

english: I chose this topic because I think that it's interesting.
chinese: 我选这个主题是因为我觉得它很有意思。

english: I don't know about the others, but as for me, I'm for it.
chinese: 我不知道别人如何，但就我而论，我支持。

english: I think that our team is going to continue to get better.
chinese: 我觉得我们团队会继续变好。

english: I told Tom that I thought his house needed to be painted.
chinese: 我告诉汤姆我认为他的房子要刷漆。

english: I took it for granted that she would come to our wedding.
chinese: 我理所当然地认为她会参加我们的结婚典礼。

english: I tried very hard to put an end to their heated argument.
chinese: 我努力地平息他们不断加温的争执。

english: I want to move out of this cramped room as soon as I can.
chinese: 我想尽快从这个不透气的屋子里出去。

english: I would like to have a look at your collection of stamps.
chinese: 我想看看您的邮票收藏。

english: I'll never forget shaking the President's hand last year.
chinese: 我决不会忘记去年与总统握手的情景。

english: I'm not a university student, but I'm brighter than them.
chinese: 我不是一个大学生, 但我比他们更聪明。

english: If there's anything urgent, you can get in touch with me.
chinese: 紧急情况下，您可以联系我。

english: If you do not have this program, you can download it now.
chinese: 假如你没有这个程序，你现在就可以去下载。

english: If you would move over, there would be room for everyone.
chinese: 如果您移过去一点, 每个人就可以有空间了。

english: In case of fire, break the glass and push the red button.
chinese: 万一发生火灾，打碎玻璃并按下红色按钮。

english: In the end, we ended up eating at that shabby restaurant.
chinese: 结果，我们在那破破烂烂的餐馆里吃了饭。

english: It is very expensive to keep up with the latest fashions.
chinese: 跟上最近潮流时尚是件非常花钱的事儿。

english: It's gravity that makes satellites move around the Earth.
chinese: 让卫星环绕地球的是重力。

english: Mary isn't really sick. She's just pretending to be sick.
chinese: 玛丽不是真病。她只是装病。

english: Mary isn't really sick. She's only pretending to be sick.
chinese: 玛丽不是真病。她只是装病。

english: More than 40 percent of the students go on to university.
My father is always poking his nose into my private life.
chinese: 我的父亲总是干涉我的私生活。

english: No other mountain in the world is as tall as Mt. Everest.
chinese: 世界上任何山峰都达不到珠穆朗玛峰的高度。

english: No other mountain in the world is so high as Mt. Everest.
chinese: 世界上任何山峰都达不到珠穆朗玛峰的高度。

english: Please excuse me for calling you so early in the morning.
chinese: 原谅我早上这么早给你打电话。

english: She tried to lift the box, but found it impossible to do.
chinese: 她试了试举起箱子，但举不起来。

english: She would often go to the theater when she was in London.
chinese: 她在伦敦的时候，曾经常去剧院。

english: Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
chinese: 谢谢那天晚上请我吃了饭。

english: The company suffered a loss of one billion yen last year.
chinese: 那家公司去年亏损了10亿日元。

english: The date of the festival coincides with that of the exam.
chinese: 节日和考试碰巧在同一天。

english: The gate is so narrow that the car can't pass through it.
chinese: 门太窄了，这辆车通不过。

english: The nearest star to our solar system is Proxima Centauri.
chinese: 离我们太阳系最近的恒星是比邻星。

english: The train was so crowded that I had to stand all the way.
chinese: 这班火车如此的拥挤以至于我整个车程都必须站著。

english: They are leaving in three days, that is to say June 10th.
chinese: 他们将在三天后离开, 那也就是说在六月十日。

english: They referred to Chaucer as the father of English poetry.
chinese: 他们视乔叟为英诗之父。

english: They were forced to kill and eat several of their horses.
chinese: 他们被迫杀掉他们的几匹马来吃。

english: This is the last time I'll ask you to do anything for me.
chinese: 这是我最后一次让你为我做点事了。

english: To tell you the truth, this is a little too spicy for me.
chinese: 说实话，这对我来说有点太辣了。

english: Tom did a good job predicting who would win the election.
chinese: 汤姆很会预测选举结果。

english: Tom doesn't have any friends who are willing to help him.
chinese: 汤姆没有愿意帮助他的朋友。

english: Tom is wearing the same clothes he was wearing yesterday.
chinese: 汤姆穿著昨天穿的衣服。

english: Tom probably doesn't know how to do that as well as Mary.
chinese: 汤姆可能不知道如何像玛丽一样做得好。

english: Tom said that he thought that Mary was unhappy in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆说他以为玛丽在波士顿不快乐。

english: Tom used a fire extinguisher to try and put the fire out.
chinese: 汤姆试著用灭火器把火扑灭。

english: Tom was sitting alone at one of the tables near the door.
chinese: 汤姆独自坐在门边一个桌子旁。

english: Tsunamis swept through rice fields and flooded the towns.
chinese: 海啸席卷稻田, 淹没了城镇。

english: We are all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
chinese: 我们都期待看到你和你的家人。

english: We are here in the name of Jesus Christ and King Charles.
chinese: 我们这里以耶稣基督和查理斯国王之名。

english: We need you to tell us why you were absent all last week.
chinese: 我们要你告诉我们你为什么整个上周都缺勤。

english: We often hear it said that the Japanese are good workers.
chinese: 我们经常听说日本人工作勤奋。

english: What have you done with my pen? It was here a minute ago.
chinese: 你把我的钢笔怎么了? 一分钟前它还在这里。

english: When he shouted, the veins in his neck stood out clearly.
chinese: 他大喊的时候，脖子上青筋暴起。

english: Will it be necessary for us to buy a book for this class?
chinese: 我们有必要为上这门课买本教材吗？

english: Would it be ethical to sacrifice one person to save many?
chinese: 为了救许多人牺牲一个人是否道德？

english: You cannot purchase this medicine without a prescription.
chinese: 那个药的话没有处方是买不到的。

english: You have changed so much that I can hardly recognize you.
chinese: 你变了那么多，以至于我几乎认不出你了。

english: You have no right to interfere in other people's affairs.
chinese: 你没有干涉他人事务的权力。

english: You never get a second chance to make a first impression.
chinese: 你永远没有第二次机会去打造第一印象。

english: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.
chinese: 你应该早点做的。现在没人可以帮你。

english: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.
chinese: 你本应该早点做的。现在已经没有任何办法了。

english: You've both been very impressive today. I'm proud of you.
chinese: 今天你们俩很让人印象深刻。我为你们感到骄傲。

english: "What would you like to buy?" "I would like to buy a dog."
A little walk will give you a good appetite for breakfast.
chinese: 散散步将会给你很好的食欲吃早餐。

english: A true scientist would not approach the question this way.
chinese: 真正的科学家不会这样去思考。

english: According to the Bible, God created the world in six days.
chinese: 根据圣经记载，上帝用6天创造了世界。

english: After climbing Mt. Fuji, I got the inspiration for a poem.
chinese: 攀登富士山后，我得到了一首诗的灵感。

english: After running up the hill, I was completely out of breath.
chinese: 跑上山后，我完全喘不过气来。

english: All you have to do is to write your name and address here.
chinese: 你只要在这里写下你的姓名和地址就行了。

english: Although I enjoy bowling, I haven't gone bowling recently.
chinese: 虽然我享受打保龄球，但是我最近没有去打保龄球。

english: Be careful not to drive the wrong way on a one-way street.
chinese: 小心不要在单行道逆向行驶。

english: Between you and me, I'm going to quit my present job soon.
chinese: 我只跟你说，我很快就要辞掉我现在的工作了。

english: Blondes earn 7% more than women with any other hair color.
chinese: 金发女郎比其他颜色头发的女人多赚7％。

english: Both of Tom's parents passed away when he was quite young.
chinese: 汤姆很小的时候父母就都去世了。

english: Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work.
chinese: 电脑可以做极为复杂的工作。

english: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?
chinese: 你真的需要提问题来知道答案吗？

english: Ebola spreads from person to person through bodily fluids.
chinese: 埃博拉通过体液在人与人之间传播。

english: For the time being, I must share this room with my friend.
chinese: 眼下我不得不和我朋友同住这间房间。

english: France is running a welfare state it can no longer afford.
chinese: 法国是一个福利国家，但它却不再能够负担得起了。

english: He is a man of few words, but he always keeps his promise.
chinese: 他这个人话不多，但总是遵守诺言。

english: He is numbered among the greatest scientists in the world.
chinese: 他是世界上最伟大的科学家之一。

english: He owes his success both to working hard and to good luck.
chinese: 他的成功要归结于他的辛勤工作和好运气。

english: He was discovered unconscious on the floor of the kitchen.
chinese: 他被人发现倒在厨房的地板上，不省人事。

english: How long does it take to go from here to the Hilton Hotel?
chinese: 从这里到希尔顿饭店要花多久时间？

english: However hard I try, I can't do it any better than she can.
chinese: 无论我多么努力尝试，我都无法做到比她更好。
