english: I don't like being the one who always has to milk the cow.
chinese: 我不喜欢做那个总是挤牛奶的人。

english: I got over the difficulty with my characteristic tenacity.
I had hoped that my mother would live until I got married.
chinese: 我曾经希望我妈妈能活到我结婚的时候。

english: I had to abstain from smoking while I was in the hospital.
chinese: 在医院的时候，我不得不戒烟。

english: I have made up my mind to achieve my goals in three years.
chinese: 我下定决心要在三年之内达成目标。

english: I have so many clothes I don't know what to wear tomorrow.
chinese: 我有那么多衣服，以至于我不知道明天穿什么了。

english: I need you to promise that you'll do what I ask you to do.
chinese: 我需要你承诺你会照我说的话去做。

english: I think skateboards are usually cheaper than rollerblades.
chinese: 我觉得一般滑板比轮滑鞋便宜。

english: I'd gladly pay more for something if it's of high quality.
chinese: 如果它是高品质的东西我会很乐意多付一点钱。

english: I'd like to have this meat dish with your best white wine.
chinese: 我想喝著你最好的白酒吃这肉。

english: I'm sorry I wasn't able to see you when you came by today.
chinese: 我很抱歉今天您来的时候没能见您。

english: I've always wanted to be a professional basketball player.
chinese: 我一直想成为一名职业篮球运动员。

english: I've never been to New York, and my sister hasn't, either.
chinese: 我从没去过纽约，我妹妹也没有。

english: If you want to know a country, you must learn its history.
chinese: 如果想了解一个国家，就必须学习这个国家的历史。

english: In her opinion, he is the best musician she has ever seen.
chinese: 她认为他是她所见过最好的音乐家。

english: In the Edo period, moon-viewing parties were very popular.
chinese: 在江户时代赏月的宴会非常受欢迎。

english: Indigenous Australians have eaten kangaroos for millennia.
chinese: 澳大利亚土著已经吃了上千年袋鼠。

english: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.
chinese: 该由你来决定我们去不去那儿。

english: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.
chinese: 我们去不去那儿由你来决定。

english: It says in the Bible, "Man shall not live on bread alone."
chinese: 圣经里有一句话，叫做“人不能只靠面包生活”。

english: It was difficult for him to hide his pride in his success.
chinese: 他很难掩饰对自己成功的骄傲。

english: It's impossible to do the sights of Tokyo in a day or two.
chinese: 一两天是没办法逛完东京的。

english: It's so secret that even I don't know what it's all about.
chinese: 这太秘密了，连我都不知道它是关于什么的。

english: Many improvements have been made since this century began.
chinese: 本世纪初以来，产生了很多进步。

english: My grandfather sometimes talks to himself when he's alone.
chinese: 我祖父一个人的时候，有时会自言自语。

english: My little brother ran through the living room stark naked.
chinese: 我弟弟全身光溜溜地跑过客厅。

english: She failed the examination and I was greatly disappointed.
chinese: 令我非常伤心的是她考砸了。

english: Some people like red wine and some people like white wine.
chinese: 有人喜欢红酒，有人喜欢白酒。

english: Step out of the car and place your hands behind your back.
That coat may have cost a lot of money, but it's worth it.
chinese: 那件大衣可能需要很多钱，但它值得。

english: That pretty girl wearing a bikini is Tom's younger sister.
chinese: 那个穿著比基尼的漂亮女孩是汤姆的妹妹。

english: That was the part that Tom and I were most confused about.
chinese: 这是我和汤姆最困惑的部分。

english: The Eiffel Tower is in the same city as the Louvre Museum.
chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔和卢浮宫在同一座城市。

english: The Oscar ceremonies are Hollywood's biggest extravaganza.
chinese: 奥斯卡颁奖典礼，是好莱坞最盛大的活动。

english: The bargain sale will run for three days, beginning today.
chinese: 这场减价活动会持续三天，从今天开始。

english: The contract is in the bag, so let's go out and celebrate.
chinese: 合同已经到手了，那就出去庆祝一下吧。

english: The doctor tried every possible means to save his patient.
chinese: 为抢救病人医生已尽力了。

english: The simplest way is often the best way to solve a problem.
chinese: 解决问题最简便的方法往往是最好的办法。

english: The train will probably arrive at the station before noon.
chinese: 火车大概会在中午前到站。

english: The university was founded by his father twenty years ago.
chinese: 大学在20年前由他的父亲建立。

english: This is the place where the battle of Hastings took place.
chinese: 这里是黑斯廷斯战役发生的地方。

english: This is the place where the battle of Hastings took place.
chinese: 这里曾是黑斯廷斯战役的战场。

english: This place still looks the same as it did a long time ago.
chinese: 这里就像在古时候一样。

english: Three months is too short a time to finish the experiment.
chinese: 要完成实验，三个月太短了。

english: Tom didn't know that what he'd done was against the rules.
chinese: 汤姆不知道他的所作所为违反了规则。

english: Tom doesn't know whether Mary is telling the truth or not.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽说的是真话还是假话。

english: Tom has no intention of asking Mary to the upcoming dance.
chinese: Tom没有意图去邀请Mary去即将来临的舞会。

english: Tom lived in that small house for a little over ten years.
chinese: 汤姆在那间小房子里住了十多年。

english: Tom ran and ran, until at last he saw the telephone booth.
chinese: 汤姆跑啊跑, 直到他终于看到了电话亭。

english: Tom said that he thought that would probably never happen.
chinese: 汤姆说他觉得那可能永远不会发生了。

english: Tom spent most of the morning straightening up his office.
chinese: 汤姆花了大半个早晨整理办公室。

english: Two thirds of the employees of this company are engineers.
chinese: 这个公司二分之三的雇员是工程师。

english: Was this wall built to keep people out or to keep them in?
chinese: 建造这堵墙是为了把人隔在外面还是把他们留在里面？

english: We enjoyed watching the fireworks on a bridge last summer.
chinese: 去年夏天，我们在桥上看焰火看得很过瘾。

english: We should try to avoid imposing our own beliefs on others.
chinese: 我们应该尽量避免把我们自己的信念强加在别人身上。

english: We were disappointed to hear that Tom couldn't get a visa.
chinese: 我们很遗憾地听说，汤姆没能拿到签证。

english: What mountain do you think is the second highest in Japan?
chinese: 你认为日本第二高峰是哪座山？

english: When were you planning on telling Tom about what happened?
chinese: 你准备啥时候告诉Tom发生了什么

english: With the weather getting worse, the departure was put off.
chinese: 由于天气变差，出发延迟了。

english: Would you mind if I shut the window? I have a slight cold.
chinese: 你不介意我关窗吧？我有点着凉了。

english: Yesterday, an explosion occurred at the fireworks factory.
chinese: 昨晚，烟花厂发生了爆炸。

english: You may think those shoes are in fashion, but they aren't.
chinese: 你可能认为那些鞋子很时髦, 但是他们不是。

english: You will exist but you will never know what it is to live.
chinese: 你活着，但是却不知道为什么活着。

english: "When will you come back?" "It all depends on the weather."
chinese: “你什么时候回来？”“这都要看天气。”

english: "When will you come back?" "It all depends on the weather."
chinese: “你什么时候回来呀？”“看一下天气怎么样再说啦。”

english: According to my calculation, she should be in India by now.
chinese: 根据我的估计，她现在应该在印度了。

english: After I cleaned the window, I could see through it clearly.
chinese: 清洁窗户后，我能很清楚的从窗户看出去。

english: All of a sudden, the enemy bombs came down on us like rain.
chinese: 突然，敌人的炸弹像雨点一样落向我们。

english: All subscriptions must be paid before the end of this year.
chinese: 所有订购必须在今年年底前支付款项。

english: Anything you say may be held against you in a court of law.
chinese: 你所说的一切都将成为呈堂证供。

english: Because of the storm, we had no choice but to stay at home.
chinese: 因为暴风雨的关系，所以我们必须待在家里。

english: Could you please talk a bit louder? I can't hear very well.
chinese: 你能大声点讲吗？我听不太清。

english: Demand for occupational therapy has surged in recent years.
chinese: 这几年对作业疗法的需求在迅速增长。

english: He amassed a fortune in stock trading during the last boom.
chinese: 他在上个景气时期炒股攒下了一笔钱。

english: He said that if he knew her address, he would write to her.
chinese: 他说如果他知道她的地址，他会写信给她。

english: He was about to fall asleep, when he heard his name called.
chinese: 他快要睡著的时候，听到有人在叫他的名字。

english: How many times a day do you look at yourself in the mirror?
How to overcome the high value of the yen is a big problem.
chinese: 如何克服日元升高是个大问题。

english: I am in the habit of taking some exercise before breakfast.
chinese: 我在吃早餐前有运动的习惯。

english: I can't believe your parents let you come here by yourself.
chinese: 我不敢相信你父母让你自己过来。

english: I do not remember seeing the letter, but perhaps I read it.
chinese: 我不记得我看过这封信, 但或许我读过它。

english: I felt quite relieved after I had said all I wanted to say.
chinese: 说了所有我要说的话后，我感觉很轻松。

english: I let Tom watch a little TV after he finished his homework.
chinese: 我让Tom在做完作业后看一点电视。

english: I noticed a note on my desk, but I don't know who wrote it.
chinese: 我发现了我办公桌上有张字条, 但是我不知道是谁写的。

english: I slept a little during lunch break because I was so tired.
chinese: 我在午休时间睡了一会儿，因为我太累了。

english: I think I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
chinese: 我认为我现在有足够的钱买我想要的那辆车。

english: I think that I now have enough money to buy the car I want.
chinese: 我认为我现在有足够的钱买我想要的那辆车。

english: I waited half an hour for my friend, but he didn't turn up.
chinese: 我等了我朋友半个小时，但是他还是没出现。

english: I want to go and change into that shirt I bought yesterday.
chinese: 我想去换我昨天买的这件衬衫。

english: I wonder if Tom really wanted to go to Australia with Mary.
chinese: 我怀疑汤姆是不是真的想和玛丽一起去澳大利亚。

english: I would rather live by myself than do as he tells me to do.
chinese: 我宁愿自己独立生活也不要他来指使我。

english: I would really like to know why he did something like that.
chinese: 我真的很想知道他为什么做了像那样的事。

english: I've no way of telling whether or not what he says is true.
chinese: 我无法判断他的话是真是假。

english: In my opinion, it would be difficult to solve this problem.
chinese: 在我看来，这个问题很难解决。

english: In the winter, many older people slip on ice and fall down.
chinese: 冬天有很多老人在冰上滑倒。

english: Is it right for a doctor to decide when someone should die?
chinese: 由医生来决定某人何时该死是对的吗？

english: Is there any chance that you'll go to Australia next month?
chinese: 你有机会下个月去澳大利亚吗？

english: It's a crying shame that they weren't insured against fire.
chinese: 这简直是太可惜了，他们没有买火险。

english: It's much better to be woken by the birds than by an alarm.
chinese: 被闹钟唤醒没有被鸟唤醒的好。

english: It's valid until March thirty-first, nineteen-ninety-seven.
Leaving something unfinished is the worst thing you can do.
chinese: 半途而废是你所能做的最糟糕的事情。

english: My father has been engaged in foreign trade for many years.
No less than three hundred dollars was needed for the work.
chinese: 这个工作需要不低于300美金。

english: No matter how much I think about it, I can't understand it.
chinese: 无论怎么去想我都搞不清楚。

english: No matter how much I think about it, I don't understand it.
chinese: 无论怎么去想我都搞不清楚。

english: Nobody noticed that she was absent until the meeting ended.
chinese: 直到会议结束之前都没人注意到她不在。

english: One of my brothers is a teacher and the others are lawyers.
chinese: 我的一个兄弟是老师，其他都是律师。

english: Reporters do not hesitate to intrude into people's privacy.
chinese: 记者没有犹豫地去干涉了人们的私生活。

english: Scientists can easily compute the distance between planets.
chinese: 科学家们可以很容易地计算出行星之间的距离。

english: She could hardly keep from laughing when she saw the dress.
chinese: 当她看到那件衣服, 她无法抑制自己的笑声。

english: She folded up the towels and put them away in the cupboard.
chinese: 她把毛巾折叠好再放入柜子里。

english: She had already gone to bed when I phoned her at 11:00 p.m.
chinese: 23点我打电话给她的时候，她已经去睡觉了。

english: Taking the group of children to the library was no problem.
chinese: 带孩子团体去图书馆一点问题都没有。

english: The ambulances carried the injured to the nearest hospital.
chinese: 救护车把伤者送往了最近的医院。

english: The main problem with Tom is that he has no sense of humor.
chinese: 汤姆的主要问题是他一点幽默感都没有

english: The most logical place to keep your shoes is near the door.
chinese: 最合逻辑的放鞋处是门口附近。

english: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.
chinese: 只有能提出新问题的回答才是有用的回答。

english: The other day I went fishing for the first time in my life.
chinese: 前几天人生第一次去钓鱼了。

english: The population of Japan is larger than that of New Zealand.
chinese: 日本的人口比新西兰多。

english: The rain stopped us from being able to play tennis outside.
chinese: 由于下雨，我们没能上外头打网球。

english: The show was wonderful, but the tickets were too expensive.
chinese: 这场秀棒极了，但是门票太贵了。

english: There are some misprints, but all in all, it's a good book.
chinese: 虽然有一些印刷错误, 但大致上说来, 这是一本好书。

english: There was some chewing gum stuck to the sole of Tom's shoe.
chinese: 汤姆的鞋底粘了口香糖。

english: There's no light without shade, and no shade without light.
chinese: 不存在没有阴影的光明，也不存在没有光明的阴影。

english: They tried very hard to gain an advantage over one another.
chinese: 他们很努力地超过对方获得优势。

english: They wanted a wedding picture in front of the Eiffel Tower.
chinese: 他们想在艾菲尔铁塔前面拍张结婚照。

english: They'd have been killed if the car had gone over the cliff.
chinese: 车子若是掉落悬崖他们早就没命了。

english: Tom almost always uses a credit card when he goes shopping.
chinese: 汤姆在去购物的时候，几乎每次都会用信用卡。

english: Tom didn't doubt that there would be a lot of people there.
chinese: 汤姆确定那里会有很多人。

english: Tom didn't want Mary to know he didn't know how to do that.
chinese: 汤姆不想玛丽知道他不知道怎么做。

english: Tom died in the evening of the day he and Mary got married.
chinese: 汤姆死在了他和玛丽结婚的那天傍晚。

english: Tom has been to this park with Mary at least a dozen times.
chinese: 汤姆跟玛丽来这公园至少十二次。

english: Tom has no idea what to do with all the junk in his garage.
chinese: 汤姆不知道拿他车库的那些废物怎么办。

english: Tom likes to listen to music while he's doing his homework.
chinese: Tom很喜欢一边听歌一边做作业。

english: Tom said he wouldn't be able to do what we asked him to do.
chinese: 汤姆说他做不成我们要他做的事。

english: Tom was unable to remember what he had eaten for breakfast.
chinese: 汤姆记不得他在早餐吃了什么。

english: Tom would never have let us go if Mary hadn't gone with us.
chinese: 如果我们不带上玛丽，汤姆就不会让我们走。

english: Tom wrote Mary a long letter, but he didn't send it to her.
chinese: 汤姆给玛丽写了封长信，可是没有寄给她。

english: Two men are trying to figure out what's wrong with the car.
chinese: 两个男人在检查汽车出了什么故障。

english: Use a dictionary to find the meanings of the phrases below.
chinese: 用字典查出下面词组的意思。

english: We were deeply impressed by the lecturer's eloquent speech.
chinese: 演讲者精彩的演说给我们留下了深刻的印象。

english: We will continue the meeting after some light refreshments.
chinese: 茶点过后我们接着开会。

english: We will endeavour to finish the job by the end of the week.
chinese: 我们会尽力在这礼拜结束前把工作完成。

english: When I heard that song, it reminded me of when I was a kid.
chinese: 我一听到那首歌，就想起来我小的时候。

english: When Tom woke up, he found Mary reading a book at the desk.
chinese: 汤姆醒来的时候看到玛丽在书桌前看一本书。

english: Will you please explain the meaning of this sentence to me?
chinese: 您能为我解释这句句子的意思吗？

english: Write down the medications you need on this piece of paper.
chinese: 将你需要的药物写在这张纸上。

english: A group of young men are playing handball in the playground.
chinese: 一群年轻人在操场上打手球。

english: According to the newspaper, there was a big fire last night.
chinese: 根据报导，昨晚有一场很大的火灾。

english: Afraid of hurting his feelings, I didn't tell him the truth.
chinese: 怕伤害了他的感情，我没有告诉他真相。

english: Because of the rain, we weren't able to play tennis outside.
chinese: 由于下雨，我们没能上外头打网球。

english: Dr. Yukawa played an important part in the scientific study.
chinese: 汤川博士在科学研究上起了很重要的作用。

english: Every great writer seems to have been interested in English.
chinese: 每一个伟大的作家似乎已经对英语感兴趣。

english: Everyone in the room checked their watches at the same time.
chinese: 房间里的所有人都同时看了看自己的手表。

english: Excuse me, but could you tell me how to get to Central Park?
chinese: 不好意思，请问到中央公园要怎么走?

english: Father would often read detective stories in his spare time.
chinese: 父亲常常在空闲时间读侦探小说。

english: He asked me questions similar to those asked by many others.
chinese: 他和许多其他人一样问了我同样的问题。

english: He crashed his car because someone tampered with the brakes.
chinese: 他撞车是因为有人在刹车上做了手脚。

english: He left for Europe a week ago, that is, on the tenth of May.
chinese: 他在一周前离开去往欧洲，就是说，是在五月十号。

english: He was aware that I was around, but didn't come to greet me.
chinese: 他注意到我在场，但是没向我打招呼。

english: His bag is right here, so he cannot have gone to school yet.
chinese: 他的包就在这儿，所以他不可能已经去了学校。

english: I always enjoy listening to classical music in my free time.
chinese: 有空的时候，我总喜欢听古典音乐。

english: I can usually tell when someone is hiding something from me.
chinese: 我常常能分辨出来一个人是不是瞒着我什么事情。

english: I had a hard time trying to persuade him to cancel the trip.
chinese: 说服他中止旅行真是件苦差事。

english: I had never seen a windmill until I visited the Netherlands.
chinese: 在我去荷兰之前，我从没见过风车。

english: I have three dogs. One is male and the other two are female.
chinese: 我有三只狗，其中一只是公的，另外两只是母的。

english: I make it a rule not to watch television after nine o'clock.
chinese: 我规定自己在九点之后不看电视。

english: I think that our living together has influenced your habits.
chinese: 我觉得我和你一起住影响了你生活的方式。

english: I thought he loved you, but as it is, he loved another girl.
chinese: 我以为他爱你，但事实上，他爱另一个女孩。

english: I was just about to leave the house when the telephone rang.
chinese: 我正要离开家的时候电话响了。

english: I wish I could figure out how to delete my Facebook account.
chinese: 我希望我能知道如何删除我的Facebook帐号。

english: I would have liked to come with you, but I didn't have time.
chinese: 我想和你一起去，但是我没有时间。

english: I would rather stay at home than go out in this hot weather.
chinese: 在这种暑天里我宁愿呆在家也不出去。

english: If I were you, I'd want to know what Tom is doing right now.
chinese: 如果我是你，我不会想去知道Tom现在正在做什么。

english: If it had not been for civil war, they would be wealthy now.
chinese: 要不是当初有内战，他们现在应该挺富裕了。

english: If you stay at a big hotel, you can use their swimming pool.
chinese: 若你住到的是大的旅馆，就能使用他们的游泳池。

english: It seems as if I'm the only person here capable of doing it.
chinese: 看来我是这里唯一有能力做这件事的人。

english: It was heartless of him to say such a thing to the sick man.
chinese: 他对一个生病的男人说这种事真是没良心。

english: It's hard to predict what the weather will be like tomorrow.
chinese: 很难说明天的天气将会怎样。

english: It's wrong to deceive people, but worse to deceive yourself.
chinese: 欺骗别人是错的, 但更糟的欺骗自己。

english: Many accidents resulted from the icy conditions of the road.
chinese: 道路结冰导致了很多起事故。

english: My younger brother really likes to take photos of mountains.
chinese: 我弟弟很喜欢拍山的照片。

english: Pizza is the kind of food that fits into today's life style.
chinese: 比萨是种适合现在的生活方式的食物。

english: Some babies learn to swim even before they are one year old.
chinese: 有些宝宝甚至在一岁之前就学习游泳了。

english: The first thing you have to take into consideration is time.
chinese: 你应该考虑的第一件事是时间。

english: The number of traffic accidents seems to be on the increase.
chinese: 交通事故的数量似乎在增长。

english: The ozone in the stratosphere absorbs ultraviolet radiation.
chinese: 平流层的臭氧会吸收紫外线。

english: The student handed the examination papers in to the teacher.
chinese: 该学生把考试卷交给了老师。

english: They sleep in separate bedrooms even though they're married.
chinese: 他们分房睡，即使他们已经结婚了。

english: This book says that elephants live to be over 100 years old.
chinese: 这本书上写，大象能活过一百岁。

english: This is one of the best restaurants that I've ever eaten in.
chinese: 这是我吃过的最好的餐馆之一。

english: This town is quite different from what it was ten years ago.
chinese: 这镇子现在跟十年前差别很大。

english: This week the cherry blossoms in the park are in full bloom.
Tom couldn't read very well until he was thirteen years old.
chinese: 汤姆十三岁以前读得不好。

english: Tom doesn't quite get it. Could you explain it to him again?
chinese: 汤姆不大明白。你能再跟他解释一遍吗？

english: Tom took Mary to the hospital on the back of his motorcycle.
chinese: 汤姆把玛丽放到他的摩托车背上送到医院。

english: Tom translated a letter from French to English for his boss.
chinese: 汤姆为他的老板把一封信从法语翻译成了英语。

english: We did not expect him to finish the task in so short a time.
chinese: 我们没指望过他在那么短的时间里完成工作。

english: We don't like our neighbors, and they don't like us, either.
chinese: 我们不喜欢我们的邻居，而他们也不喜欢我们。

english: We take it for granted that he will succeed in his business.
chinese: 我们认为他的生意理所当然会获得成功。

english: What image did you have in mind as you painted this picture?
chinese: 画这幅画的时候你脑海中浮现出了什么图像？

english: When I was a child, I spent most of my time indoors reading.
chinese: 当我是个孩子的时候，我会把大部分时间都用于室内阅读。

english: Would you like me to get you something from the supermarket?
chinese: 你要不要我从超市给你带些什么？

english: You can lie to everyone else, but you can't lie to yourself.
chinese: 你可以向别人撒谎，但你不会向自己撒谎。

english: You can't fight a good fight with such a defeatist attitude.
chinese: 抱著失败主义的态度你无法打一场漂亮的仗。

english: You should try to form the habit of using your dictionaries.
chinese: 你们该养成使用字典的习惯。

english: "Shall I have him call you when he gets back?" "Yes, please."
chinese: “等他回来，我要让他给你打电话吗？”“是的，谢谢。”

english: "What's going on in the cave? I'm curious." "I have no idea."
chinese: “洞里发生了什么？我很好奇。”“我一点也不知道。”

english: "What's going on in the cave? I'm curious." "I have no idea."
chinese: "山洞里发生了什么事?" 我很好奇。"我不知道。"

english: A fire broke out last night and three houses were burnt down.
chinese: 昨晚发生了一场火灾，三栋房屋被烧毁了。

english: A new team was formed in order to take part in the boat race.
chinese: 为了参加划船比赛，一支新的队伍组成了。

english: After a long argument, I finally persuaded her to go camping.
chinese: 经过长久的争论，我终于说服了她去露营。

english: An opportunity like this only comes along once in a lifetime.
chinese: 一辈子只会出现一次像这样的机会。

english: Beethoven went over to the piano, sat down and began to play.
chinese: 贝多芬走向钢琴，坐下来并开始弹。

english: Cancer can be cured easily if it is found in its first phase.
chinese: 癌症如果在第一阶段被发现的话是很容易治愈的。

english: Even though I enjoy bowling, I haven't gone bowling recently.
chinese: 虽然我享受打保龄球，但是我最近没有去打保龄球。

english: Every nation, rich or poor, has its strengths and weaknesses.
chinese: 每个国家，无论贫富，都有其长，都有其短。

english: First, I don't have any money. Second, I don't have the time.
chinese: 首先，我一点钱也没有。其次，我也没有时间。

english: He anonymously donated a large sum of money to the Red Cross.
chinese: 他匿名向红十字捐了大笔钱。

english: He bought the land for the purpose of building a house on it.
chinese: 他买土地目的是要造房子。

english: He bought the land for the purpose of building a house on it.
chinese: 他买土地的目的是要造房子。

english: How long does it take to get from here to your house on foot?
chinese: 从这里步行到你家要多长时间？

english: I can't believe that you were the smartest kid in your class.
chinese: 我不敢相信你是你们班里面最聪明的孩子。

english: I do not like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
chinese: 我不喜欢茶，所以我早餐大致上都喝咖啡。

english: I got a phone call from him just as I was about to go to bed.
chinese: 我正要上床的时候接到了他打来的电话。

english: I haven't yet collected sufficient materials to write a book.
chinese: 我还没有收集到足够的材料来写一本书。

english: I just remembered that I was supposed to buy a loaf of bread.
chinese: 我才想起来我之前该买个面包。

english: I saw a group of foreigners on my way to school this morning.
chinese: 今天早上在去学校的路上，我看到了一群外国人。

english: I sometimes just don't want to get out of bed in the morning.
I want this work completed by two o'clock tomorrow afternoon.
chinese: 明天下午2点以前，我希望这工作完成了。

english: I wish I could figure out how to disable comments on my blog.
chinese: 但愿我能找到在我的博客上屏蔽评论的办法。

english: I've had a headache for three days and I can't get rid of it.
chinese: 我已经头疼三天了，还没摆脱它。

english: If I had known that you were here, I would have come at once.
chinese: 如果我早知道你在这儿的话，我马上就来了。

english: If for some reason they come early, please tell them to wait.
chinese: 如果他们由于什么原因早到的话，请转达他们再等一会儿。

english: If he had taken his doctor's advice, he might still be alive.
chinese: 如果他听了他医生的建议，他可能还活着。

english: If her nose were a little shorter, she would be quite pretty.
chinese: 若她的姿态能再低一点就更完美了。

english: If you feed your dog properly, you can increase his lifespan.
chinese: 合理地喂狗可以延长宠物寿命。

english: In 1978 a peace treaty was concluded between Japan and China.
chinese: 1978年中国和日本签署了和平条约。

english: India ink produces an interesting pattern when used as a dye.
chinese: 墨汁用作染料时会产生有趣的图案。

english: Is there a place where I can charge my cellphone around here?
chinese: 这附近有没有可以给手机充电的地方？

english: It took us a long time to decide what we really wanted to do.
chinese: 我们花了很长时间决定我们真正要做的事。

english: Judging from the look of the sky, it may rain this afternoon.
chinese: 从天色上判断，今天下午可能会下雨。

english: Long time, no see. I hear that you've changed your job again.
chinese: 好久不见。听说你又换工作了？

english: Lots of companies have implemented an eight-hour working day.
chinese: 很多公司实行8小时工作制。

english: My New Year's resolution is to learn how to play the ocarina.
chinese: 我新年的愿望是学会吹奥卡利纳埙。

english: My fingers are so numb with cold that I can't play the piano.
chinese: 我的手指冻僵了，以至于无法弹钢琴了。

english: My grandfather is fond of taking a walk early in the morning.
chinese: 我的爷爷喜欢大清早的散步。

english: Plastics have taken the place of many conventional materials.
chinese: 塑料代替了许多传统的原料。

english: Problems that can be solved with money are not real problems.
chinese: 钱可以解决的问题都不是问题。

english: Several dozen young people participated in the demonstration.
chinese: 几十个年轻人参加了示威游行。

english: She has a real knack for getting people to do what she wants.
chinese: 她真的有本事让别人做她想做的事。

english: She is better at speaking English than any of her classmates.
chinese: 她的英语说得比班上任何人都好。

english: She tossed me grapes and I tried to catch them with my mouth.
chinese: 她朝我丢葡萄，我试着用嘴接住它们。

english: She visited the old man in the hospital every day but Sunday.
chinese: 她每天都去探视在医院里的老人，除了星期天。

english: Since I had met him once before, I recognized him right away.
chinese: 由于我以前见过他一次，所以我马上就认出他了。

english: Small businesses will have to tighten their belts to survive.
chinese: 中小企业要勒紧裤带才能存活。

english: The best way to lose weight is to eat less and exercise more.
chinese: 最好的减肥方法就是少吃多运动。

english: The conference is to be held in Tokyo the day after tomorrow.
chinese: 会议将在后天于东京举行。

english: The house burned to the ground before the fire truck arrived.
chinese: 消防车到达之前，房子就全烧了。

english: The old church on the hill dates back to the twelfth century.
chinese: 山上的老教堂的历史可以追溯到12世纪。

english: The old houses were torn down to make room for a supermarket.
chinese: 这栋老房子被拆除了，以腾出空间给超级市场。

english: The skin of a shark is much rougher than that of a tuna fish.
chinese: 鲨鱼皮比金枪鱼皮粗糙多了。

english: There were only three passengers on the bus when it exploded.
chinese: 当汽车爆炸时，车上只有三名乘客。

english: These scissors are suitable for left and right-handed people.
chinese: 这把剪刀左右撇子都适用。

english: They fine you in Singapore if you throw trash in the streets.
chinese: 在新加坡的街道上扔垃圾会被罚款。

english: They would've been killed if the car had gone over the cliff.
chinese: 车子若是掉落悬崖他们早就没命了。

english: This airplane is capable of carrying 40 passengers at a time.
chinese: 这架飞机一次可以携带40名乘客。

english: This is the stupidest thing I've ever seen in my entire life.
chinese: 这是我人生中见过最白痴的事。

english: This novel is more interesting than the one I read last week.
chinese: 这本小说比我上周看的那本有意思。

english: Tom is still uncertain about whether to go to college or not.
chinese: 汤姆还不清楚要不要上大学。

english: Tom told me that he thought that Mary used to live in Boston.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我他觉得玛丽以前住在波士顿。

english: Tom was the last person Mary expected to see at John's party.
chinese: 玛丽没料到会在约翰的聚会上见到汤姆。

english: Tom went into the kitchen and poured himself a cup of coffee.
chinese: 汤姆进了厨房，给自己倒了杯咖啡。

english: Turn the volume up so that the students at the back can hear.
chinese: 声音大声一点，以便让坐在后边的学生能听到。

english: What do you think would happen if the earth stopped spinning?
chinese: 如果地球停止自传，你认为会发生什么？

english: While we were discussing the problem, I hit upon a good idea.
chinese: 在我们讨论问题的过程中，我想到了一个好主意。

english: With the T.V. on, how can you keep your mind on your studies?
chinese: 你开着电视怎么能安心学习呢？

english: You must be careful of the traffic when you cross the street.
"How long does it take to get to Vienna on foot?" he inquired.
chinese: “步行到 Vienon 需要多少时间？”他问。

english: "What do you think of the election for mayor?" "I don't know."
chinese: “你对市长选举怎么看？”“我不知道。”

english: A couple of flights were delayed on account of the earthquake.
chinese: 一些航班由于地震被延误了。

english: A little bit of luck sometimes leads to an unexpected success.
chinese: 一点点的运气有时会导致意想不到的成功。

english: A trip to America was equivalent to a two-year salary for her.
chinese: 去美国旅行一次相当于她两年的工资。

english: After they argued, they didn't speak to each other for a week.
chinese: 他们争吵后，一周都没有再说话。

english: After winning the Nobel prize, she remained as modest as ever.
chinese: 获得诺贝尔奖后，她仍谦虚如昔。

english: All you have to do is take advantage of this rare opportunity.
chinese: 你所要做的便是好好把握这千载难逢的机会。

english: An aging population will require more spending on health care.
chinese: 老龄化的人口需要更多医疗保健支出。

english: As soon as the bell rang, the teacher came into the classroom.
chinese: 钟声一响起，老师就走进了教室。

english: At the age of six, I was taken to a circus for the first time.
chinese: 在我六岁的时候，我第一次被带去看马戏。

english: Between you and me, Tom's idea doesn't appeal to me very much.
chinese: 汤姆的主意我不太感兴趣，这个我们之间说说就好。

english: Burj Khalifa is currently the tallest skyscraper in the world.
chinese: 目前哈里发塔是世界上最高的摩天大楼。

english: Children generally have a higher body temperature than adults.
chinese: 小孩的体温一般比大人的要高。

english: Do you know the concert schedule of London Symphony Orchestra?
chinese: 你知道伦敦交响乐团的演奏会行程吗？

english: Ever since she fell in the kitchen, she hasn't been all there.
chinese: 自从她在厨房里摔倒后，她不曾再到那里。

english: He told me that whatever might happen, he was prepared for it.
chinese: 他告诉我不论发生什么，他都准备好了。

english: He was disappointed that things didn't turn out as he'd hoped.
chinese: 事情没能如他所愿让他感到失望。

english: I don't know about the past, but now we have faxes and emails.
chinese: 我不知道以前怎样，但现在我们有传真和电子邮件。

english: I doubt that Tom will ever learn how to speak French properly.
chinese: 我对汤姆要持之以恒地学习法语口语这件事很怀疑。

english: I had to cancel the order because we didn't have enough money.
chinese: 我们的钱不够，所以我只好把订单取消了。

english: I heard someone in the crowd outside the station call my name.
chinese: 我听到车站外的人群中有人在叫我的名字。

english: I should have tried out this electric shaver before buying it.
chinese: 我本该在买下这个电动剃须刀之前试一下的。

english: I think to clearly distinguish opinion from fact is important.
chinese: 我认为辨别清楚意见和事实很重要。

english: I think you need to spend a little more time on your homework.
chinese: 我觉得你应该多花点时间在作业上。

english: I would rather go to the art museum than to the movie theater.
chinese: 我想去美术馆胜过去电影院。

english: I'll sauté a few sweet potatoes and sprinkle them with sugar.
chinese: 我去炸一点红薯，然后在上面撒上糖。

english: If someone irritates you, it is best not to react immediately.
chinese: 如果有人激怒你，你最好不要立刻做出反应。

english: If they hadn't noticed, there wouldn't have been any problems.
chinese: 要是他们没有发现，就没问题了。

english: Islam first reached China about the middle of the 7th century.
chinese: 伊斯兰教大约在七世纪中传到中国。

english: It is becoming important for us to know how to use a computer.
chinese: 知道如何使用电脑对我们来说变得很重要。

english: Japan is now very different from what it was twenty years ago.
chinese: 相比二十年前的日本，现在的日本有了翻天覆地的变化。

english: Japan is now very different from what it was twenty years ago.
chinese: 现在的日本与二十年前大不相同。

english: Language is the means by which people communicate with others.
chinese: 语言是人们与他人交流的手段。

english: Let me stop you right there. We don't want to hear about that.
chinese: 让我在这打断你。我们不想听那个话题。

english: London was very important for economical and cultural reasons.
chinese: 伦敦过去因为经济和文化的缘故，十分重要。

english: My father participated in a cooking contest and came in first.
chinese: 我爸爸参加了料理竞赛并得了第一名。

english: My mother has a driver's license, but she doesn't drive a car.
chinese: 我母亲有驾照，但是她不开车。

english: Needless to say, fundamental human rights should be respected.
chinese: 无须多言，基本人权应当被尊重。

english: People who drink alcoholic beverages are not allowed to enter.
She doesn't have any friends or relatives to take care of her.
chinese: 她没有任何亲戚朋友照顾她。

english: Some of the bluest water in the world is found in Crater Lake.
chinese: 一些世界上最蓝的水在火山湖。

english: Suppose you had a thousand dollars, what would you do with it?
chinese: 假如你有1000美元，你会用它做什么呢？

english: The entire sales staff has worked around the clock for a week.
chinese: 全体销售人员通宵达旦地工作了一周。

english: The kidnapper told me he'd kill Tom if I didn't show up alone.
chinese: 绑匪告诉我我如果不独自出现他就会把汤姆杀了。

english: The poet expressed his burning passion for the woman he loved.
chinese: 诗人对他爱的女人表达了他火热的激情。

english: There were three uniformed police officers at the crime scene.
chinese: 犯罪现场有三名穿制服的警察。

english: They helped one another to make the school festival a success.
chinese: 他们互帮互助，把校庆搞得很成功。

english: Tom asked Mary some questions, but she refused to answer them.
chinese: 汤姆问了玛丽一些问题，但是她拒绝回答。

english: Tom doesn't like it when people cuss in front of his children.
chinese: 汤姆不喜欢人们在他孩子面前讲坏话。

english: Tom left early this morning, so he should be in Boston by now.
chinese: 汤姆今天早上走得很早，所以现在应该已经到波士顿了。

english: Tom probably doesn't know how to do that as well as Mary does.
chinese: 汤姆可能不知道如何像玛丽一样做得好。

english: Tom would still be alive if he had been wearing his seat belt.
chinese: 要是汤姆系上安全带的话，他就不会死的。

english: We have less than five minutes to evacuate the whole building.
chinese: 我们有不到五分钟来疏散整栋楼的人。

english: We probably don't have enough time to finish doing that today.
chinese: 我们应该不够时间在今天之内完成它。

english: We're on strike because the company hasn't improved our wages.
chinese: 我们罢工是因为公司没有改善我们的工资。

english: We're on strike because the company hasn't improved our wages.
chinese: 我们之所以罢工是因为公司没有改善我们的工资。

english: What I hate most of all is having to recite texts from memory.
You may injure yourself if you don't follow safety procedures.
chinese: 如果你不按照安全手续来的话，你可能会受伤的。

english: You might not like this beer at first. It's an acquired taste.
chinese: 刚开始的时候你可能不会喜欢这个啤酒。这是需要多次品尝去习惯它的口味。

english: You must get this homework finished by the day after tomorrow.
chinese: 你必须在后天以前完成回家作业。

english: You shouldn't say that kind of thing when children are around.
chinese: 孩子们在旁边的时候，你不应该说那种事。

english: You told her that you had finished the work three days before.
chinese: 你告诉她你已经在三天前完成这个工作了。

english: As soon as she heard the bell ring, she answered the telephone.
chinese: 她一听到铃响，就接了电话。

english: As time went on, rules were added to the game to make it safer.
chinese: 随着时间的推移，比赛增加了规则以使之更安全。

english: By the year 2020, the population of our city will have doubled.
chinese: 在2020年以前，我们的城市的人口将增加一倍。

english: Declarations of variables are extremely important in C and C++.
chinese: 变量的声明在C和C++中极其重要。

english: English is a universal language and is used all over the world.
chinese: 英语是一种世界性的语言，用于世界各地。

english: English is by far the most widely-spoken language in the world.
chinese: 英语是目前在世界上使用最广泛的语言。

english: English is just one of over 2,700 languages in the world today.
chinese: 今天，英语只是世界上超过2,700种语言的其中之一。

english: Environmental pollution is causing abnormal weather conditions.
chinese: 环境污染正造成异常的天气情况。

english: For the time being, my sister is an assistant in a supermarket.
chinese: 目前，我妹妹在一家超市当收银员。

english: Go straight down this street and turn right at the third light.
chinese: 沿着这条路直走，到第三个红绿灯的地方右转。

english: He and his wife tried to work out their problems, but couldn't.
chinese: 他和他的妻子试图解决他们的问题，但没有办法。

english: He crept out of the room very carefully to avoid waking her up.
chinese: 他很小心地溜出房间，以免惊醒她。

english: He still remembers the day his mother found out he was smoking.
chinese: 他还记得他妈妈发现他正在抽烟的那天。

english: He survived an accident last year, but still drives recklessly.
chinese: 他去年在事故中幸存了，可是他仍然很鲁莽地开车。

english: He told me that I looked pale and asked me what the matter was.
chinese: 他跟我说我很苍白，并问我怎么了。

english: I don't recommend eating in that restaurant. The food is awful.
chinese: 我不推荐在那家餐馆吃饭。食物糟糕透了。

english: I have no objection to paying a special fee if it is necessary.
chinese: 如果必要的话，我不反对付特别费用。

english: If Tom doesn't do what he's supposed to do, please let me know.
chinese: 如果汤姆没有做他应当做的事，请让我知道。

english: If he were a little younger, he would be eligible for the post.
chinese: 如果他年轻一点，他将很适合这个职位。

english: Immediately after it caught fire, the chemical factory blew up.
chinese: 化学工厂一着火就爆炸了。

english: It cost me ten thousand yen to have my television set repaired.
chinese: 把我的电视机修好花了我一万日元。

english: It makes sense to pay off your credit card balance every month.
chinese: 每个月还清信用卡负债很重要。

english: It's hard for me to understand French when it's spoken quickly.
chinese: 法语说得快，我就难以理解。

english: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
chinese: 婚前张开眼，婚后半闭眼。

english: Once you've formed a bad habit, you can't get rid of it easily.
chinese: 坏习惯一旦被养成，便不能简单地改正。

english: One thousand dollars will cover all the expenses for the party.
chinese: 1000美元将负担聚会的全部费用。

english: Six people applied for the job, but none of them were employed.
chinese: 六个人投了这份工作，但他们中没有一个被录用。

english: The economy of the island is dependent on the fishing industry.
chinese: 这个岛的经济依靠的是渔业。

english: The police think the burglar entered through a basement window.
chinese: 警察认为窃贼从地下室窗口进入。

english: The school is located within five minutes' walk of the station.
chinese: 学校坐落于距离车站步行五分钟的地方。

english: The senator was censured by the congressional ethics committee.
chinese: 议员受到了议会道德委员会的谴责。

english: The third quarter GNP growth was 1% over the preceding quarter.
chinese: 第三季国民生产总值较上一季成长了1％。

english: The warrior is conscious of both his strength and his weakness.
chinese: 战士知道自己的力量和弱点。

english: There are three empty rooms. However, we can't use any of them.
chinese: 虽然有三间空屋，但哪间都用不了。

english: They would have been killed if the car had gone over the cliff.
chinese: 车子若是掉落悬崖他们早就没命了。

english: This year's fashions are completely different from last year's.
chinese: 今年的时尚潮流完全不同于去年。

english: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.
chinese: 自我怀疑是聪明的第一标志。

english: Tom didn't know exactly what it was that Mary wanted him to do.
chinese: 汤姆不知道玛丽到底让他做什么。

english: We were unable to make contact with them until it was too late.
chinese: 我们联系上他们已经为时已晚。

english: You'll get into trouble if your girlfriend finds out the truth.
chinese: 如果你女朋友发现真相的话，你会有麻烦的。

english: "Why are you going to Japan?" "To attend a conference in Tokyo."
chinese: “你去日本干嘛？”“去东京参加一个会议。”

english: "Will you have some more coffee?" "No, thanks. I've had enough."
chinese: “你想再来点咖啡吗？”“不，谢谢。我够了。”

english: Children depend on their parents for food, clothing and shelter.
chinese: 孩子们的衣食住行靠的是他们的父母。

english: Do you know the difference between a microscope and a telescope?
chinese: 你知道显微镜和望远镜的差别吗？

english: Everybody is supposed to know the law, but few people really do.
chinese: 每一个人都应该知法懂法，但是真正能做到的人却很少。

english: For the time being, I'm studying French at this language school.
chinese: 目前，我正在这所语言学校学习法语。

english: Have you ever seen Mt. Fuji? It is beautiful beyond description.
chinese: 你看过富士山吗? 它美得无法形容。

english: He's a very romantic boyfriend who brings me flowers each night.
chinese: 他是个非常浪漫的男朋友，每晚都给我送花。

english: His lie got him into trouble when his boss discovered the truth.
chinese: 当他老板发现真相的时候，谎言给他带来了麻烦。

english: I can still remember the time when we went on a picnic together.
chinese: 我还记得我和你一起去野餐的时候。

english: I didn't know that Tom talked about me like that behind my back.
chinese: 我不知道汤姆在我后面说我坏话

english: I may be unsociable, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.
chinese: 我或许不善于社交,但这并不意味我不和别人交谈。

english: I think that I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
chinese: 我认为我现在有足够的钱买我想要的那辆车。

english: If you look around, you'll see many people doing the same thing.
chinese: 看看四周，你会看到很多人在做一样的事情。

english: It hasn't been easy for Tom to deal with Mary's health problems.
chinese: 处理玛丽的健康问题对汤姆来说不容易。

english: It is sometimes difficult to make yourself understood in public.
chinese: 有时很难在公众场合表达你自己的意思。

english: My father died of a subarachnoid hemorrhage when I was fourteen.
chinese: 我十四岁的时候，父亲死于蛛网膜下出血。

english: No matter how hard I try, I can't do it any better than she can.
chinese: 无论我多么努力尝试，我都无法做到比她更好。

english: Nobody noticed that she was absent until the end of the meeting.
chinese: 直到会议结束之前都没人注意到她不在。

english: Nobody understood why the elephant suddenly turned on its owner.
chinese: 没有人明白为什么大象突然攻击了它的主人。

english: Please mail this letter the next time you go to the post office.
chinese: 下次去邮局的时候，请把这封信寄出去。

english: She employed a private detective to keep a watch on her husband.
chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探看守她的丈夫。

english: She was very embarrassed when her child behaved badly in public.
chinese: 当她的孩子在公共场合行为表现不好的时候，她觉得很尴尬。

english: She wouldn't let up until I agreed to go to the movies with her.
chinese: 她不愿松开我，直到我同意和她去电影院。

english: Some scientists believe that the greenhouse effect is imaginary.
chinese: 有的科学家认为温室效应是虚构的。

english: The accident seemed to have something to do with the heavy snow.
chinese: 事故似乎和厚厚的积雪有关。

english: The conflict between blacks and whites in the city became worse.
chinese: 在这个城市，白人和黑人间的争端愈演愈烈。

english: The number of people suffering from heart disease has increased.
chinese: 遭受心脏病困扰的人数增加了。

english: The value of the coins depended on the weight of the metal used.
chinese: 钱币的价值取决于所使用的金属的重量。

english: This book is for students whose native language is not Japanese.
chinese: 这本书是给母语不是日语的学生的。

english: This is by far the best novel that has been published this year.
chinese: 这显然是今年出版的最好的小说。

english: Thousands of candles illuminated the church during the ceremony.
chinese: 数以千计的蜡烛点亮了仪式中的教堂。

english: Tom didn't want Mary to know that he didn't know how to do that.
chinese: 汤姆不想玛丽知道他不知道怎么做。

english: Tom intends to play tennis every day during his summer vacation.
chinese: 汤姆打算暑假每天打网球。

english: Tom said he thought he might be the only one who had to do that.
chinese: 汤姆说他以为需要做那件事的就只有他一个。

english: Tom says he isn't sure if he can do that, but he says he'll try.
chinese: 汤姆说他不确定是否能做到，但是他说会尝试。

english: Tom told Mary that she should quit pretending to be intoxicated.
chinese: 汤姆告诉玛丽她应该停止假装醉酒。

english: Tom told Mary that she should stop pretending to be intoxicated.
chinese: 汤姆告诉玛丽她应该停止假装醉酒。

english: Tom told us this morning that he and Mary were moving to Boston.
chinese: 汤姆告诉我今天上午他和玛丽要搬到波士顿。

english: We moved our bags to make room for the elderly lady to sit down.
chinese: 我们移走了行李腾出空间让老太太可以坐下。

english: We were faced with an unusual situation because of the accident.
chinese: 那场事故让我们陷入了不寻常的局势。

english: We're going to eat a lot tonight so I hope you're not on a diet.
chinese: 我们今晚会吃很多，所以我希望你没有在节食。

english: When Dad finds out what you've done, he's going to hit the roof.
chinese: 当爸爸发现你做了什么的时候，他会发疯的。

english: You must've been surprised to meet your teacher in such a place.
chinese: 在那种地方碰到你的老师，你应该很惊讶吧。

english: You should do that as often as you can while you're still young.
chinese: 趁你还年轻的时候，你应该尽可能经常地这样做。

english: "We haven't seen each other since 2009." "Has it been that long?"
chinese: “我们从2009年起就没见过面。”“有那么久吗？”

english: "Will you be at my party tomorrow night?" "I'll try to be there."
chinese: “你明天会来我的聚会吗？”“我尽量来。”

english: A considerable amount of time and effort have been spent already.
chinese: 已经花费了很多的时间和精力。

english: All you need is ignorance and confidence and the success is sure.
chinese: 要想成功只需要无知和自信。

english: As a matter of fact, I haven't eaten anything since this morning.
chinese: 事实上，我从今天早上开始没有吃任何东西。

english: Austria is one of the largest producers of electricity in Europe.
chinese: 澳大利亚在欧洲是最大的电能生产国之一。

english: Can you spare me a few minutes? I'd like to have a word with you.
chinese: 你有几分钟时间吗？我想跟你聊一下。

english: His name was on the tip of my tongue, but I couldn't remember it.
chinese: 我都快要说出他的名字了，可就是记不起来。

english: I crossed the equator for the first time on my trip to Australia.
chinese: 我去澳大利亚旅游的时候第一次穿越了赤道。

english: I have lost my umbrella somewhere in the park. I have to buy one.
chinese: 我的雨伞遗失在公园里某个地方。我必须再买一把。

english: I haven't seen you for ages. Do you remember when I saw you last?
chinese: 好久不见了。记得上次我什么时候看见你的吗？

english: I hope I will have a chance to see you next time I'm in New York.
chinese: 希望下次我在纽约还可以有机会见到你。

english: I was busy packing, because I was leaving for France in two days.
chinese: 我当时正忙着打包，因为我两天后要去法国。

english: I'd like to make a call to Tokyo, Japan. The number is 3202-5625.
chinese: 我想要打个电话到日本东京，号码是3202－5625。

english: In Canada, there are many areas where it is illegal to log trees.
chinese: 在加拿大有很多区域砍伐树木是非法的。

english: In another two weeks you will be able to get out of the hospital.
chinese: 再过两周你就可以出院了。

english: In case the shipment is delayed, we have special delay insurance.
chinese: 万一船运迟了，我们有特别的迟到保险。

english: It is out of the question for you to go to New York this weekend.
chinese: 这个周末去纽约对你来说是不可能的事。

english: It was an advantage having learned Chinese while I was in school.
chinese: 在学校时我学了中文是个优势。

english: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
chinese: 生活就是当你忙著进行你的计划时总有其他的事情发生。

english: Money takes a long time to earn, but you can spend it in no time.
chinese: 钱要花很长的时间来赚, 但你可以一下子就花掉它了。

english: My office is on the fourth floor of that gray six-story building.
chinese: 我的办公室在那幢灰色的六层楼的四楼。

english: Once you have formed a bad habit, you can't get rid of it easily.
chinese: 坏习惯一旦被养成，便不能简单地改正。

english: Some of the roses in my garden are white, and the others are red.
chinese: 我花园里的一部分玫瑰是白色的，其他的是红色的。

english: Students generally like a teacher who understands their problems.
chinese: 通常学生们喜欢理解他们问题的老师。

english: The baby caught sight of my ballpoint pen and reached out for it.
chinese: 这个婴儿盯著我的原子笔看, 并且伸手要拿它。

english: The leaves of the trees in the garden have turned completely red.
chinese: 花园里树上的叶子已经完全变红了。

english: The train was so crowded that I had to keep standing all the way.
chinese: 这班火车如此的拥挤以至于我整个车程都必须站著。

english: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.
chinese: 这将是我环绕美国旅行中一个很好的纪念品。

english: Tom forgot to tell Mary what time the meeting was going to start.
chinese: 汤姆忘记跟玛莉说会议几点开始。

english: Tom probably knows where we can get something to eat around here.
chinese: 汤姆应该知道这附近哪里有东西吃。

english: Two adult tickets and three children's tickets to London, please.
chinese: 请给我两张到伦敦的成人票，三张儿童票。

english: What Tom really wanted was enough money to buy Mary some flowers.
chinese: 汤姆真正想要的是有足够的钱给玛丽买一些花。

english: When she was in Los Angeles, she had at least six different jobs.
chinese: 当她在洛杉矶的时候, 她至少有六份工作。

english: When we are told not to come, we become all the more eager to go.
chinese: 让我们别来，我们就更想来了。

english: Because of the typhoon, my parents ended their trip one day early.
chinese: 因为台风的关系，我的父母提早一天结束了旅行回到家。

english: Four hundred million people speak English as their first language.
chinese: 四亿人以英语作为他们的第一语言。

english: He seems not to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.
chinese: 他似乎不知道我父亲和我之间的纠葛。

english: He was an excellent scientist, and what is more, was a great poet.
chinese: 他是一位优秀的科学家，更是一位伟大的诗人。

english: Hot weather will continue, so please watch out for food poisoning.
chinese: 因为酷暑一直持续着，请务必注意食物中毒。

english: Hot weather will continue, so please watch out for food poisoning.
chinese: 因为酷暑一直持续着，请谨防食物中毒。

english: I'm glad that they fixed the heating system, but now it's too hot.
chinese: 我很高兴他们修复了暖气系统，但现在太热了。

english: I'm going over to Tom's house now to tell him about what happened.
chinese: 我现在要去汤姆家告诉他发生了什么。

english: If the lion is the king of beasts, the eagle is the king of birds.
chinese: 狮子是兽类之王的话，鹰就是鸟类之王。

english: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.
chinese: 如果你没好话说，那就什么都别说。

english: If you had left home a little earlier you would have been in time.
chinese: 如果你早点出门的话，你就能赶上了。

english: In spite of the heavy rain, he visited his friend in the hospital.
chinese: 尽管雨下得很大，但他还是去医院看望他的朋友了。

english: It seems that the only time he isn't eating is when he's sleeping.
chinese: 看来他只有在睡觉时不吃东西。

english: It's one thing to make plans, but quite another to carry them out.
chinese: 做计划是一码事，付诸实践是另一码事。

english: It's one thing to make plans, but quite another to carry them out.
Last month our twenty-year-old daughter gave birth to a baby girl.
chinese: 上个月，我们20岁的女儿生了个女孩。

english: My car broke down this morning and won't be repaired until Friday.
chinese: 我的车今天早上坏了，星期五才能修好。

english: My father always said that heaven helps those who help themselves.
chinese: 我父亲总是说天助自助者。

english: My wife often telephones me when I'm traveling in another country.
chinese: 我在国外旅行的时候，我老婆老给我打电话。

english: No matter how often I tell her, she keeps making the same mistake.
chinese: 不管我跟她说了多少次，她还是继续犯同样的错误。

english: The average height of girls in this class is over 155 centimeters.
chinese: 这个班的女生平均身高超过了155公分。

english: The dolphin and trainer communicated much better than we expected.
chinese: 海豚和驯养员交流得比我们所期望的好得多。

english: The recent shortage of coffee has given rise to a lot of problems.
chinese: 近来咖啡的短缺造成了许多问题。

english: The recent shortage of coffee has given rise to a lot of problems.
chinese: 最近的咖啡短缺带来了许多问题。

english: Tom put the large picnic basket on the passenger seat next to him.
chinese: 汤姆把那个大野餐篮子放在他旁边的乘客座位上。

english: Tom wanted Mary's phone number, but she refused to give it to him.
chinese: 汤姆想要玛丽的电话号码但是被拒绝了。

english: Tom was admiring my new car at the time the truck crashed into it.
chinese: 在汤姆欣赏我的新车的同时，一辆卡车撞了过来。

english: Tom was wearing a bulletproof vest, so the bullet didn't kill him.
chinese: 汤姆穿著一件防弹衣，所以子弹没把他杀死。

english: We found it very hard going back to our base camp in the blizzard.
chinese: 暴风雪使得我们难以返回营地。

english: You've worked hard for months and have certainly earned a holiday.
chinese: 你已经辛苦地工作好几个月了, 当然可以休假。

english: "The good die young" is an old saying which may or may not be true.
chinese: “好人不长命”是句或真或假的老话。

english: A bookstore in that location wouldn't make enough money to survive.
chinese: 那个地点的书店无法赚足够的钱生存下去。

english: A year has passed, but it's as if we saw each other only yesterday.
chinese: 一年过去了，但仿佛我们昨天还见过面似的。

english: Because of his wealth, he was able to become a member of that club.
chinese: 由于他的财富，他能够成为这个俱乐部的成员。

english: Everyone is anxious to know what has become of the former champion.
chinese: 大家都渴望知道前冠军得主发生了什么。

english: First off, I'd like you to come with me to a department store sale.
chinese: 首先，我要你跟我一起去百货公司的特价活动。

english: He always left the problem of his children's education to his wife.
chinese: 他总是把孩子的教育问题留给他的妻子。

english: He announced that he would come at once and investigate the matter.
chinese: 他宣布他将立刻来调查此事。

english: He devoted the last years of his life to writing his autobiography.
He was always annoyed in the city by noises of one sort or another.
chinese: 他在城市里一直受到噪音或者其他的干扰。

english: His wife is in the hospital because she was injured in a car crash.
chinese: 他的妻子在医院里因为她在一场车祸中受伤了。

english: I have so many things to tell you that I don't know where to start.
chinese: 我有太多话想和你说，以至于不知从何说起。

english: I lost my father to a subarachnoid haemorrhage when I was fourteen.
chinese: 我十四岁的时候，父亲死于蛛网膜下出血。

english: I'm not a child, but sometimes you talk to me as if I were a child.
chinese: 我不是小孩子，但有时你跟我说话就好像我是小孩子一样。

english: If you heard her speak English, you would take her for an American.
chinese: 如果你听到她讲的英语，你会以为她是美国人呢。

english: In this kind of weather, it's best to stay home and not go outside.
chinese: 这种天气下最好待在家里不要外出。

english: It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.
chinese: 翻译几页英文花了我2个多小时。

english: It was through his influence that she became interested in ecology.
chinese: 她开始对生态学感兴趣，是受到他的影响。

english: None of this would've been necessary if we'd followed Tom's advice.
chinese: 如果我们照了汤姆的话去做这一切都是没必要的。

english: Please don't forget to put a stamp on the letter before mailing it.
chinese: 请不要忘记寄信前要在上面贴邮票。

english: She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.
chinese: 她一劳永逸地告诉我，她不想再见我了。

english: Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
chinese: 瑞士位于法国、意大利、奥地利和德国之间。

english: The teacher pointed her finger at me and asked me to come with her.
chinese: 教师用手指指着我，要我跟她走。

english: The traveler was delighted at the sight of a light in the distance.
chinese: 发现了远处的灯光的旅行者欢喜不已。

english: The value of the painting was estimated at several million dollars.
chinese: 这幅画被估价数百万元。

english: There are many more students in the classroom today than yesterday.
chinese: 今天教室里的学生比昨天还要多。

english: There was a minute of silence and then everybody started screaming.
chinese: 有一分钟的沉默，然后每个人都开始尖叫。

english: This is a secret just between you and me, so don't let it slip out.
chinese: 这只是你和我之间的秘密，所以不要让它流出去。

english: This problem is too difficult for primary school children to solve.
chinese: 这个问题让小学生解决太难了。

english: You should apologize to Dad for not coming home in time for supper.
chinese: 你应该为你没有及时回家吃晚餐向你父亲道歉。

english: You're going to wreck your eyesight if you play games all the time.
chinese: 要是你老打游戏的话，你的视力会下降的。

english: According to the guidebook, this is the best restaurant around here.
chinese: 根据指南，这是这附近最好的餐馆。

english: Do you know how many people in the world starve to death every year?
chinese: 你知不知道全世界每年有多少人饿死呀？

english: Father makes sure that all the lights are off before he goes to bed.
chinese: 父亲确定所有的灯都关了后才去睡觉。

english: I can't remember the meaning of the word that I looked up yesterday.
chinese: 我记不起昨天查的那个词的意思了。

english: I knew Tom would be a good basketball coach. That's why I hired him.
chinese: 我知道汤姆会成为一位优秀的篮球教练。这就是为什么我聘用了他。

english: I think that Liszt's "Forgotten Waltz No.3" is a hidden masterpiece.
chinese: 我觉得李斯特的《被遗忘的圆舞曲第三首》是个被埋没的名曲。

english: I'll have finished reading this novel by the time you come tomorrow.
chinese: 你明天来的时候，我就看完这本小说了。

english: I've never lived on a farm, but both of my parents grew up on farms.
chinese: 我从没有在农场住，但我的父母都在农场长大。

english: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.
chinese: 如果两个人总是意见相同，那么他们其中一个就没必要了。

english: In some countries, the punishment for treason can be life in prison.
chinese: 在一些国家，叛国罪的惩罚可以是终身监禁。

english: In the light of what you told us, I think we should revise our plan.
chinese: 根据你所说的话，我认为我们应该重新审视我们的计划。

english: It's difficult for me to understand French when it's spoken quickly.
chinese: 法语说得快，我就难以理解。

english: My father had already finished breakfast when I got up this morning.
chinese: 我今早起床时，我爸已经吃过早饭了。

english: My father is in the habit of reading the newspaper before breakfast.
chinese: 我父亲有个习惯，早餐之前读报纸。

english: On this small island are two large towns and many small settlements.
chinese: 这个小岛上有两座大城市及许多小村镇。

english: Our task has been easy so far, but it will be difficult from now on.
chinese: 我们的任务到目前为止很轻松，但从现在开始将会变得很难。

english: The death penalty had been done away with in many states in the USA.
chinese: 死刑在美国的很多州都被废除了。

english: The flash wasn't working, so he couldn't take a picture in the dark.
chinese: 因为闪光灯坏了，他不能在黑暗中拍照。

english: The only difference between a bad cook and a poisoner is the intent.
chinese: 一个差劲的厨师和下毒者唯一的不同在于他们的意图。

english: The unemployment rate in Japan was 3.4 percent in September of 2015.
chinese: 在2015年9月日本的失业率为3.4％。

english: Tom asked me to tell you he didn't plan on going to Boston with you.
chinese: 汤姆让我告诉你他没有计划和你一起去波士顿。

english: Tom didn't have enough time to answer all the questions on the test.
chinese: 汤姆考试时没时间答完所有题。

english: Tom started as a janitor, but he's now the president of the company.
chinese: 汤姆最初是看门人，但现在他是公司的总裁了。

english: Tom told Mary not to waste her time trying to convince John to help.
chinese: 汤姆对玛丽说，不要浪费时间去说服约翰来帮忙。

english: Tom wants to learn boxing, but his mother thinks it's too dangerous.
chinese: 汤姆想学拳击，但他妈妈觉得这太危险了。

english: "Do you know when they will arrive?" "At eleven-thirty this evening."
chinese: 你知道他们什么时候到吗？ 今晚11点半。

english: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
chinese: 坚持做对的事情。这会满足一部分人同时使另一部分人感到惊讶。

english: Even if the sun were to rise in the west, I would not change my mind.
chinese: 即使太阳从西边出来，我也不会改变主意。

english: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
chinese: 每个人都在谈论天气, 但是没有人为它做任何事情。

english: He and I were inseparable friends during our time together in school.
chinese: 我和他在学生时代是分不开的朋友。

english: He doesn't seem to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.
chinese: 他似乎不知道我父亲和我之间的纠葛。

english: His intelligence and experience enabled him to deal with the trouble.
chinese: 他的智慧和经验使他能处理这个麻烦。

english: I agree on an emotional level, but on the pragmatic level I disagree.
chinese: 我感情上支持，但是理性上反对。

english: I can't think of any other way of getting him to accept our proposal.
chinese: 我看不出有其他方法能让他接受我们的提议。

english: I think it's dangerous to climb a mountain on a day when it's stormy.
chinese: 我认为在有风暴的时候里登山很危险。

english: I wanted to earn some money, so I worked part time three days a week.
chinese: 我想挣点钱，所以我一周打三天小时工。

english: If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.
chinese: 如果不是因为有你的帮助，我不可能完成了这个工作。

english: In a few minutes we'll be landing at New Tokyo International Airport.
chinese: 我们将于几分钟内降落在新东京国际机场。

english: It's better to teach someone how to fish than to give someone a fish.
chinese: 授之以鱼，不如授之以渔。

english: It's clear that there's a rather strong disagreement between the two.
chinese: 很明显的是这两者之间有很强烈的分歧。

english: It's hard to believe Tom wasn't aware that Mary was in love with him.
chinese: 真难相信汤姆不知道玛丽爱他。

english: Most Americans do not object to my calling them by their first names.
chinese: 大多数美国人似乎不反对我直呼其名。

english: Nobody's going to shed any tears if that old building gets torn down.
chinese: 没有人会为这个旧建筑物的拆除而落泪。

english: She has a good command of English though she was brought up in Japan.
chinese: 虽然她在日本被抚养长大，但是她精通英语。

english: She took full advantage of her stay in London to improve her English.
chinese: 她充分利用她住在伦敦的优势，提高英语。

english: The rescuers searched the surroundings in hopes of finding the child.
chinese: 援救人员为了找到孩子，仔细搜索了那个区域。

english: The taller the tree, the more likely it is to be struck by lightning.
There is nothing worse than doing something in a half-hearted manner.
chinese: 没有什么比做事缺乏热情更糟。

english: Tom and I sat on a bench in the park and talked while we fed pigeons.
chinese: 我和汤姆在公园的长椅上坐着，一边聊天一边喂着鸽子。

english: Tom got to the station in time to catch the train he wanted to catch.
chinese: 汤姆及时赶到了车站搭上了他想搭的那列车。

english: We've received a lot of applications in answer to our advertisements.
chinese: 我们已经收到了很多回应我们广告的申请。

english: Because of heavy snow, the plane from Beijing arrived 20 minutes late.
chinese: 由于下大雪，从北京来的班机延迟二十分钟。

english: Can you describe to me the difference between black tea and green tea?
chinese: 你能告诉我红茶和绿茶的区别吗？

english: Don't worry! Even if I drink, it doesn't have an effect on my driving.
chinese: 别担心! 即使我喝酒了, 它对我的驾驶没有影响。

english: Had he known what was about to happen, he would have changed his plan.
chinese: 要是他知道会发生什么，他就会改变计划。

english: Having missed the train, I had to wait about an hour for the next one.
chinese: 由于错过了火车，我不得不等下一班等一小时。

english: I think I understood everything Tom said, but I'm not absolutely sure.
chinese: 我认为我听懂了汤姆说的所有话，但我不确定。

english: I think you will find it convenient to put a short-cut on the desktop.
chinese: 我想你迟早会知道在桌面建立一个快捷方式是有多方便。

english: I want a cellular phone, but I don't have enough money to pay for one.
chinese: 我想要一支手机, 但是我没有足够的钱买一支。

english: I'm looking for a native speaker who could help me correct this essay.
chinese: 我正在寻找可以帮我修改这篇论文的母语人士。

english: I've something interesting to tell you that you might find surprising.
chinese: 告诉你个好玩的事，能惊你一下。

english: If I'd known that it would come to this, I would have never consented.
chinese: 要是我知道会发生这种事，那我死活不同意。

english: It was raining when we left, but by the time we arrived, it was sunny.
chinese: 我们走的时候下着雨，到的时候有太阳。

english: It's hard to tell Englishmen from Americans just by the way they look.
chinese: 只凭长相的话很难区分英国人和美国人。

english: Laser printers are generally cheaper to maintain than inkjet printers.
chinese: 激光打印机一般比喷墨打印机用起来更省钱。

english: Preventive measures are much more effective than the actual treatment.
chinese: 预防措施比真正的治疗更有效。

english: Rather than live a hundred years as a rabbit, live one day as a tiger.
chinese: 宁可当只老虎活一天，也不愿当只兔子过一百年。

english: She recognized the brooch as the one she had lost a few months before.
chinese: 她认出那枚胸针是她几个月前丢失的。

english: There are so many things to tell you that I don't know where to start.
chinese: 我有太多话想和你说，以至于不知从何说起。

english: There was a sprinkling of foreigners among the visitors in the museum.
chinese: 博物馆的参观者中有少数是外国人。

english: Tom said Mary thought John might be permitted to do that next weekend.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽觉得约翰下周末可能被允许那么做。

english: Tom wanted to stay home and relax instead of hiking with his children.
chinese: 汤姆想待在家休息而不是和他的孩子们出去远足。

english: What's this song? I've heard it before, but I can't remember the name.
chinese: 这是什么歌？我以前听过，但是我想不起歌名了。

english: As is evident from the data, smoking is not decreasing among the young.
chinese: 数据表明年轻人抽烟的现象没有减少。

english: Because it is written in simple English even a child can understand it.
chinese: 因为这是用简单的英语写的，所以甚至连孩子都能理解。

english: Does any other country fan the flames of patriotism as much as America?
chinese: 有没有一个国家比美国更提倡爱国主义？

english: Every morning she helps her mother to prepare breakfast in the kitchen.
chinese: 她每天早上都帮母亲在厨房准备早餐。

english: I always enjoy listening to classical music when I have some free time.
chinese: 有空的时候，我总喜欢听古典音乐。

english: I know that Tom knows that Mary knows that she doesn't have to do that.
chinese: 我知道汤姆知道玛丽知道她自己不需要这么做

english: I know that Tom knows that Mary probably won't want to do that anymore.
chinese: 我确定汤姆知道玛丽可能不再这样做了。

english: I was nine years old when I asked my mom if Santa Claus really existed.
chinese: 我九岁的时候问我妈妈圣诞老人是否真的存在。

english: If it's at all possible, I'd like you to take part in the next meeting.
chinese: 如果可能的话, 我希望你参加下一次的会议。

english: If you enjoy the work you do, you have something worth more than money.
chinese: 如果你喜欢你做的工作，你就有比金钱更有价值的东西。

english: It was not until I had a baby myself that I knew what mother's love is.
chinese: 直到我自己有了孩子我才明白了什么是母爱。

english: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
chinese: 善良是聋子能听盲人能看的语言。

english: Mary came home from school in tears because her friends had teased her.
chinese: 玛丽哭着从学校跑回了家里，因为她的朋友捉弄了她。

english: My father was no less affectionate and tender to me than my mother was.
chinese: 我爸爸对我的爱和照顾不比我妈妈少。

english: Now's the time to decide whether you really want to get married or not.
chinese: 现在是你决定是不是真要结婚的时候。

english: People show up bright on an infrared camera because of their body heat.
chinese: 人会因为体温而在红外线摄影机上显现。

english: The police have been searching for the stolen goods for almost a month.
chinese: 警察大概从一个月前就开始找被偷物品了。

english: They told me that I would feel a little better if I took this medicine.
chinese: 他们告诉我吃完这个药我就会觉得舒服一点。

english: Tom began to sing "Happy Birthday" and the entire restaurant joined in.
chinese: 汤姆开始唱“祝你生日快乐”，然后整个餐厅的人都加入了进来。

english: Tom couldn't go to college because his family didn't have enough money.
chinese: 因为家里钱不够所以汤姆没能念大学。

english: Tom thought he had a chance to make a lot of money on the stock market.
chinese: 汤姆觉得他有机会在股市赚一大笔钱。

english: When his food supply ran short, he had to look for a new place to live.
chinese: 他的食物供给不足的的时候，他不得不去找新的地方居住。

english: While I was reading in bed last night, I fell asleep with the light on.
chinese: 我昨晚在床上看书的时候点着灯就睡了。

english: "Where have you been?" "I have been to the station to see a friend off."
chinese: “你去哪儿了？”“我去了火车站送我的一个朋友。”

english: After I got married, my Japanese got better and I could understand more.
chinese: 在我结婚之后，我的日语水平提高了，能理解更多日语了。

english: As I missed the train, I had to wait for the next one for about an hour.
chinese: 由于错过了火车，我不得不等下一班等一小时。

english: By the way, did you find the umbrella you said you'd lost the other day?
chinese: 对了，前些时间你说伞不见了，现在找到了吗？

english: Her eyes shone with joy when she saw that her mother was not mad at her.
chinese: 当她看到妈妈没在生她的气，她的双眼因为幸福而闪烁了。

english: I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.
chinese: 我不用曲膝就能把我的手掌放到地上。

english: I learned to drive a car and got a driver's license when I was eighteen.
chinese: 我十八岁时，学了开车、考到了驾照。

english: I learned to drive a car when I was eighteen and got a driver's license.
chinese: 我十八岁时，学了开车、考到了驾照。

english: I was planning on going to the beach today, but then it started to rain.
chinese: 我本来预备今天去海滩的，但接着天就开始下雨了。

english: I wonder whether we have enough money to buy Tom the painting he wanted.
chinese: 我想知道咱们是否有足够的钱给汤姆买他想要的这幅画。

english: If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be called research, would it?
chinese: 如果我们知道我们在做什么，那么这不能称之为研究，是吗？

english: If we'd arrived ten minutes earlier, we would've made it onto the plane.
chinese: 要是我们早十分钟到的话，我们就能赶上飞机了。

english: If you want to go, then go. If you don't want to, then it's no big deal.
chinese: 如果你想去，就去好了。如果你不想去，那也没什么大不了的。

english: In the U.S., most people can vote when they reach eighteen years of age.
chinese: 在美国，大多数人能在十八岁以后投票。

english: It is the things that we do not possess which seem to us most desirable.
chinese: 得不到的东西就最想得到。

english: Rather than cutting down on cigarettes, why don't you just give them up?
chinese: 比起少抽烟，你何不直接把烟戒了？

english: Sociopaths rarely display remorse or feelings of guilt for their crimes.
chinese: 反社会者极少为他们的罪行显露懊悔或有罪恶的感觉。

english: The company went public and became listed on the stock exchange in 1990.
The small hill turned out to be an ancient burial mound 2,000 years old.
chinese: 这座小山丘原来是一座两千多年的古墓。

english: Tom can't account for his whereabouts on the day that Mary was murdered.
chinese: 汤姆不能说明玛丽遇害那天自己在哪里。

english: Tom never forgets to give his wife flowers on their wedding anniversary.
chinese: 汤姆从没忘记在婚礼周年纪念日送给他妻子花。

english: Tom was able to make himself understood in French when he visited Paris.
chinese: 在巴黎，没有人能够理解汤姆的法文。

english: We were talking about something at that time, but I don't remember what.
chinese: 我们那时在谈论事情，但我不记得是什么了。

english: You shouldn't share too much private information on the social networks.
chinese: 你不应该在社交网络上分享过多私人信息。

english: A great warrior radiates strength. He doesn't have to fight to the death.
chinese: 一名伟大的战士威力显著，无需抵死奋战。

english: After Tom lost his job, he started to gamble to cope with his depression.
chinese: 汤姆失业后，为了排遣郁闷的心情而开始了赌博。

english: Beer is taxed according to its malt content, so low-malt beer is cheaper.
chinese: 因为啤酒会根据麦芽含量去征税，所以发泡酒会比较便宜。

english: I think you'll have very little difficulty in getting a driver's license.
chinese: 我想您要拿到驾照根本不难。

english: I think you'll have very little difficulty in getting a driver's license.
chinese: 我想你要拿到驾照根本不难。

english: I thought we had found the perfect hiding place, but the police found us.
chinese: 我以为我们发现了绝妙的藏身之处，但警察找到了我们。

english: I'd like to know the phone number of the nearest American Express office.
chinese: 我想知道最近的美国运通办事处的电话号码。

english: I'm pretty sure Tom is the only one who can tell us what we need to know.
chinese: 我很确定，汤姆是唯一能告诉我们我们需要知道的事情的人。

english: She visits the dentist on a regular basis, so she seldom gets toothaches.
chinese: 她定期去看牙医，所以她很少牙痛。

english: To make matters worse, he isn't even conscious of annoying his neighbors.
chinese: 让事情更糟糕的是，他没有注意到他打扰到了邻居。

english: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.
chinese: 你似乎对来自国外的想法有偏见。

english: According to the weather forecast, the rainy season will set in next week.
chinese: 根据天气预报，雨季下周会开始。

english: At first, he thought English very difficult, but now he thinks it is easy.
chinese: 起初他以为英语很难，如今他觉得很简单。

english: Everyone held their breath to see who would win the presidential election.
chinese: 所有人都屏住呼吸关注着谁会赢得总统竞选。

english: I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone would be willing to help me.
chinese: 我知道不太可能有人愿意帮助我。

english: If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
chinese: 如果一个病人折一千只纸鹤, 她的愿望就会成真。

english: It's hard to believe that Tom wasn't aware that Mary was in love with him.
chinese: 真难相信汤姆不知道玛丽爱他。

english: Please attend the meeting in the second floor conference room at 2:30 p.m.
chinese: 请在两点半参加在二楼会议室的会议。

english: Tom returned to his hometown to visit his parents during the summer break.
chinese: 汤姆在夏休回乡看望父母。

english: We must take into account the wishes of all the family in planning a trip.
chinese: 筹划旅行的时候，我们必须考虑到全家人的意愿。

english: You're much less likely to get a good position if you don't speak English.
chinese: 如果你不会说英语，你就很难得到一个好的职位。

english: After asking for my key at the front desk, I took the elevator to my floor.
chinese: 我到柜台拿了钥匙，然后就乘电梯去了我房间的楼层。

english: English has now become the common language of several nations in the world.
chinese: 英语现已成为世界上许多国家的通用语言了。

english: I don't mind lending you the money provided you pay it back within a month.
chinese: 假如能一个月之内还上的话，我可以把钱借给你。

english: If he had been a little more careful, the accident would have been avoided.
chinese: 如果他当时再小心一点点，事故就不会发生了。

english: Outside the school, she saw people with no homes living in cardboard boxes.
chinese: 她在校外见到没家的人住纸板箱。

english: The Prime Minister's speech was calculated to anger the opposition parties.
chinese: 总理的发言估计激怒了在野党。

english: The good thing about this electronic dictionary is that it's easy to carry.
chinese: 这电子辞典的好处就是便于携带。

english: The lady really flipped out when she learned she had won a million dollars.
chinese: 当这位女士得知她已经赢得了百万美元, 她真的乐疯了。

english: Tom gave Mary a box of chocolates, and then ate all the chocolates himself.
chinese: 汤姆给了玛丽一盒巧克力，然后自己把全部巧克力都吃掉了。

english: Tom said Mary thought that John might be permitted to do that next weekend.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽觉得约翰下周末可能被允许那么做。

english: Tom said that Mary thought John might be permitted to do that next weekend.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽觉得约翰下周末可能被允许那么做。

english: We apologize for the delay and regret any inconvenience it may have caused.
chinese: 我们对这次的延迟表示抱歉，并对可能造成的不便表示遗憾。

english: According to newspaper reports, there was an airplane accident last evening.
chinese: 根据报载，有一架飞机昨天晚上发生了意外。

english: After he had graduated from the university, he taught English for two years.
chinese: 从他大学毕业以后, 他教了两年的英语。

english: If a man had 11 sheep and all but 9 died, how many sheep would he have left?
chinese: 如果一个人有11只羊，除了9只之外，其他全部死了，那么他还剩下几只羊呢？

english: If it rains on that day, the game will be postponed until the next fine day.
chinese: 如果那天下雨，比赛会顺延至下一个晴天。

english: It would take me too much time to explain to you why it's not going to work.
chinese: 给你解释这为什么行不通要花很多时间。

english: Many parents think it's important for their children to eat before 8:00 p.m.
chinese: 许多父母认为让自己的子女在下午八点前吃完饭是很重要的。

english: The importation of rare wild animals to this country is strictly prohibited.
chinese: 该国严禁进口稀有野生动物。

english: The statue of Hachiko, the faithful dog, stands in front of Shibuya Station.
chinese: 忠犬八公的雕像伫立在涩谷站前。

english: Tom thought that he had a chance to make a lot of money on the stock market.
chinese: 汤姆觉得他有机会在股市赚一大笔钱。

english: You said Mary was beautiful, but I didn't think she would be this beautiful.
chinese: 你说玛丽很美丽，但我没有想到她是这么美丽。

english: You should apologize to your father for not getting home in time for dinner.
chinese: 你应该为你没有及时回家吃晚餐向你父亲道歉。

english: A person views things differently according to whether they are rich or poor.
chinese: 每一个人对事情的看法不同是依据他们是富有还是贫穷。

english: A person views things differently according to whether they are rich or poor.
chinese: 人们看待事情的角度不同取决于他们是富裕或贫穷。

english: Although the government refuses to admit it, its economic policy is in ruins.
chinese: 尽管政府拒绝承认，它的经济政策还是失败了。

english: I had to cancel that order because we didn't have enough money to pay for it.
chinese: 我们的钱不够，所以我只好把订单取消了。

english: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.
chinese: Mary试图把围裙围在腰上，然后把烤鸡从炉子里拿出来。

english: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.
chinese: 玛丽把围裙系在她的腰上，然后把火鸡从烤箱里拿出来了。

english: People look at things differently depending on whether they are rich or poor.
chinese: 人们看待事情的角度不同取决于他们是富裕或贫穷。

english: The most important thing in the Olympic Games is not winning but taking part.
chinese: 奥运会最重要的不是获胜，而是参与。

english: The population of London is much greater than that of any other British city.
chinese: 伦敦的人口远远多于其他英国城市的人口。

english: They consider it impolite to disagree with someone they don't know very well.
chinese: 他们认为，去反驳一个不认识的人有些不礼貌。

english: Tom came to the conclusion that no matter what he did, Mary wouldn't like it.
chinese: 汤姆得出无论他做什么，玛丽都不会喜欢的结论。

english: Eighty percent of all information on computers around the world is in English.
chinese: 全世界百分之八十电脑上的资讯都是用英语写的。

english: I thought that we had found the perfect hiding place, but the police found us.
chinese: 我以为我们发现了绝妙的藏身之处，但警察找到了我们。

english: I'm the type who gets nervous in front of people, so I'm bad at speech making.
chinese: 我是那种面对人群很紧张的人，所以我的演讲能力很差。

english: I've had a scratchy throat since this morning. I wonder if I've caught a cold.
chinese: 早上起来，嗓子变得很沙哑，我想是不是感冒了。

english: If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it's probably an apple.
chinese: 如果看起来像个苹果而且吃起来也像苹果的话，可能就是苹果。

english: The world is just like a book, and every step you take is like turning a page.
chinese: 世界就像是一本书，走一步等于翻了一页。

english: Today, I was supposed to study at the library but I woke up around 12 o'clock.
chinese: 今天我本打算在图书馆学习，但到12点左右才醒。

english: Tom became popular among teenagers as soon as he made his debut on the screen.
chinese: 汤姆第一次上电视后就广受青少年的欢迎。

english: Tom can write almost like a native speaker, but his pronunciation is terrible.
chinese: Tom写作可以写的像本国人一样，可是他的发音很烂

english: Tom did the best he could, but he wasn't able to get a higher grade than Mary.
chinese: 汤姆尽了全力，但他还是不能获得比玛丽更高的等级。

english: As the train came to a halt, all of the passengers wondered what was happening.
chinese: 当列车停止时，所有的乘客都想知道发生了什么。

english: Charles Lindbergh made the first solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean in 1927.
chinese: Charles Lindbergh于1927年成功完成了第一次独自飞越大西洋。

english: His scores are always better than mine, even though he doesn't study very much.
chinese: 他的分数总比我高，尽管他学习得少一点。

english: I don't have a lot of work, but it's enough to keep me in the office this week.
chinese: 其实我工作并不多，但足以让我这周在办公室里忙着了。

english: I returned the books I borrowed from the library, and I borrowed some new ones.
chinese: 我还了从图书馆借的书，又借了些新的。

english: My father is a native French speaker and my mother is a native English speaker.
chinese: 我父亲的母语是法语，我母亲的是英语。

english: Publication of the article was timed to coincide with the professor's birthday.
chinese: 文章的发表被预定在教授生日那天。

english: She's popular, not because she's beautiful, but because she's kind to everyone.
chinese: 她受欢迎不是因为她的美丽，而是因为她亲切地对待每个人。

english: The telephone operator asked the caller to hold on until a connection was made.
chinese: 电话运营商提示来电人等候接通。

english: They say you shouldn't take rumors seriously, but that's easier said than done.
chinese: 人们常说不要乱相信谣言，但说起来容易做起来难。

english: Those who use forks or chopsticks often think people who don't are uncivilized.
chinese: 用叉子和筷子的人经常觉得不用叉子和筷子的人不文明。

english: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
chinese: 那些说钱不能买来幸福的人，只是不知道上哪里去买而已。

english: At the time there were no native English speakers teaching in any public school.
chinese: 当时没有任何以英语为母语的人在公立学校任教。

english: Car accidents are the leading cause of death for teenagers in the United States.
chinese: 交通事故是美国青少年死亡的主要原因。

english: She was asked to convince him to get his son or someone else to paint the house.
chinese: 她被要求去说服他以让他或者他的儿子或者是别的人来粉刷屋子。

english: Tom always speaks in such a low voice that I can barely understand what he says.
chinese: 汤姆总是说话声音太小，我几乎听不懂他在说什么。

english: Tom said that Mary thought that John might be permitted to do that next weekend.
chinese: 汤姆说玛丽觉得约翰下周末可能被允许那么做。

english: Even though I studied English for 6 years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.
chinese: 尽管我在学校学了6年英语，我还是说不好。

english: Every now and then he drops in at this bookstore on his way home from the office.
chinese: 有时从办公室回家的路上他会到这家书店看一看。

english: I didn't know the city, and what's more, I couldn't speak a word of the language.
chinese: 我不知道这个城市，而且我一点都不懂那里的语言。

english: The ages of the two children put together was equivalent to that of their father.
chinese: 两个孩子的年龄加起来和他们的父亲相当。

english: The kitchen knife wasn't sharp enough to cut the meat, so I used my pocket knife.
chinese: 这把菜刀不够锋利，所以我用了我的折叠刀来切肉。

english: To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.
chinese: 对工具箱里只有一把榔头的人来说，所有的问题都像钉子。

english: Tom went swimming in the river, but when he got out, his clothes had been stolen.
chinese: 汤姆去河里游泳，但当他出来时，他的衣服被偷了。

english: Being a good conversationalist does not just mean being a good speaker of English.
chinese: 作为一个良好的交谈者，并不只意味著作一个英语说得好的说话者。

english: Manholes are round because that way they won't accidentally fall through the hole.
chinese: 人孔是圆的，因为这样人孔盖就不会意外地掉进洞里。

english: You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.
chinese: 你应该知道要为考试作准备。

english: A connection between personality and blood type has not been scientifically proven.
chinese: 科学上，血型和性格的关联性没有被证明。

english: His dress is that of a gentleman, but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.
chinese: 他衣着像个绅士，言行举止却像个小丑。

english: I've just spoken to your French teacher and he says you're doing well in his class.
chinese: 我刚跟你的法语老师谈过话，他说你在课堂上表现得很好。

english: We'll need a head hunting agency to find the right man for this executive position.
chinese: 我们需要人力仲介公司帮我们找到合适的人来担任这个管理职位。

english: Even though I studied French for three years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.
chinese: 即使我在学校学习了三年，我仍然不擅长说法语。

english: He came back not because he was homesick, but because he was running short of money.
chinese: 他不是因为想家，而是因为没钱才回来的。

english: I know you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?
chinese: 我知道你已经等很久了，但你能再等一小会吗？

english: If you want something to be done right, sometimes you've just got to do it yourself.
chinese: 如果你想做对一件事，有时候你得亲力亲为。

english: The company's competitive edge will be eroded if system engineers continue to leave.
chinese: 如果系统工程师继续离开，公司的竞争优势将会被削弱。

english: Visitors are usually asked to remove their shoes before they enter a Japanese house.
chinese: 访客通常在进入一户日本人家之前会被要求脱鞋。

english: Why don't we stop arguing over these piddling matters and get to the issues at hand?
chinese: 为什么我们纠缠细枝末节而不进入正题呢？

english: A growing child who doesn't seem to have much energy perhaps needs medical attention.
chinese: 一个成长中的孩子如果没有充足的能量，可能需要药物治疗。

english: All things considered, I think you should go back home and take care of your parents.
chinese: 全盘考虑后，我觉得你应该回家，照顾你的父母。

english: In London, the police are always worried about finding a bomb on the train or subway.
chinese: 在伦敦，警察总是担心在列车或地铁上发现炸弹。

english: Ladies and gentlemen, due to an accident at the airport, our arrival will be delayed.
chinese: 女士们，先生们，由于机场的意外情况，我们的著陆将被推迟。

english: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.
chinese: 除了那些我们尝试过的政府形态，民主是最差的那种了。

english: If you could go back and start your life again, from what age would you like to start?
chinese: 假如能回到过去让人生再来一遍的话，你希望能回到几岁的时候？

english: Thank you very much for lending me $500 when I was having difficulty making ends meet.
chinese: 谢谢你在我贫困潦倒之时借给我$500。

english: At lunchtime today, our usual restaurant was closed because of a funeral in the family.
chinese: 今天午餐时间，我们常去的饭馆关门了，因为他们家在办丧事。

english: The amount of paper produced by a country is closely related to its cultural standards.
chinese: 一个国家纸的产量和它的文明程度密切相关。

english: Tom is the head of the company in name only. His son makes all the important decisions.
chinese: 汤姆名义上市公司的领导。他儿子做所有重大决策。

english: Tom's mother is a nurse at the hospital that's across the street from where Mary lives.
chinese: 汤姆的妈妈是一名护士，她所在的医院就在玛丽住的那条街的对面。

english: Eat a live frog every morning, and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.
chinese: 每天早上吃一只活青蛙, 那么你一天中其他的时间就不会发生什么更糟糕的事了。

english: I don't think that it's very likely that Tom will tell us the truth about what happened.
chinese: 我不认为汤姆会把事情的真相告诉我们。

english: I had to change clothes because what I was wearing wasn't appropriate for the situation.
chinese: 我必须要换衣服，因为我现在穿的衣服不适合这个环境。

english: Because of the problem of air pollution, the bicycle may some day replace the automobile.
chinese: 因为空气污染的问题，也许有一天自行车会取代汽车。

english: Computers are certainly playing an important role in our life, whether we like it or not.
chinese: 无论我们是否喜欢电脑，它在我们的生活中始终起着重要的作用。

english: I know that you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?
chinese: 我知道你已经等很久了，但你能再等一小会吗？

english: Which translation of this book do you think is better, the French one or the English one?
chinese: 你觉得这本书的哪个译本比较好？法语的还是英语的？

english: I like this picture, not just because it's famous, but because it really is a masterpiece.
chinese: 我喜欢这幅画，不仅是因为它的名气，而是因为它真的是一个杰作。
